wj_toriyama_text: 休む間もなくまた登場させてもらいました！うれしいけど悲しい。でもガンバリまっせ！！<明> Here I am again, and without having had any time to rest! I’m happy, but sad too. Still, I’ll do my best!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
休む間もなくまた登場させてもらいました！うれしいけど悲しい。でもガンバリまっせ！！<明>
Here I am again, and without having had any time to rest! I’m happy, but sad too. Still, I’ll do my best!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 急に仕事をしすぎて死んだ。誰か元気になる秘孔を突いて！<明> Work is really killing me all of a sudden. Somebody, hit the pressure point that’ll give me more zip! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
急に仕事をしすぎて死んだ。誰か元気になる秘孔を突いて！<明>
Work is really killing me all of a sudden. Somebody, hit the pressure point that’ll give me more zip! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: みたい映画がたくさんあるんですが、親切な担当さんが、公開前に 物語 （ ストーリー ） を教えてくれちゃうんです…<明> There are tons of movies I want to see, but my dear sweet editor spoils the story for me before they open… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
みたい映画がたくさんあるんですが、親切な担当さんが、公開前に物語（ストーリー）を教えてくれちゃうんです…<明>
There are tons of movies I want to see, but my dear sweet editor spoils the story for me before they open… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今頃になってかの名作『未来少年コナン』を見て大感激しちゃいました。ああいう作品をかきたい<明> Recently, I finally watched that masterpiece Future Boy Conan , and it really impressed me. I want to make something like that. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今頃になってかの名作『未来少年コナン』を見て大感激しちゃいました。ああいう作品をかきたい<明>
Recently, I finally watched that masterpiece Future Boy Conan, and it really impressed me. I want to make something like that. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 正月はバイクとプラ模と宴会などで仕事より大いそがしじゃ〈明〉 During New Year’s I’m much busier with motorbikes, plastic models, and parties than I am with work. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
正月はバイクとプラ模と宴会などで仕事より大いそがしじゃ〈明〉
During New Year’s I’m much busier with motorbikes, plastic models, and parties than I am with work. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: う～、さぶいよ～。冬はやだよ～。早く春を通りこして夏がこないかなあー。<明> Uh, it’s so cold. I hate winter. Hopefully we’ll cruise through spring and get on into summer pretty soon here. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
う～、さぶいよ～。冬はやだよ～。早く春を通りこして夏がこないかなあー。<明>
Uh, it’s so cold. I hate winter. Hopefully we’ll cruise through spring and get on into summer pretty soon here. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 話の内容通り作者もスケベだと思うと大間違い！でも回りはその通りと断言！！<明> It’s a big mistake to think the author is a pervert just like the perverted stories he writes! Though everyone around me says it’s true!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
話の内容通り作者もスケベだと思うと大間違い！でも回りはその通りと断言！！<明>
It’s a big mistake to think the author is a pervert just like the perverted stories he writes! Though everyone around me says it’s true!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仲間とじじくさく温泉へ　でもお湯が熱すぎてゆでだこみたいになっちゃった<明> My buddies and I visited a hot spring, like the old farts that we are. But the water was way too hot, so we ended up like boiled eggs. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仲間とじじくさく温泉へ　でもお湯が熱すぎてゆでだこみたいになっちゃった<明>
My buddies and I visited a hot spring, like the old farts that we are. But the water was way too hot, so we ended up like boiled eggs. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今頃、知人あてに年賀状かきはじめてます。今年中につくといいな、なんて…<明> I’ve just now started writing New Year’s cards for all my acquaintances. Hopefully they’ll receive them before the year is out… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今頃、知人あてに年賀状かきはじめてます。今年中につくといいな、なんて…<明>
I’ve just now started writing New Year’s cards for all my acquaintances. Hopefully they’ll receive them before the year is out… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近すこしはお酒が飲めるようになった！でも顔はまっ赤なトマトのようだ！！<明> Lately I’ve gotten to be able to drink alcohol! But it makes my face red as a tomato!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近すこしはお酒が飲めるようになった！でも顔はまっ赤なトマトのようだ！！<明>
Lately I’ve gotten to be able to drink alcohol! But it makes my face red as a tomato!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近おもしろいテレビ番組が少なくなって…おかげで仕事がはかどります！<明> There aren’t that many good TV shows anymore… But thanks to that, I’m getting lots of work done! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近おもしろいテレビ番組が少なくなって…おかげで仕事がはかどります！<明>
There aren’t that many good TV shows anymore… But thanks to that, I’m getting lots of work done! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 寒い中、毎日犬と走り廻ってます。田尾選手も、寒いけど、東京でがんばって。<明> Every day I run around with my dog in the cold. I bet you’re cold too, [Yasushi] Tao, but hang in there over in Tokyo. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
寒い中、毎日犬と走り廻ってます。田尾選手も、寒いけど、東京でがんばって。<明>
Every day I run around with my dog in the cold. I bet you’re cold too, [Yasushi] Tao, but hang in there over in Tokyo. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近のＦＬは、「何かくれ！」というのが多い。たまには感想も書いて！<明> Lately I’ve been getting tons of fan letters asking me for stuff. How about telling me what you think of the comic every now and then?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近のＦＬは、「何かくれ！」というのが多い。たまには感想も書いて！<明>
Lately I’ve been getting tons of fan letters asking me for stuff. How about telling me what you think of the comic every now and then?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あと一か月で30歳。まだまだ青春といいながら、髪を見つめるこの頃です。<明> I’ll be 30 in just a month. I wanna say I’m still young, but it’s probably time I start watching my hairline. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あと一か月で30歳。まだまだ青春といいながら、髪を見つめるこの頃です。<明>
I’ll be 30 in just a month. I wanna say I’m still young, but it’s probably time I start watching my hairline. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 見たい映画がたくさんある。はたして全部見られるのか！とても不安である…<明> There are tons of movies I want to see. Can I possibly see them all?! It really bugs me… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
見たい映画がたくさんある。はたして全部見られるのか！とても不安である…<明>
There are tons of movies I want to see. Can I possibly see them all?! It really bugs me… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 自分では作らないけど、料理番組を見るのが大スキ。思わずヨダレが出ます<明> I can’t cook, but I still love watching cooking shows. I start drooling before I know it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
自分では作らないけど、料理番組を見るのが大スキ。思わずヨダレが出ます<明>
I can’t cook, but I still love watching cooking shows. I start drooling before I know it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あこがれの春がやってきて、ウキウキだけどなぜか机の前！バイクのりたい<明> Spring is finally here! I love spring! I’m jumping for joy… but still stuck at my desk. I wanna go ride my motorbike. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あこがれの春がやってきて、ウキウキだけどなぜか机の前！バイクのりたい<明>
Spring is finally here! I love spring! I’m jumping for joy… but still stuck at my desk. I wanna go ride my motorbike. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 春だ！バイクだ！ヘイ飛ばすぜ、町内一周…。う～む、情けない……。<明> It’s spring! I should be zooming around town on my motorbike… Yeah, this sucks… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
春だ！バイクだ！ヘイ飛ばすぜ、町内一周…。う～む、情けない……。<明>
It’s spring! I should be zooming around town on my motorbike… Yeah, this sucks… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 散髪代をけちって奥さんに刈ってもらったら、とんでもない頭に！陽気がいいのに外に出れない！<明> I’m too stingy to pay the barber, so I had my wife cut my hair, and now it looks awful! The weather’s great, but I can’t go outside like this! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
散髪代をけちって奥さんに刈ってもらったら、とんでもない頭に！陽気がいいのに外に出れない！<明>
I’m too stingy to pay the barber, so I had my wife cut my hair, and now it looks awful! The weather’s great, but I can’t go outside like this! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 部屋があまりちらかっていたので、そうじを始めたら、３日もかかったよ！<明> My room was so messy, it took me three whole days to clean it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
部屋があまりちらかっていたので、そうじを始めたら、３日もかかったよ！<明>
My room was so messy, it took me three whole days to clean it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今、バイクをバラバラにして塗装し直して楽しんでます。ホレボレするデキ！<明> Right now I’m having fun taking my motorbike apart and repainting it. I’m in love with this craftsmanship! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今、バイクをバラバラにして塗装し直して楽しんでます。ホレボレするデキ！<明>
Right now I’m having fun taking my motorbike apart and repainting it. I’m in love with this craftsmanship! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Dr.スランプ最終巻が5月10日に出ます　この際、ぜひぜひ、全巻お求めを！！<明> The final volume of Dr. Slump comes out on May 10th. By all means, take this opportunity to collect the whole series!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Dr.スランプ最終巻が5月10日に出ます　この際、ぜひぜひ、全巻お求めを！！<明>
The final volume of Dr. Slump comes out on May 10th. By all means, take this opportunity to collect the whole series!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 暇さえあればバイクの改造屋さんに行ってます。仕事みてると面白いなあ！<明> Whenever I have spare time, I go down to the motorbike mod shop. It’s so fascinating watching them work! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
暇さえあればバイクの改造屋さんに行ってます。仕事みてると面白いなあ！<明>
Whenever I have spare time, I go down to the motorbike mod shop. It’s so fascinating watching them work! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりにまとめて休んだけど、ノンビリできず、忙しく飛び廻ってました。<明> I finally get a break for the first time in who knows how long, but instead of relaxing I’m busy running all over the place. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりにまとめて休んだけど、ノンビリできず、忙しく飛び廻ってました。<明>
I finally get a break for the first time in who knows how long, but instead of relaxing I’m busy running all over the place. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 両親が旅行に出かけると500本の盆栽に水をやるのはワシの担当。なさけない。<明> When my parents go on a trip, it’s my job to water their 500 Bonsai plants. Pathetic. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
両親が旅行に出かけると500本の盆栽に水をやるのはワシの担当。なさけない。<明>
When my parents go on a trip, it’s my job to water their 500 Bonsai plants. Pathetic. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 亀仙人をかくたびに、スケベな所がワシそっくりだ、と言われる。失礼な！！<明> Whenever I draw Kame-Sen’nin, people tell me I’m just like him: a big pervert. How rude!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
亀仙人をかくたびに、スケベな所がワシそっくりだ、と言われる。失礼な！！<明>
Whenever I draw Kame-Sen’nin, people tell me I’m just like him: a big pervert. How rude!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 読者の方からパンティーを送ってもらいました。嬉しくて壁に飾ってあります<明> One of my readers sent me some panties. I’ve happily hung them up on my wall. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
読者の方からパンティーを送ってもらいました。嬉しくて壁に飾ってあります<明>
One of my readers sent me some panties. I’ve happily hung them up on my wall. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来週はバリ島にいます。海岸沿いにバイクをとばすのは、いい気持ちだろうな<明> Next week I’m going to Bali. I bet it’ll feel great to zoom along the beach on my motorbike. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来週はバリ島にいます。海岸沿いにバイクをとばすのは、いい気持ちだろうな<明>
Next week I’m going to Bali. I bet it’ll feel great to zoom along the beach on my motorbike. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: おじさんなので徹夜ができなくなった　ふと目が覚めると、原稿にヨダレが…。<明> I’m so old, I can’t even pull all-nighters anymore. I wake up and find drool all over my manuscript… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
おじさんなので徹夜ができなくなった　ふと目が覚めると、原稿にヨダレが…。<明>
I’m so old, I can’t even pull all-nighters anymore. I wake up and find drool all over my manuscript… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 夜店で買ったウズラのヒナが、スクスク育っている。大きくなったら食べヨ<明> The quail chick I bought from the shop stand is growing up nicely. When he gets big I’ll eat him. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
夜店で買ったウズラのヒナが、スクスク育っている。大きくなったら食べヨ<明>
The quail chick I bought from the shop stand is growing up nicely. When he gets big I’ll eat him. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 天気がいいとついつい外に出てしまう　梅雨時は仕事が、はかどります。<明> I ought to know better, but whenever the weather’s nice I’ll go outside. I get more work done in the rainy season. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
天気がいいとついつい外に出てしまう　梅雨時は仕事が、はかどります。<明>
I ought to know better, but whenever the weather’s nice I’ll go outside. I get more work done in the rainy season. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 映画『目撃者』バリ島旅行、共に素朴な人びとの生活に、なぜか泣けてきた<明> The movie Witness , my trip to Bali, the lifestyle of simple people — for some reason, all this moves me to tears. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
映画『目撃者』バリ島旅行、共に素朴な人びとの生活に、なぜか泣けてきた<明>
The movie Witness, my trip to Bali, the lifestyle of simple people — for some reason, all this moves me to tears. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家は川の近く。これから台風がくるたび氾濫しないかと、ドキドキしちゃう！<明> My house is by the river. From now on, whenever there’s a typhoon I have to worry about flooding! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家は川の近く。これから台風がくるたび氾濫しないかと、ドキドキしちゃう！<明>
My house is by the river. From now on, whenever there’s a typhoon I have to worry about flooding! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家の周辺にマムシがいるので、うっかりしてると命とり。先日も必死で逃げた<明> The area around my house is infested with pit vipers, so if I’m careless it could cost me my life. Just the other day I barely got away from one. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家の周辺にマムシがいるので、うっかりしてると命とり。先日も必死で逃げた<明>
The area around my house is infested with pit vipers, so if I’m careless it could cost me my life. Just the other day I barely got away from one. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 生まれつき雷が大嫌い！鳴りだすと、思わずメガネをはずし仕事になりません<明> I’m naturally afraid of lightning! Whenever I hear it, I instinctively take off my glasses and can’t go on working. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
生まれつき雷が大嫌い！鳴りだすと、思わずメガネをはずし仕事になりません<明>
I’m naturally afraid of lightning! Whenever I hear it, I instinctively take off my glasses and can’t go on working. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 電話で原稿のコピーを送るＦＡＸを入れました。これでさぼれなくなるな！<明> My phone’s been outfitted with a fax machine, for sending copies of my manuscripts. Now I won’t be able to slack off anymore! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
電話で原稿のコピーを送るＦＡＸを入れました。これでさぼれなくなるな！<明>
My phone’s been outfitted with a fax machine, for sending copies of my manuscripts. Now I won’t be able to slack off anymore! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 名古屋の夏は暑い！！プールにいって焼ソバとかき氷を食べるのが幸福なのだ！<明> Summer in Nagoya is hot!! Going to the pool and eating yakisoba and shaved ice is sheer bliss! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
名古屋の夏は暑い！！プールにいって焼ソバとかき氷を食べるのが幸福なのだ！<明>
Summer in Nagoya is hot!! Going to the pool and eating yakisoba and shaved ice is sheer bliss! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 桂くんがピーナッツを持って遊びにきた。どっちが田舎かよくわかっただろう<明> Katsura- kun came over to visit and brought some peanuts with him. You can really tell which of us is the bigger bumpkin, can’t you? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
桂くんがピーナッツを持って遊びにきた。どっちが田舎かよくわかっただろう<明>
Katsura-kun came over to visit and brought some peanuts with him. You can really tell which of us is the bigger bumpkin, can’t you? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 猫も飼いたいけど、猫嫌いのアシが仕事にこなくなってしまうので、断念！！<明> I want to get a cat, but my assistant hates them. So unless I’m OK with him not showing up for work anymore, I guess I’m out of luck!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
猫も飼いたいけど、猫嫌いのアシが仕事にこなくなってしまうので、断念！！<明>
I want to get a cat, but my assistant hates them. So unless I’m OK with him not showing up for work anymore, I guess I’m out of luck!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ついにファミコンを買う　子供心を研究するためと、下手な言い訳をしています<明> I’m finally buying a Famicom, to help me understand the way children think. That’s the excuse, anyway. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ついにファミコンを買う　子供心を研究するためと、下手な言い訳をしています<明>
I’m finally buying a Famicom, to help me understand the way children think. That’s the excuse, anyway. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりの休みは長野へドライブ旅行　高原の秋は、サイコーの気分でした！！<明> For my first break in a while, I took a road trip to Nagano. Autumn on the highlands felt great!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりの休みは長野へドライブ旅行　高原の秋は、サイコーの気分でした！！<明>
For my first break in a while, I took a road trip to Nagano. Autumn on the highlands felt great!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: バリ島で友達になったワヤンくんから手紙が届く。これが実に楽しいのだ！！<明> I got a letter from Wayan- kun , a friend I made in Bali. That was really fun!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
バリ島で友達になったワヤンくんから手紙が届く。これが実に楽しいのだ！！<明>
I got a letter from Wayan-kun, a friend I made in Bali. That was really fun!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 軽～い気持で買ったファミコンだったのに、ついムキになって指が痛いのだ。<明> I only bought that Famicom on a whim, but now I’m totally addicted and my fingers hurt. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
軽～い気持で買ったファミコンだったのに、ついムキになって指が痛いのだ。<明>
I only bought that Famicom on a whim, but now I’m totally addicted and my fingers hurt. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 武道会は誰が優勝？その後どうするの？などと聞かれますが、次週の話を考えるだけで精一杯なのだ<明> People keep asking me who’ll win the tournament, and what will happen after that, but it’s really all I can do just to think up the story for next week. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
武道会は誰が優勝？その後どうするの？などと聞かれますが、次週の話を考えるだけで精一杯なのだ<明>
People keep asking me who’ll win the tournament, and what will happen after that, but it’s really all I can do just to think up the story for next week. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりの休み　家庭サービスで信州の温泉へドライブ旅行。露天風呂は“気持ちんよか”でした！<明> For my first break in a while, I took my family on a road-trip to a hot spring in Shinano. The open-air bath felt really good! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりの休み　家庭サービスで信州の温泉へドライブ旅行。露天風呂は“気持ちんよか”でした！<明>
For my first break in a while, I took my family on a road-trip to a hot spring in Shinano. The open-air bath felt really good! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 近くにいく時もつい車やバイクに乗ってしまう。もっと足腰を鍛えなくては。<明> Even when I just go someplace nearby, I still take the car or my motorbike. I’d better work out my legs more. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
近くにいく時もつい車やバイクに乗ってしまう。もっと足腰を鍛えなくては。<明>
Even when I just go someplace nearby, I still take the car or my motorbike. I’d better work out my legs more. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｄ･Ｌ（ディズニーランド）についに遊びに行った！担当もついてきて大騒ぎ！いい経験でした！<明> I finally went to Disneyland! Even my editor came with me and raised some hell! It was a good experience! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｄ･Ｌ（ディズニーランド）についに遊びに行った！担当もついてきて大騒ぎ！いい経験でした！<明>
I finally went to Disneyland! Even my editor came with me and raised some hell! It was a good experience! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 担当の目を盗み仕事の合間をぬって遊ぶのは、スリルがあるけど疲れるネ…。<明> It’s thrilling to goof off while my editor has his back turned, but also exhausting… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
担当の目を盗み仕事の合間をぬって遊ぶのは、スリルがあるけど疲れるネ…。<明>
It’s thrilling to goof off while my editor has his back turned, but also exhausting… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年の健康診断は異常は無かったけど煙草をへらすように言われた！ガクッ！！<明> They didn’t find anything wrong in my physical exam this year, but they told me to cut down on cigarettes! Ack!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年の健康診断は異常は無かったけど煙草をへらすように言われた！ガクッ！！<明>
They didn’t find anything wrong in my physical exam this year, but they told me to cut down on cigarettes! Ack!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 寒くなったのでコタツで仕事。あったかいけど、つい寝てしまうんだよね。<明> Now that it’s gotten cold, I sit at the kotatsu while I work. It’s nice and warm, but I keep falling asleep. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
寒くなったのでコタツで仕事。あったかいけど、つい寝てしまうんだよね。<明>
Now that it’s gotten cold, I sit at the kotatsu while I work. It’s nice and warm, but I keep falling asleep. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 赤塚賞の審査をさせて頂きました。若い人の作品に、大いに刺激を受けました<明> I got to be one of the judges for the Akatsuka Award. Seeing these young people’s work has really inspired me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
赤塚賞の審査をさせて頂きました。若い人の作品に、大いに刺激を受けました<明>
I got to be one of the judges for the Akatsuka Award. Seeing these young people’s work has really inspired me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 武道会のあとの展開を考えています　面白いハズだからワクワクまってて！！<明> I’m thinking up the plot developments for after the tournament. It should be interesting, so look forward to it!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
武道会のあとの展開を考えています　面白いハズだからワクワクまってて！！<明>
I’m thinking up the plot developments for after the tournament. It should be interesting, so look forward to it!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年末はとても忙しい。ワクワクの正月休みをめざして、もうひとがんばりじゃ<明> I’m having a very busy year’s end. I just gotta hang in there a little longer to get to my New Year’s break. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年末はとても忙しい。ワクワクの正月休みをめざして、もうひとがんばりじゃ<明>
I’m having a very busy year’s end. I just gotta hang in there a little longer to get to my New Year’s break. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ジャッキーの「ポリスストーリー」をみる　「プロジェクトＡ」と並ぶ傑作だ!! <明> Saw Jackie Chan’s Police Story . It’s a masterpiece alongside Project A !! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ジャッキーの「ポリスストーリー」をみる　「プロジェクトＡ」と並ぶ傑作だ!! <明>
Saw Jackie Chan’s Police Story. It’s a masterpiece alongside Project A!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ネコ嫌いの松山君に内緒でネコ飼っていたのが発覚！！す…すいません…許して＜明＞ My cat-hating assistant Matsuyama- kun has discovered that I’ve been secretly keeping one!! I… I’m sorry… Please forgive me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ネコ嫌いの松山君に内緒でネコ飼っていたのが発覚！！す…すいません…許して＜明＞
My cat-hating assistant Matsuyama-kun has discovered that I’ve been secretly keeping one!! I… I’m sorry… Please forgive me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 知多半島にイキのいい魚を食べに！ネコも一緒にくれば喜んだのに…。＜明＞ Went to Chita Peninsula to eat some fresh fish! I bet my cat would have been happy if I’d taken her along… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
知多半島にイキのいい魚を食べに！ネコも一緒にくれば喜んだのに…。＜明＞
Went to Chita Peninsula to eat some fresh fish! I bet my cat would have been happy if I’d taken her along… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あちこちドライブへ行き、プラモもたくさんつくり、もちろん仕事もこなし…いやあ、ハードなお正月でした！＜明＞ Driving all over the place, making lots of plastic models, and of course keeping up with work… Man, what a hard New Year’s it’s been! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あちこちドライブへ行き、プラモもたくさんつくり、もちろん仕事もこなし…いやあ、ハードなお正月でした！＜明＞
Driving all over the place, making lots of plastic models, and of course keeping up with work… Man, what a hard New Year’s it’s been! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: なぜかスーパーマーケットに行くのが大好き。奥様に喜んでいただいてます。＜明＞ For some reason I love going to the supermarket. It really makes my wife happy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
なぜかスーパーマーケットに行くのが大好き。奥様に喜んでいただいてます。＜明＞
For some reason I love going to the supermarket. It really makes my wife happy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 伊豆にドライブ。のんびり温泉に入って富士の山に見とれるオッサンの一日＜明＞ Drove to Izu. Relaxed in the hot springs and looked at Mount Fuji: just another day in the life of an old fogey. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
伊豆にドライブ。のんびり温泉に入って富士の山に見とれるオッサンの一日＜明＞
Drove to Izu. Relaxed in the hot springs and looked at Mount Fuji: just another day in the life of an old fogey. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: プラモ改造コンテストの締切り間近で大忙し！休みを全部つぎこむつもり！！＜明＞ The deadline for the figure modification contest is coming up, so I’m super busy! I plan to sink my whole vacation into it!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
プラモ改造コンテストの締切り間近で大忙し！休みを全部つぎこむつもり！！＜明＞
The deadline for the figure modification contest is coming up, so I’m super busy! I plan to sink my whole vacation into it!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年賀状たくさんありがとう！！みんながんばって寅年を乗り切って下さいね！！＜明＞ Thanks for all the New Year’s cards!! Let’s all do our best to get through the Year of the Tiger!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年賀状たくさんありがとう！！みんながんばって寅年を乗り切って下さいね！！＜明＞
Thanks for all the New Year’s cards!! Let’s all do our best to get through the Year of the Tiger!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事と模型コンテストのしめ切りと弟の結婚式、友人の結婚式などでもう大変。でもアニメだけは必ず見るぞ！＜明＞ Things are ridiculously hectic, what with my work and plastic model contest deadlines, my younger brother’s wedding, and my friend’s wedding. But I’ll definitely watch the anime’s premiere, no matter what! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事と模型コンテストのしめ切りと弟の結婚式、友人の結婚式などでもう大変。でもアニメだけは必ず見るぞ！＜明＞
Things are ridiculously hectic, what with my work and plastic model contest deadlines, my younger brother’s wedding, and my friend’s wedding. But I’ll definitely watch the anime’s premiere, no matter what! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 26日から、DRAGON BALLのアニメが開始！　ボクもワクワクしてます ＜明＞ The Dragon Ball anime begins on the 26th! Even I’m excited. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
26日から、DRAGON BALLのアニメが開始！　ボクもワクワクしてます ＜明＞
The Dragon Ball anime begins on the 26th! Even I’m excited. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: マッスルタワー決戦終了後の舞台を思案中。冒険漫画は大変だけど楽しいネ！＜明＞ I’m currently thinking up what the next setting will be after the Muscle Tower climax wraps up. Doing an adventure manga is tough, but fun! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
マッスルタワー決戦終了後の舞台を思案中。冒険漫画は大変だけど楽しいネ！＜明＞
I’m currently thinking up what the next setting will be after the Muscle Tower climax wraps up. Doing an adventure manga is tough, but fun! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: このところ忙しくてファミコンもバイクもおあずけ！　うっく…苦しい！！＜明＞ I’m so busy lately I don’t have time for my Famicom or motorbike! Ugh… I can’t stand it!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
このところ忙しくてファミコンもバイクもおあずけ！　うっく…苦しい！！＜明＞
I’m so busy lately I don’t have time for my Famicom or motorbike! Ugh… I can’t stand it!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 忙しくて映画はビデオで見ることが多いが、やっぱし映画館で観んとアカンな ＜明＞ Since I’m so busy, I usually can only watch movies on video, but nothing really compares to seeing them in an actual theater. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
忙しくて映画はビデオで見ることが多いが、やっぱし映画館で観んとアカンな ＜明＞
Since I’m so busy, I usually can only watch movies on video, but nothing really compares to seeing them in an actual theater. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 春はスキなんだけど花粉アレルギーでくしゃみが出て大変！とってもつらい…＜明＞ I like spring, but thanks to my pollen allergy I sneeze up a storm! It’s really rough… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
春はスキなんだけど花粉アレルギーでくしゃみが出て大変！とってもつらい…＜明＞
I like spring, but thanks to my pollen allergy I sneeze up a storm! It’s really rough… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: プラ模の人形コンテストでなんと金賞をもらいました。うれしいもんですネ ＜明＞ I actually won some prize money in that plastic model contest. I’m so happy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
プラ模の人形コンテストでなんと金賞をもらいました。うれしいもんですネ ＜明＞
I actually won some prize money in that plastic model contest. I’m so happy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 近頃、禁煙の貼り紙がやたらめだつ。愛煙家のボクとしては余計ムカムカ！！＜明＞ Recently I’ve been noticing all the “No Smoking” signs around. As a smoking aficionado it really bugs me!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
近頃、禁煙の貼り紙がやたらめだつ。愛煙家のボクとしては余計ムカムカ！！＜明＞
Recently I’ve been noticing all the “No Smoking” signs around. As a smoking aficionado it really bugs me!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 京都、太秦撮影所に行って、殿様の格好をしました。気もちよかったよ～！＜明＞ I went to Uzumasa Studios in Kyoto, and dressed up as a feudal lord. It felt great~! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
京都、太秦撮影所に行って、殿様の格好をしました。気もちよかったよ～！＜明＞
I went to Uzumasa Studios in Kyoto, and dressed up as a feudal lord. It felt great~! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アニメ大行進･静岡にいきます。ボクは今から緊張気味。よかったらきてネ！＜明＞ I’ll be going to the Shizuoka leg of the Anime Parade. I’m starting to feel really pumped for it. Come too if you want! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アニメ大行進･静岡にいきます。ボクは今から緊張気味。よかったらきてネ！＜明＞
I’ll be going to the Shizuoka leg of the Anime Parade. I’m starting to feel really pumped for it. Come too if you want! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 待望のG･W（ゴールデンウィーク）！！行楽に出かける人の笑顔を横目に、ボクは家で仕事です…。＜明＞ Golden Week is finally here!! From the corner of my eye I can see the smiling faces of people going out to have fun, while I sit here inside, working… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
待望のG･W（ゴールデンウィーク）！！行楽に出かける人の笑顔を横目に、ボクは家で仕事です…。＜明＞
Golden Week is finally here!! From the corner of my eye I can see the smiling faces of people going out to have fun, while I sit here inside, working… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 青い空と海ひょひょいと伸びたヤシの木。やっぱ南の島、ええのう…いきたい！＜明＞ Coconut trees stretching out between a blue ocean and blue sky. Southern isles sure are swell… I wanna go! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
青い空と海ひょひょいと伸びたヤシの木。やっぱ南の島、ええのう…いきたい！＜明＞
Coconut trees stretching out between a blue ocean and blue sky. Southern isles sure are swell… I wanna go! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ドラゴンクエストはやばい！仕事ができなくなるので奥さんにとりあげられた ＜明＞ Dragon Quest is dangerous! It got to the point where I couldn’t get any work done, so my wife finally took it away. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ドラゴンクエストはやばい！仕事ができなくなるので奥さんにとりあげられた ＜明＞
Dragon Quest is dangerous! It got to the point where I couldn’t get any work done, so my wife finally took it away. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 6月10日にコミックスの3巻が出ます！　おこづかいに余裕のあるあなた、よろしくお買い求めください。＜明＞ The 3rd volume of the Comics comes out June 10th! You’ve got plenty of allowance money: go out and buy it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
6月10日にコミックスの3巻が出ます！　おこづかいに余裕のあるあなた、よろしくお買い求めください。＜明＞
The 3rd volume of the Comics comes out June 10th! You’ve got plenty of allowance money: go out and buy it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 映画館の席にすわりポップコーンとコーラを手に上映を待つこの時間がいい！＜明＞ Sitting in the movie theater, popcorn and soda in hand, waiting for the film to start: that’s the moment I love! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
映画館の席にすわりポップコーンとコーラを手に上映を待つこの時間がいい！＜明＞
Sitting in the movie theater, popcorn and soda in hand, waiting for the film to start: that’s the moment I love! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アニメ大行進の名古屋大会に新沢先生と一緒にでます。東海の皆様，応募を！＜明＞ I’ll be appearing with Shinzawa- sensei at the Nagoya Leg of the Anime Parade. Everyone in the Tokai region, please apply! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アニメ大行進の名古屋大会に新沢先生と一緒にでます。東海の皆様，応募を！＜明＞
I’ll be appearing with Shinzawa-sensei at the Nagoya Leg of the Anime Parade. Everyone in the Tokai region, please apply! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 只今、31号のオールカラーで死んでます。終わった後のドライブが心の支え ＜明＞ I practically killed myself doing the full-color chapter for issue 31. I took a drive after finishing up to boost my morale. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
只今、31号のオールカラーで死んでます。終わった後のドライブが心の支え ＜明＞
I practically killed myself doing the full-color chapter for issue 31. I took a drive after finishing up to boost my morale. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりの休みを南の島で優雅に！…と思っていたのに、猫のお産でパーに…＜明＞ For my latest vacation, I planned on living it up on some southern isle… but my cat’s pregnancy has scuttled those plans… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりの休みを南の島で優雅に！…と思っていたのに、猫のお産でパーに…＜明＞
For my latest vacation, I planned on living it up on some southern isle… but my cat’s pregnancy has scuttled those plans… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やったぜ！９日間のお休み！でも猫の出産間近で、どこにもでかけられない！＜明＞ Yes! I’ve got a 9 day vacation! But my cat’s about to give birth, so I can’t really go anywhere! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やったぜ！９日間のお休み！でも猫の出産間近で、どこにもでかけられない！＜明＞
Yes! I’ve got a 9 day vacation! But my cat’s about to give birth, so I can’t really go anywhere! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 世界民族博物館にいってきました。ドライブがてらいろんな生活ぶりを観察してきたので漫画の参考にしたいです ＜明＞ While out on a drive I dropped by the world folk museum, and checked out various different lifestyles. It’ll make good reference material for my manga. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
世界民族博物館にいってきました。ドライブがてらいろんな生活ぶりを観察してきたので漫画の参考にしたいです ＜明＞
While out on a drive I dropped by the world folk museum, and checked out various different lifestyles. It’ll make good reference material for my manga. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 愛猫コゲの出産がせまりドキドキして落ちつかない。はっきりいって情けない ＜明＞ My cat Koge is about to give birth. I’m really excited and can’t settle down. Which, honestly, is kinda pathetic. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
愛猫コゲの出産がせまりドキドキして落ちつかない。はっきりいって情けない ＜明＞
My cat Koge is about to give birth. I’m really excited and can’t settle down. Which, honestly, is kinda pathetic. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 愛猫コゲが待望の子供を４匹産みました。かわいくて毎日成長が楽しみです。＜明＞ My cat Koge has finally given birth to 4 kittens. They’re cute, and I look forward to watching them grow each day. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
愛猫コゲが待望の子供を４匹産みました。かわいくて毎日成長が楽しみです。＜明＞
My cat Koge has finally given birth to 4 kittens. They’re cute, and I look forward to watching them grow each day. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 両親が旅行中で約300の盆栽の水やりはボクの役目！ホントに情けないよ！＜明＞ My parents are on vacation, so it’s up to me to water their 300 Bonsai trees! This is really pathetic! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
両親が旅行中で約300の盆栽の水やりはボクの役目！ホントに情けないよ！＜明＞
My parents are on vacation, so it’s up to me to water their 300 Bonsai trees! This is really pathetic! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: すっごく久しぶりにツーリングに行った。帰ったら体ギクシャク、年だなあ。＜明＞ I went out bike-riding for the first time in a really, really long time. When I got back my body was aching. I’m at that age. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
すっごく久しぶりにツーリングに行った。帰ったら体ギクシャク、年だなあ。＜明＞
I went out bike-riding for the first time in a really, really long time. When I got back my body was aching. I’m at that age. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 朝もはやくから、田宮模型さんと一緒に米軍基地へ取材に行ってきたよ。あまりの迫力にただ圧倒された。＜明＞ Early in the morning, I went with someone from Tamiya Plastic Models to research an American military base. I was blown away, it was just that impressive. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
朝もはやくから、田宮模型さんと一緒に米軍基地へ取材に行ってきたよ。あまりの迫力にただ圧倒された。＜明＞
Early in the morning, I went with someone from Tamiya Plastic Models to research an American military base. I was blown away, it was just that impressive. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 名古屋の暑さは必殺技！！でもインドよりはマシかも…とただガマンガマン。＜明＞ Nagoya’s heat is deadly!! But it’s probably better than India… so I guess I’ll just put up with it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
名古屋の暑さは必殺技！！でもインドよりはマシかも…とただガマンガマン。＜明＞
Nagoya’s heat is deadly!! But it’s probably better than India… so I guess I’ll just put up with it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: なまった体力をとり戻そうと、自転車にでも乗ることに…。さて続くかなあ。＜明＞ I wanna get my strength back, so I should probably start riding my bike or something. I wonder if I can keep it up? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
なまった体力をとり戻そうと、自転車にでも乗ることに…。さて続くかなあ。＜明＞
I wanna get my strength back, so I should probably start riding my bike or something. I wonder if I can keep it up? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: プールに行く時間がない。しかたなく犬と一緒にタライで水浴び。情けない。＜明＞ I don’t have time to go to the pool. Instead I’m stuck playing in the washbasin with my dog. Pathetic. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
プールに行く時間がない。しかたなく犬と一緒にタライで水浴び。情けない。＜明＞
I don’t have time to go to the pool. Instead I’m stuck playing in the washbasin with my dog. Pathetic. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あまりアニメを見ない僕でも天空の城のラピュタにはとてもワクワクした！＜明＞ I don’t watch too much animation, but even I really got a thrill out of Laputa: Castle in the Sky ! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あまりアニメを見ない僕でも天空の城のラピュタにはとてもワクワクした！＜明＞
I don’t watch too much animation, but even I really got a thrill out of Laputa: Castle in the Sky! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ヤギも飼ってみたいけど親父の盆栽を食べてしまうので飼えない。とても残念。＜明＞ I wanna try raising a goat, but it would probably eat my dad’s Bonsai trees, so I guess that’s a no-go. It’s too bad. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ヤギも飼ってみたいけど親父の盆栽を食べてしまうので飼えない。とても残念。＜明＞
I wanna try raising a goat, but it would probably eat my dad’s Bonsai trees, so I guess that’s a no-go. It’s too bad. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 自転車で近所をウロウロバイクとは違った面白さがあって、これもまた楽し！＜明＞ Riding around my neighborhood on a bike is different than with my motorbike, but interesting in its own way. It’s more fun! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
自転車で近所をウロウロバイクとは違った面白さがあって、これもまた楽し！＜明＞
Riding around my neighborhood on a bike is different than with my motorbike, but interesting in its own way. It’s more fun! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: コゲの子ども４匹のうち３匹が ゆくえ 不明に…。ショックで仕事が手につかない！　早くもどっておいでよ!!＜明＞ 3 of Koge’s 4 kittens have gone missing… I’m so shocked I can hardly focus on work! Please come back soon!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
コゲの子ども４匹のうち３匹がゆくえ不明に…。ショックで仕事が手につかない！　早くもどっておいでよ!!＜明＞
3 of Koge’s 4 kittens have gone missing… I’m so shocked I can hardly focus on work! Please come back soon!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事ばかりの毎日では、いい作品はできない！！忙しくても意地で休むぞっ！！＜明＞ I can’t produce quality material if I do nothing but work every day!! Even when I’m busy, I’ll always take breaks!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事ばかりの毎日では、いい作品はできない！！忙しくても意地で休むぞっ！！＜明＞
I can’t produce quality material if I do nothing but work every day!! Even when I’m busy, I’ll always take breaks!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: No.49の本誌読切とその後の沖縄旅行─てことは信じられない忙しい毎日です。＜明＞ Between the deadline for issue #49 and my upcoming trip to Okinawa, every day is unbelievably busy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
No.49の本誌読切とその後の沖縄旅行─てことは信じられない忙しい毎日です。＜明＞
Between the deadline for issue #49 and my upcoming trip to Okinawa, every day is unbelievably busy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 49号でかく読切のため、スケジュールをつめています。毎日が仕事場トホホ…＜明＞ My schedule is really packed because of the one-shot I’m drawing for Issue #49. I have to work every day! Waah… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
49号でかく読切のため、スケジュールをつめています。毎日が仕事場トホホ…＜明＞
My schedule is really packed because of the one-shot I’m drawing for Issue #49. I have to work every day! Waah… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 沖縄の小浜島にきてますのんびり海に浮いていると帰りたくなくなるなあ。…＜明＞ Once I get out to Kohama Island in Okinawa and relax out in the sea, I’ll probably lose all desire to ever come back… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
沖縄の小浜島にきてますのんびり海に浮いていると帰りたくなくなるなあ。…＜明＞
Once I get out to Kohama Island in Okinawa and relax out in the sea, I’ll probably lose all desire to ever come back… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: おしりにおできができました。手術をしたので立って原稿を書いてます…。＜明＞ I got a boil on my butt, so I had surgery. Now I’m drawing my manuscript standing up… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
おしりにおできができました。手術をしたので立って原稿を書いてます…。＜明＞
I got a boil on my butt, so I had surgery. Now I’m drawing my manuscript standing up… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 連載と読切と おしり のおできが重なって久しぶりに地獄を見た！　必死で描いたミスター・ 賀 （ ホー ） 、読んでちょ！＜明＞ Between my regular serialization schedule, my one-shot, and the boil on my butt, I can’t remember the last time things were this Hellish! It took all I had to draw Mr. Hō , so please read it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
連載と読切とおしりのおできが重なって久しぶりに地獄を見た！　必死で描いたミスター・賀（ホー）、読んでちょ！＜明＞
Between my regular serialization schedule, my one-shot, and the boil on my butt, I can’t remember the last time things were this Hellish! It took all I had to draw Mr. Hō, so please read it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: スケジュールのカレンダーとにらめっこしながら来年のカレンダー絵執筆中！＜明＞ As I stare at my schedule calendar, I’m making the calendar picture for next year! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
スケジュールのカレンダーとにらめっこしながら来年のカレンダー絵執筆中！＜明＞
As I stare at my schedule calendar, I’m making the calendar picture for next year! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 19日発売のスーパージャンプで４コマ漫画を少しかいてます　みてやってちょ。＜明＞ I’ve drawn a 4-panel manga for the Super Jump going on sale the 19th, so please check it out. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
19日発売のスーパージャンプで４コマ漫画を少しかいてます　みてやってちょ。＜明＞
I’ve drawn a 4-panel manga for the Super Jump going on sale the 19th, so please check it out. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 耳をかくのがくせ。愛用の耳かきがみつからないと仕事もはかどりません！！＜明＞ I compulsively clean my ears. If I can’t find my favorite ear pick, I can’t get any work done!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
耳をかくのがくせ。愛用の耳かきがみつからないと仕事もはかどりません！！＜明＞
I compulsively clean my ears. If I can’t find my favorite ear pick, I can’t get any work done!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近、竹馬を買ってきた。さっそくコツコツ歩きまわっていたら悪ガキの頃を思い出した。＜明＞ I bought some stilts recently. Once I started clattering around on them, I instantly remembered my days as a little brat. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近、竹馬を買ってきた。さっそくコツコツ歩きまわっていたら悪ガキの頃を思い出した。＜明＞
I bought some stilts recently. Once I started clattering around on them, I instantly remembered my days as a little brat. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アシスタントの松山くんが結婚　これからは仕事で遅くならないようにしてあげないとなあ。＜明＞ My assistant Matsuyama- kun ’s getting married. She’d better make sure he’s on time for work. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アシスタントの松山くんが結婚　これからは仕事で遅くならないようにしてあげないとなあ。＜明＞
My assistant Matsuyama-kun’s getting married. She’d better make sure he’s on time for work. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 苦労してかきおろしたカレンダーはいかがでしたか。一年間、壁にはって使ってやって下さい ＜明＞ How’s the calendar? It was a real pain drawing it. Please keep it up on your wall all through the year. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
苦労してかきおろしたカレンダーはいかがでしたか。一年間、壁にはって使ってやって下さい ＜明＞
How’s the calendar? It was a real pain drawing it. Please keep it up on your wall all through the year. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あけましておめでとう。年の暮れから新年にかけて飲めない酒を飲み続けてフラフラなのだ。＜明＞ Happy New Year. From the end of the old year on through the beginning of the new, I’ve kept on drinking alcohol, which I can’t tolerate. My head is swimming. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あけましておめでとう。年の暮れから新年にかけて飲めない酒を飲み続けてフラフラなのだ。＜明＞
Happy New Year. From the end of the old year on through the beginning of the new, I’ve kept on drinking alcohol, which I can’t tolerate. My head is swimming. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: コゲに続いて奥様も妊娠。のんきに遊びにくくなることを考えると、嬉しいやら悲しいやら…＜明＞ First, my cat Koge was pregnant, and now, my wife is. Thinking about how hard it will be for me to just relax and goof off from now on, I’m happy of course, but sad too… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
コゲに続いて奥様も妊娠。のんきに遊びにくくなることを考えると、嬉しいやら悲しいやら…＜明＞
First, my cat Koge was pregnant, and now, my wife is. Thinking about how hard it will be for me to just relax and goof off from now on, I’m happy of course, but sad too… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ファミコンのドラゴンクエストⅡは面白すぎて仕事にならないので、しまっちゃいました！＜明＞ Dragon Quest II on the Famicom is too much fun! Now I can’t get any work done! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ファミコンのドラゴンクエストⅡは面白すぎて仕事にならないので、しまっちゃいました！＜明＞
Dragon Quest II on the Famicom is too much fun! Now I can’t get any work done! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 次のスーパージャンプに短い読切かきます。かきたいものがたくさんあって迷っています。＜明＞ I’m drawing a short one-shot for the next Super Jump . There are so many things I want to draw, I can’t make up my mind. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
次のスーパージャンプに短い読切かきます。かきたいものがたくさんあって迷っています。＜明＞
I’m drawing a short one-shot for the next Super Jump. There are so many things I want to draw, I can’t make up my mind. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 遅くなったけど沢山の年賀状ありがとう！！どれも一所懸命かいてあって感激しました ＜明＞ I’m a bit late, but thanks for all the New Year’s cards!! I’m moved by how much effort you all put into them. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
遅くなったけど沢山の年賀状ありがとう！！どれも一所懸命かいてあって感激しました ＜明＞
I’m a bit late, but thanks for all the New Year’s cards!! I’m moved by how much effort you all put into them. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 我が家に侵入してくる大きなドラ猫とコゲがいつもケンカ。うるさいけど、ほうっておく。＜明＞ Koge is always fighting with a big stray cat that sneaks into our home. They’re noisy, but I let them be. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
我が家に侵入してくる大きなドラ猫とコゲがいつもケンカ。うるさいけど、ほうっておく。＜明＞
Koge is always fighting with a big stray cat that sneaks into our home. They’re noisy, but I let them be. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事の締切と模型コンテストの締切。締切の連続なんて、自分はマゾないかと思えてくる ＜明＞ I’ve got work deadlines and plastic model contest deadlines. With this string of deadlines, I’m starting to think I might be a masochist. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事の締切と模型コンテストの締切。締切の連続なんて、自分はマゾないかと思えてくる ＜明＞
I’ve got work deadlines and plastic model contest deadlines. With this string of deadlines, I’m starting to think I might be a masochist. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やはり夜じゃないと仕事がはかどらない。でも睡眠はいつでもできてしまう困ったもんだ！＜明＞ Like I thought, I can’t get any work done except at night. But then I’m always falling asleep. What a pain! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やはり夜じゃないと仕事がはかどらない。でも睡眠はいつでもできてしまう困ったもんだ！＜明＞
Like I thought, I can’t get any work done except at night. But then I’m always falling asleep. What a pain! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 奥様の出産が近づいてきた。平気な顔をしているけれど内心ドキドキのわたし。情けない！！＜明＞ It’s getting close to when my wife will give birth. I try to look calm, but inside I’m a ball of nerves. Pathetic!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
奥様の出産が近づいてきた。平気な顔をしているけれど内心ドキドキのわたし。情けない！！＜明＞
It’s getting close to when my wife will give birth. I try to look calm, but inside I’m a ball of nerves. Pathetic!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週は間違って１Ｐ多くかいちゃったんで扉ページは無し。でも１Ｐ多く楽しめるから許して ＜明＞ This week I goofed up and drew an extra page of story, so now there’s no title page. But you can all enjoy the extra page, so please forgive me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週は間違って１Ｐ多くかいちゃったんで扉ページは無し。でも１Ｐ多く楽しめるから許して ＜明＞
This week I goofed up and drew an extra page of story, so now there’s no title page. But you can all enjoy the extra page, so please forgive me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 子供の名前を必死で考えてます漫画のネームを考えるより、ずっと大変で、とても頭痛いです ＜明＞ I’m desperately trying to think up a name for my child. It’s way worse than coming up with manga storyboards, and is giving me a killer headache. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
子供の名前を必死で考えてます漫画のネームを考えるより、ずっと大変で、とても頭痛いです ＜明＞
I’m desperately trying to think up a name for my child. It’s way worse than coming up with manga storyboards, and is giving me a killer headache. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 太ってる太ってるといわれ、さすがに気になりだした　天気の良い日、少し遠くまで散歩しよう ＜明＞ People keep telling me I’m getting fat, and it’s really starting to get to me. When the weather’s good, I plan on going out for a moderately-lengthy walk. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
太ってる太ってるといわれ、さすがに気になりだした　天気の良い日、少し遠くまで散歩しよう ＜明＞
People keep telling me I’m getting fat, and it’s really starting to get to me. When the weather’s good, I plan on going out for a moderately-lengthy walk. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 親戚の子供はボクを単に、DRAGONBALLの似顔絵がうまいおじさんだと思っている ＜明＞ One of my relatives’ kids thinks that I’m just this old guy who’s really good at Dragon Ball fanart. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
親戚の子供はボクを単に、DRAGONBALLの似顔絵がうまいおじさんだと思っている ＜明＞
One of my relatives’ kids thinks that I’m just this old guy who’s really good at Dragon Ball fanart. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 忙しすぎて体を動かすのは、庭で犬と遊ぶ時ぐらい。天気がいいと、外に出たくて体ムズムズ ＜明＞ I’m so busy that just about the only time I’m really active is when playing with my dog in the yard. When the weather’s nice and I go outside, my body feels really sluggish. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
忙しすぎて体を動かすのは、庭で犬と遊ぶ時ぐらい。天気がいいと、外に出たくて体ムズムズ ＜明＞
I’m so busy that just about the only time I’m really active is when playing with my dog in the yard. When the weather’s nice and I go outside, my body feels really sluggish. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 3月23日に、待望の男の子が生まれました。名前は佐助。大きな泣き声が、とても頼もしいぞ ＜明＞ On March 23 rd , my baby boy was born. His name is Sasuke. He cries so loud, he seems like a promising lad. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
3月23日に、待望の男の子が生まれました。名前は佐助。大きな泣き声が、とても頼もしいぞ ＜明＞
On March 23rd, my baby boy was born. His name is Sasuke. He cries so loud, he seems like a promising lad. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 近頃おもしろいテレビ番組がへってきたような気がします。おかげで仕事がはかどる…かな？＜明＞ I get the feeling that lately the number of good TV shows has dropped off. But thanks to that, I can get more work done… I guess? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
近頃おもしろいテレビ番組がへってきたような気がします。おかげで仕事がはかどる…かな？＜明＞
I get the feeling that lately the number of good TV shows has dropped off. But thanks to that, I can get more work done… I guess? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 何ヶ月ぶりかでお酒を飲んだらコップ一杯で頭がグラグラ。ここまで弱いとは思わなかった！＜明＞ I had alcohol for the first time in who knows how many months, and after just one drink my head was reeling. I didn’t think my tolerance was this low! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
何ヶ月ぶりかでお酒を飲んだらコップ一杯で頭がグラグラ。ここまで弱いとは思わなかった！＜明＞
I had alcohol for the first time in who knows how many months, and after just one drink my head was reeling. I didn’t think my tolerance was this low! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 奥さんも生まれた子供もなかなか帰ってきません。部屋がガランとして、ちょっと淋しいな。＜明＞ My wife and child still aren’t back from the hospital. It’s kinda lonesome here in these empty rooms. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
奥さんも生まれた子供もなかなか帰ってきません。部屋がガランとして、ちょっと淋しいな。＜明＞
My wife and child still aren’t back from the hospital. It’s kinda lonesome here in these empty rooms. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 帰ってくる赤ん坊のために部屋を改装中。煙草で黄ばんだ部屋もすっかりきれいになった。＜明＞ I’m remodeling the room right now before the baby gets here. It used to be stained yellow from tobacco, but it’s all nice and pretty now. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
帰ってくる赤ん坊のために部屋を改装中。煙草で黄ばんだ部屋もすっかりきれいになった。＜明＞
I’m remodeling the room right now before the baby gets here. It used to be stained yellow from tobacco, but it’s all nice and pretty now. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: バリ島から親友のワヤンがやってきた。とんちんかんな彼の行動に、みんなで大笑いの毎日…＜明＞ My good friend Wayan has come from Bali. Every day we all have a big laugh at his various antics… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
バリ島から親友のワヤンがやってきた。とんちんかんな彼の行動に、みんなで大笑いの毎日…＜明＞
My good friend Wayan has come from Bali. Every day we all have a big laugh at his various antics… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近赤ン坊の“佐助”ばかりかわいがるので、猫のコゲが 私 （ わたくし ） にやきもちをやいて困ってます。＜明＞ Since lately I’ve only been paying attention to my baby son Sasuke, my cat Koge has been acting jealous. I don’t know what to do. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近赤ン坊の“佐助”ばかりかわいがるので、猫のコゲが私（わたくし）にやきもちをやいて困ってます。＜明＞
Since lately I’ve only been paying attention to my baby son Sasuke, my cat Koge has been acting jealous. I don’t know what to do. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アシスタント募集します。楽しく明るい漫画のスキな20歳前後の方、編集の鳥嶋氏へＴＥＬを ＜明＞ Taking applications for an assistant. Anyone around 20 who’s fun, cheerful, and loves manga, please telephone my editor Torishima. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アシスタント募集します。楽しく明るい漫画のスキな20歳前後の方、編集の鳥嶋氏へＴＥＬを ＜明＞
Taking applications for an assistant. Anyone around 20 who’s fun, cheerful, and loves manga, please telephone my editor Torishima. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 明るい楽しい漫画のスキなアシスタントを募集します　編集･鳥嶋氏へお電話してください。＜明＞ Looking for a fun, cheerful, manga-loving assistant. Please phone my editor, Torishima. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
明るい楽しい漫画のスキなアシスタントを募集します　編集･鳥嶋氏へお電話してください。＜明＞
Looking for a fun, cheerful, manga-loving assistant. Please phone my editor, Torishima. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近忙しくて行けなかったスーパーに久しぶりに行ったら嬉しくてたくさん買い物をした…。＜明＞ Recently I’ve been too busy to go to the supermarket, so when I finally managed to get down there I was so happy that I bought lots of stuff… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近忙しくて行けなかったスーパーに久しぶりに行ったら嬉しくてたくさん買い物をした…。＜明＞
Recently I’ve been too busy to go to the supermarket, so when I finally managed to get down there I was so happy that I bought lots of stuff… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 暑い。でも赤ン坊がいるので、クーラーは使えず。であけた窓からは、蚊が大量に侵入中…！＜明＞ It’s hot. But I’ve got a baby here, so I can’t use the air conditioner. So I opened the window, and now tons of mosquitoes are invading…! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
暑い。でも赤ン坊がいるので、クーラーは使えず。であけた窓からは、蚊が大量に侵入中…！＜明＞
It’s hot. But I’ve got a baby here, so I can’t use the air conditioner. So I opened the window, and now tons of mosquitoes are invading…! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 暑かったり寒かったりで風邪をひいて頭がボーッ。で、ページ数をまちがえてしまった。トホホ。＜明＞ Going from hot weather to cold weather and back again has given me a cold. Now I’m all groggy, and I messed up the number of pages. Woe is me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
暑かったり寒かったりで風邪をひいて頭がボーッ。で、ページ数をまちがえてしまった。トホホ。＜明＞
Going from hot weather to cold weather and back again has given me a cold. Now I’m all groggy, and I messed up the number of pages. Woe is me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アシスタントの松山くんの猫ぎらいが直ってきた。だからコゲも自由に家の中を歩き廻ってる ＜明＞ My assistant Matsuyama- kun has gotten over his hatred of cats, so now Koge can walk around the house freely. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アシスタントの松山くんの猫ぎらいが直ってきた。だからコゲも自由に家の中を歩き廻ってる ＜明＞
My assistant Matsuyama-kun has gotten over his hatred of cats, so now Koge can walk around the house freely. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事のあいまに、赤ン坊のおしめをかえたり、お風呂にいれたりと、けっこう父親してます。＜明＞ In between my work duties, I’ll change my baby’s diapers, bathe him, and whatnot. Boy, I really am a father. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事のあいまに、赤ン坊のおしめをかえたり、お風呂にいれたりと、けっこう父親してます。＜明＞
In between my work duties, I’ll change my baby’s diapers, bathe him, and whatnot. Boy, I really am a father. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ８月９日東京に行きます。セミナー参加したい方、今すぐハガキ送れば、まだまにあうみたい ＜明＞ I’m going to Tokyo on August 9th to give a seminar. If anyone wants to participate, their postcards should still get in on time if they send them right away. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
８月９日東京に行きます。セミナー参加したい方、今すぐハガキ送れば、まだまにあうみたい ＜明＞
I’m going to Tokyo on August 9th to give a seminar. If anyone wants to participate, their postcards should still get in on time if they send them right away. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: もっと田舎へ引っ越したいと思ってます。もちろん家族にはナイショ。いつか実現したいなあ ＜明＞ I’m thinking of moving even further out into the boonies. Of course, I’m keeping this a secret from my family. I want to make this a reality someday. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
もっと田舎へ引っ越したいと思ってます。もちろん家族にはナイショ。いつか実現したいなあ ＜明＞
I’m thinking of moving even further out into the boonies. Of course, I’m keeping this a secret from my family. I want to make this a reality someday. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ヘビが一番古くからいる文鳥をのみこんで鳥カゴの中で動けなくなっていた文鳥がかわいそう ＜明＞ A snake has eaten the sparrow we’ve had the longest, and now all the other sparrows inside the birdcage are petrified. It’s so sad to see them like that. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ヘビが一番古くからいる文鳥をのみこんで鳥カゴの中で動けなくなっていた文鳥がかわいそう ＜明＞
A snake has eaten the sparrow we’ve had the longest, and now all the other sparrows inside the birdcage are petrified. It’s so sad to see them like that. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりに映画を見た。 Ａ．Ｓ． （ アメージングストーリー ） はなかなか面白かった　今度は、プロジェクトＡ２をみたいな。＜明＞ I saw a movie for the first time in a while: Amazing Stories . It was pretty interesting. Next time, I want to see Project A Part II . <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりに映画を見た。Ａ．Ｓ．（アメージングストーリー）はなかなか面白かった　今度は、プロジェクトＡ２をみたいな。＜明＞
I saw a movie for the first time in a while: Amazing Stories. It was pretty interesting. Next time, I want to see Project A Part II. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 読切「剣之介さま」とDRAGONBALLの２本立てでバテました。読切の感想、まってますよー。＜明＞ Doing both the one-shot Ken’nosuke-sama and a Dragon Ball chapter really wore me out. I’m waiting to hear what you think about this one-shot. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
読切「剣之介さま」とDRAGONBALLの２本立てでバテました。読切の感想、まってますよー。＜明＞
Doing both the one-shot Ken’nosuke-sama and a Dragon Ball chapter really wore me out. I’m waiting to hear what you think about this one-shot. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 庭で愛犬がほえるので行ってみたらデカイ亀がいた。逃がしてやったから玉手箱をくれんかな ＜明＞ My dog was barking out in the yard, so I went to see what was up and there was this gigantic turtle. I let it go free, so maybe I’ll get a Tamate-bako? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
庭で愛犬がほえるので行ってみたらデカイ亀がいた。逃がしてやったから玉手箱をくれんかな ＜明＞
My dog was barking out in the yard, so I went to see what was up and there was this gigantic turtle. I let it go free, so maybe I’ll get a Tamate-bako? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 忙しくて子供の相手をしていなかったら顔を忘れられてしまった。さてやっと相手ができそう ＜明＞ I’ve been so busy that I haven’t spent any time with my kid, and now he’s forgotten my face. It looks like I’ll finally have more time to spend with him, though. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
忙しくて子供の相手をしていなかったら顔を忘れられてしまった。さてやっと相手ができそう ＜明＞
I’ve been so busy that I haven’t spent any time with my kid, and now he’s forgotten my face. It looks like I’ll finally have more time to spend with him, though. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ドラゴンクエストⅢのモンスターをやっと全部かきおえた。ゲームはかなり面白そうだぞ！＜明＞ I’ve finally finished drawing all the monsters for Dragon Quest III . The game looks like a lot of fun! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ドラゴンクエストⅢのモンスターをやっと全部かきおえた。ゲームはかなり面白そうだぞ！＜明＞
I’ve finally finished drawing all the monsters for Dragon Quest III. The game looks like a lot of fun! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子の前でタバコを吸えないので、台所の換気扇の下で吸ってます。ホントつらいなあ～。＜明＞ I can’t smoke in front of my son, so instead I smoke under the vent in the kitchen. This is really rough. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子の前でタバコを吸えないので、台所の換気扇の下で吸ってます。ホントつらいなあ～。＜明＞
I can’t smoke in front of my son, so instead I smoke under the vent in the kitchen. This is really rough. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 必死にスケジュールをつめて仕事をしてます。人よりはるかに遅れた夏休みをとるために…＜明＞ I’ve been desperately working round the clock, all so that I can take my summer vacation, which is still way later than most people’s… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
必死にスケジュールをつめて仕事をしてます。人よりはるかに遅れた夏休みをとるために…＜明＞
I’ve been desperately working round the clock, all so that I can take my summer vacation, which is still way later than most people’s… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｆ－１ＧＰ（エフワングランプリ）が面白くテレビ中継を欠かさずみてます。レーサーはパワフルなマンセルがスキ。＜明＞ The F-1 Grand Prix is so much fun, haven’t missed a single live broadcast. My favorite racer is the powerful Nigel Mansell. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｆ－１ＧＰ（エフワングランプリ）が面白くテレビ中継を欠かさずみてます。レーサーはパワフルなマンセルがスキ。＜明＞
The F-1 Grand Prix is so much fun, haven’t missed a single live broadcast. My favorite racer is the powerful Nigel Mansell. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やっととれた６日間の休み。息子・佐助と一緒に、潮風を浴びながら、のんびり過ごしました ＜明＞ I finally got to take a 6 day vacation. I spent it relaxing with my son Sasuke, basking in the salty breeze. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やっととれた６日間の休み。息子・佐助と一緒に、潮風を浴びながら、のんびり過ごしました ＜明＞
I finally got to take a 6 day vacation. I spent it relaxing with my son Sasuke, basking in the salty breeze. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: せっかくのお休みは庭の盆栽に水をまくのでつぶれちゃった。親父が旅行になんか行くからだ ＜明＞ I spent my precious vacation sprinkling water over the Bonsai trees in the garden. All because my dad had to take a trip. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
せっかくのお休みは庭の盆栽に水をまくのでつぶれちゃった。親父が旅行になんか行くからだ ＜明＞
I spent my precious vacation sprinkling water over the Bonsai trees in the garden. All because my dad had to take a trip. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子も大きくなって外に出かけよう…というので、パワフルな４輪駆動の車を捜してます。＜明＞ “Our son’s gotten big, so why don’t we take him out?”… is the story, so now I’m looking for a powerful 4-wheel-drive vehicle. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子も大きくなって外に出かけよう…というので、パワフルな４輪駆動の車を捜してます。＜明＞
“Our son’s gotten big, so why don’t we take him out?”… is the story, so now I’m looking for a powerful 4-wheel-drive vehicle. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来週どうなるか、作者本人にもわかりません。だから毎週どうなるかドキドキしてかいてます ＜明＞ I may be the author, but even I don’t know what’s going to happen next week. That way, as I draw the story each week I stay excited, wondering how things will turn out. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来週どうなるか、作者本人にもわかりません。だから毎週どうなるかドキドキしてかいてます ＜明＞
I may be the author, but even I don’t know what’s going to happen next week. That way, as I draw the story each week I stay excited, wondering how things will turn out. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あったかいのをいいことに、半ソデ姿でいたら風邪をひいてしまった。ハークション。寒っ。＜明＞ Since it was warm out, I thought I’d wear short sleeves, and I ended up catching a cold. Ah-choo. I feel cold. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あったかいのをいいことに、半ソデ姿でいたら風邪をひいてしまった。ハークション。寒っ。＜明＞
Since it was warm out, I thought I’d wear short sleeves, and I ended up catching a cold. Ah-choo. I feel cold. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: さあ仕事と思ったらしっかり風邪をひいてしまってダルい。皆さんもお体をお大事に……。＜明＞ I was all raring to do some work, but then I came down with this awful cold and feel sluggish. Everyone, please take good care of your health…. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
さあ仕事と思ったらしっかり風邪をひいてしまってダルい。皆さんもお体をお大事に……。＜明＞
I was all raring to do some work, but then I came down with this awful cold and feel sluggish. Everyone, please take good care of your health…. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 明日18日Ｄ．Ｂ．冒険スペシャルの発売です。表紙から目次まで遊べる最高の増刊号をヨロシク ＜明＞ The Dragon Ball: Adventure Special goes on sale tomorrow, the 18th. It’s an awesome special issue, with fun and games from the cover all the way to the table of contents in the back. Please enjoy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
明日18日Ｄ．Ｂ．冒険スペシャルの発売です。表紙から目次まで遊べる最高の増刊号をヨロシク ＜明＞
The Dragon Ball: Adventure Special goes on sale tomorrow, the 18th. It’s an awesome special issue, with fun and games from the cover all the way to the table of contents in the back. Please enjoy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年末号でとっても楽しい読切をかくために、必死でスケジュールをつめてます。がんばるゾ！＜明＞ I’m working round-the-clock so that I can draw a fun one-shot for the end-of-year issue. I’ll give it my best! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年末号でとっても楽しい読切をかくために、必死でスケジュールをつめてます。がんばるゾ！＜明＞
I’m working round-the-clock so that I can draw a fun one-shot for the end-of-year issue. I’ll give it my best! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 結婚、子供と、友だちは、みんな大忙し。で、なかなか集まって遊ぶ機会がない。少し淋しい。＜明＞ Between marriage and kids, my friends are all really busy. So, we can’t quite find any opportunities to get together. I’m a bit lonely. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
結婚、子供と、友だちは、みんな大忙し。で、なかなか集まって遊ぶ機会がない。少し淋しい。＜明＞
Between marriage and kids, my friends are all really busy. So, we can’t quite find any opportunities to get together. I’m a bit lonely. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子・佐助と外へ食事に行くと大騒ぎ。何をどう食べたかわからないほど。食事も大変です。＜明＞ When I went out to dinner with my son Sasuke, he made a big fuss. So much so that I don’t know what I ate or how. Even meals are tough. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子・佐助と外へ食事に行くと大騒ぎ。何をどう食べたかわからないほど。食事も大変です。＜明＞
When I went out to dinner with my son Sasuke, he made a big fuss. So much so that I don’t know what I ate or how. Even meals are tough. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あと１週間くらい仕事をすれば待ちに待ったお休み。２週間も休めるなんて夢のようだなあ。＜明＞ After about one more week of work, it’ll be my long-awaited break. Being able to rest for two weeks is like a dream. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あと１週間くらい仕事をすれば待ちに待ったお休み。２週間も休めるなんて夢のようだなあ。＜明＞
After about one more week of work, it’ll be my long-awaited break. Being able to rest for two weeks is like a dream. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: どんなに仕事しても指にタコはできないのにムキになってファミコンやったらできてしもた ＜明＞ No matter how much I work, I never get calluses on my fingers, so naturally when I got serious on playing Famicom, I got some. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
どんなに仕事しても指にタコはできないのにムキになってファミコンやったらできてしもた ＜明＞
No matter how much I work, I never get calluses on my fingers, so naturally when I got serious on playing Famicom, I got some. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ＭＧＣさん、田宮さん、エポックさん、いつもステキな商品をいただいて有難うございます。＜明＞ Thank you so much to MGC, Tamiya, and Epoch for always giving me such wonderful products. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ＭＧＣさん、田宮さん、エポックさん、いつもステキな商品をいただいて有難うございます。＜明＞
Thank you so much to MGC, Tamiya, and Epoch for always giving me such wonderful products. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 初めてサバイバルゲームをやって走り廻った。気分スッキリ。体もよく動き“若さ”を実感。＜明＞ I played my first game of Airsoft, and ran all over the place. Really cleared up my mood. My body moved well, and I got a real sense of “youth”. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
初めてサバイバルゲームをやって走り廻った。気分スッキリ。体もよく動き“若さ”を実感。＜明＞
I played my first game of Airsoft, and ran all over the place. Really cleared up my mood. My body moved well, and I got a real sense of “youth”. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 休みは全部ドラクエⅢでつぶれてしまった。嬉しいやら、悲しいやら。でもとっても面白いよ ＜明＞ I spent my entire vacation playing Dragon Quest III . I’m happy, and sad. But it’s fun. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
休みは全部ドラクエⅢでつぶれてしまった。嬉しいやら、悲しいやら。でもとっても面白いよ ＜明＞
I spent my entire vacation playing Dragon Quest III. I’m happy, and sad. But it’s fun. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ピッコロとの闘いも最高潮。かいていて、つい手に力が入り、かき終わると手がだるいです。＜明＞ The battle with Piccolo has reached its apex. Drawing it, I finally got to put some strength in my hand, and when I finished drawing, my hand was tired. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ピッコロとの闘いも最高潮。かいていて、つい手に力が入り、かき終わると手がだるいです。＜明＞
The battle with Piccolo has reached its apex. Drawing it, I finally got to put some strength in my hand, and when I finished drawing, my hand was tired. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 13号の３周年記念巻頭カラーと新展開にむかってがんばってます。楽しみに待っていてね。＜明＞ I’m working hard on the color pages in commemoration of the three-year anniversary in issue #13, as well as new story developments. Please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
13号の３周年記念巻頭カラーと新展開にむかってがんばってます。楽しみに待っていてね。＜明＞
I’m working hard on the color pages in commemoration of the three-year anniversary in issue #13, as well as new story developments. Please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 週刊少年ジャンプの20周年シンボルキャラをデザインしました。来週の1000号記念特集で発表するヨ ＜明＞ I designed the mascot for Weekly Shōnen Jump ’s 20th anniversary. It’ll be announced in next week’s 1000th-issue commemorative special. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
週刊少年ジャンプの20周年シンボルキャラをデザインしました。来週の1000号記念特集で発表するヨ ＜明＞
I designed the mascot for Weekly Shōnen Jump’s 20th anniversary. It’ll be announced in next week’s 1000th-issue commemorative special. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 巻頭カラー執筆のあと、休みをとって家族全員で温泉旅行。ゆっくり、のんびりやってます。＜明＞ After penning these color pages, I took a break and traveled to a hot spring with my whole family. I’m taking things slow and easy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
巻頭カラー執筆のあと、休みをとって家族全員で温泉旅行。ゆっくり、のんびりやってます。＜明＞
After penning these color pages, I took a break and traveled to a hot spring with my whole family. I’m taking things slow and easy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子・佐助と一緒に寝たら、うるさくて眠れない。母親はエライと思った、情ない父親です。＜明＞ When I sleep together with my son Sasuke, he’s so noisy I can’t sleep. This poor dad thought about how amazing mom is. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子・佐助と一緒に寝たら、うるさくて眠れない。母親はエライと思った、情ない父親です。＜明＞
When I sleep together with my son Sasuke, he’s so noisy I can’t sleep. This poor dad thought about how amazing mom is. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 子供服をみて、そのデザインのカッコよさと、値段のよさにびっくり。小さくても立派です。＜明＞ Looking at children’s clothes, I was surprised at how good-looking their design was, and how good the price was. Even though they’re small, it’s impressive. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
子供服をみて、そのデザインのカッコよさと、値段のよさにびっくり。小さくても立派です。＜明＞
Looking at children’s clothes, I was surprised at how good-looking their design was, and how good the price was. Even though they’re small, it’s impressive. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近好んで着る服の色は、みんなハデで明るめ。気持ちもスッカリ、明るくなります……！？＜明＞ Recently, the clothes I’ve liked to wear have been flashy and bright. My feelings will also become clear and bright…?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近好んで着る服の色は、みんなハデで明るめ。気持ちもスッカリ、明るくなります……！？＜明＞
Recently, the clothes I’ve liked to wear have been flashy and bright. My feelings will also become clear and bright…?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子・佐助と、動物園へ行ってきた。息子も喜んだけど、一番、喜んでいたのはワシだった。＜明＞ I went to the zoo with my son Sasuke. My son enjoyed it too, but the one who enjoyed it most was me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子・佐助と、動物園へ行ってきた。息子も喜んだけど、一番、喜んでいたのはワシだった。＜明＞
I went to the zoo with my son Sasuke. My son enjoyed it too, but the one who enjoyed it most was me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やっと武道会の組みあわせが決定しました。いったいどういう戦いになるのか本人も楽しみ。＜明＞ The match-ups for the Budōkai have finally been set. Even I myself am looking forward to seeing what sort of fights they’ll be. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やっと武道会の組みあわせが決定しました。いったいどういう戦いになるのか本人も楽しみ。＜明＞
The match-ups for the Budōkai have finally been set. Even I myself am looking forward to seeing what sort of fights they’ll be. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 悟空を成長させたことに、読者の方がどう反応するかドキドキだったけど、好反応でひと安心 ＜明＞ I was nervous at how the fans would react to my having Goku grow up, but I’m breathing a sigh of relief at the positive response. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
悟空を成長させたことに、読者の方がどう反応するかドキドキだったけど、好反応でひと安心 ＜明＞
I was nervous at how the fans would react to my having Goku grow up, but I’m breathing a sigh of relief at the positive response. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やっと映画ラストエンペラーを見る。ていねいな画面作りに、大変感心して帰ってきました。＜明＞ I finally saw the movie The Last Emperor . I came away extremely impressed at the careful framing. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やっと映画ラストエンペラーを見る。ていねいな画面作りに、大変感心して帰ってきました。＜明＞
I finally saw the movie The Last Emperor. I came away extremely impressed at the careful framing. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 花粉症とG・W（ゴールデンウィーク）スケジュールのダブル攻撃で苦戦中！でも、負けないぞと、がんばってます。＜明＞ I’m in the middle of a struggle against the double-attack of hay-fever and work on Golden Week! I’m doing my best so as not to lose it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
花粉症とG・W（ゴールデンウィーク）スケジュールのダブル攻撃で苦戦中！でも、負けないぞと、がんばってます。＜明＞
I’m in the middle of a struggle against the double-attack of hay-fever and work on Golden Week! I’m doing my best so as not to lose it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: フジTV「ひらけポンキッキ」の人形劇のキャラデザインをしました。よかったら見て下さい ＜明＞ I did the character design of a puppet-theater segment for Hirake! Ponkikki on Fuji TV. Please watch it, if you like. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
フジTV「ひらけポンキッキ」の人形劇のキャラデザインをしました。よかったら見て下さい ＜明＞
I did the character design of a puppet-theater segment for Hirake! Ponkikki on Fuji TV. Please watch it, if you like. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: この仕事やっていると関係ないGW。でも、そこでしっかり仕事すれば、1週間の休みが……。＜明＞ When you’re doing this job, Golden Week isn’t relevant. But, doing a proper job, I managed to get a one-week break… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
この仕事やっていると関係ないGW。でも、そこでしっかり仕事すれば、1週間の休みが……。＜明＞
When you’re doing this job, Golden Week isn’t relevant. But, doing a proper job, I managed to get a one-week break… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 苦労してたてた鯉のぼりも、5日すぎれば、しまわなければ。あっけなかったなあ～。＜明＞ The koinobori I struggled to put up had to be put away after the 5th. All too soon~. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
苦労してたてた鯉のぼりも、5日すぎれば、しまわなければ。あっけなかったなあ～。＜明＞
The koinobori I struggled to put up had to be put away after the 5th. All too soon~. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 陽気がよくなって、猫のコゲが家にトカゲを持ちこむおかげで家が“トカゲの館”に……。＜明＞ The sunny weather has increased, and thanks to my cat Koge bringing lizards in, the house has become a “Hall of Reptiles”… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
陽気がよくなって、猫のコゲが家にトカゲを持ちこむおかげで家が“トカゲの館”に……。＜明＞
The sunny weather has increased, and thanks to my cat Koge bringing lizards in, the house has become a “Hall of Reptiles”… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 赤塚賞の審査で東京へ。パワーのある新人の作品をみると、刺激され、身がひきしまる思い。＜明＞ I went to Tokyo for judging on the Akatsuka Award. Seeing these newcomers’ powerful works was stimulating, and made me straighten up. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
赤塚賞の審査で東京へ。パワーのある新人の作品をみると、刺激され、身がひきしまる思い。＜明＞
I went to Tokyo for judging on the Akatsuka Award. Seeing these newcomers’ powerful works was stimulating, and made me straighten up. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 縁日の金魚すくいで3匹の金魚を連れて帰りました。気持ちよさそうに水槽で泳いでいます。＜明＞ I did the goldfish-scooping game at a festival stall, and brought home three goldfish. They look happy swimming around the fish tank. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
縁日の金魚すくいで3匹の金魚を連れて帰りました。気持ちよさそうに水槽で泳いでいます。＜明＞
I did the goldfish-scooping game at a festival stall, and brought home three goldfish. They look happy swimming around the fish tank. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 忙しい毎日で、この欄（コーナー）にかくことがない。早くこの忙しさがなくなってくれれば助かるのに。＜明＞ I’m so busy every day that I have nothing to write for this column. If only this busyness would go away soon, it’d be a lifesaver. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
忙しい毎日で、この欄（コーナー）にかくことがない。早くこの忙しさがなくなってくれれば助かるのに。＜明＞
I’m so busy every day that I have nothing to write for this column. If only this busyness would go away soon, it’d be a lifesaver. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: マイカーのシティがこわれちゃったので、トゥデイに変えました。小さいけどよく走るよ―。＜明＞ My City broke down, so I changed over to a Today. It’s small, but it runs well. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
マイカーのシティがこわれちゃったので、トゥデイに変えました。小さいけどよく走るよ―。＜明＞
My City broke down, so I changed over to a Today. It’s small, but it runs well. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりの休み。なんにもしないでボーッとしてました。これが、なによりの休日の過ごし方。＜明＞ My first break in a while. I just sat there, not doing anything. This is the best way to spend a day off. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりの休み。なんにもしないでボーッとしてました。これが、なによりの休日の過ごし方。＜明＞
My first break in a while. I just sat there, not doing anything. This is the best way to spend a day off. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ネコのコゲがいなくなって2週間。夜も眠れず、仕事をしていても落ちつかず…。心配です。＜明＞ It’s been two weeks since my cat Koge disappeared. I haven’t been able to sleep at night, and even when I work, I can’t relax… I’m worried about her. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ネコのコゲがいなくなって2週間。夜も眠れず、仕事をしていても落ちつかず…。心配です。＜明＞
It’s been two weeks since my cat Koge disappeared. I haven’t been able to sleep at night, and even when I work, I can’t relax… I’m worried about her. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ドラゴンボールのファミコンがとても面白かった。興味がある人は、8月に買ってみて下さい ＜明＞ Dragon Ball for the Famicom was a lot of fun. If you’re interested, please buy it in August. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ドラゴンボールのファミコンがとても面白かった。興味がある人は、8月に買ってみて下さい ＜明＞
Dragon Ball for the Famicom was a lot of fun. If you’re interested, please buy it in August. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 我が家の目覚ましは息子の佐助腹の上にドンと飛びのってくるので、イヤでも目が覚めるのだ ＜明＞ My alarm clock at home is my son Sasuke jumping up on my stomach with a thud, so I wake up even if I don’t want to. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
我が家の目覚ましは息子の佐助腹の上にドンと飛びのってくるので、イヤでも目が覚めるのだ ＜明＞
My alarm clock at home is my son Sasuke jumping up on my stomach with a thud, so I wake up even if I don’t want to. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: オリジナルアニメ、『小助さまと小丸さま』は快調に進行中。デキがよさそうで楽しみだよ。＜明＞ The original animation Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama is proceeding smoothly. It looks like it’s coming out pretty well, so I’m looking forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
オリジナルアニメ、『小助さまと小丸さま』は快調に進行中。デキがよさそうで楽しみだよ。＜明＞
The original animation Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama is proceeding smoothly. It looks like it’s coming out pretty well, so I’m looking forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 暑い。東京にくらべ４度は暑いらしい。だから、冷房の効いてる部屋で、仕事をしてます。＜明＞ It’s hot. Apparently it’s four degrees hotter than Tokyo. So I’m working in a room with air-conditioning. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
暑い。東京にくらべ４度は暑いらしい。だから、冷房の効いてる部屋で、仕事をしてます。＜明＞
It’s hot. Apparently it’s four degrees hotter than Tokyo. So I’m working in a room with air-conditioning. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子が大きくなるまで映画を見に行きにくいので、ビデオでガマン。ビデオの山ができました ＜明＞ It’ll be difficult to go to the movies until my son gets bigger, so I’m tiding myself over with videos. I’ve got a mountain of videos now. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子が大きくなるまで映画を見に行きにくいので、ビデオでガマン。ビデオの山ができました ＜明＞
It’ll be difficult to go to the movies until my son gets bigger, so I’m tiding myself over with videos. I’ve got a mountain of videos now. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族みんなで、さっそうと泳ぎにいくつもりで、全員が、水着を新調した。けれど、忙しくて、とてもいけそうにない。ヤキモキしながら、暇になるのを待ってるけど、早くしないと、夏がおわってしまう…。とあせる、この頃。＜明＞ The whole family was planning to get out and go swimming, so everybody bought new swimsuits. But I’m so busy that it’s not looking like we’ll be able to go. I’m anxiously waiting for some free time, but if we don’t do it soon, summer will be over… That’s what I’m fretting over these days. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族みんなで、さっそうと泳ぎにいくつもりで、全員が、水着を新調した。けれど、忙しくて、とてもいけそうにない。ヤキモキしながら、暇になるのを待ってるけど、早くしないと、夏がおわってしまう…。とあせる、この頃。＜明＞
The whole family was planning to get out and go swimming, so everybody bought new swimsuits. But I’m so busy that it’s not looking like we’ll be able to go. I’m anxiously waiting for some free time, but if we don’t do it soon, summer will be over… That’s what I’m fretting over these days. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ボクもかつては悪ガキ。だから今回の読切は、とてもラクーにかけました。感想待ってるヨ。＜明＞ Even I was once a naughty child. So this one-shot was really easy to draw. I await your thoughts. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ボクもかつては悪ガキ。だから今回の読切は、とてもラクーにかけました。感想待ってるヨ。＜明＞
Even I was once a naughty child. So this one-shot was really easy to draw. I await your thoughts. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 河原で鮎を食べました。空気もさわやか。鮎の味もさわやか。とてもいい休日になりました。＜明＞ I ate sweetfish by the riverbank. The sweetfish tasted refreshing, as well. It was a very nice day off. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
河原で鮎を食べました。空気もさわやか。鮎の味もさわやか。とてもいい休日になりました。＜明＞
I ate sweetfish by the riverbank. The sweetfish tasted refreshing, as well. It was a very nice day off. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりの家族旅行でのんびりしました。海もみたし温泉にもつかったし、いい休日でした。＜明＞ I relaxed on our first family trip in a while. I saw the sea, and bathed in a hot spring; it was a nice day off. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりの家族旅行でのんびりしました。海もみたし温泉にもつかったし、いい休日でした。＜明＞
I relaxed on our first family trip in a while. I saw the sea, and bathed in a hot spring; it was a nice day off. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: なんとか必死で休みをとったら夏はもう終わり……。でも、この休みはムダにせず遊ぶゾー！＜明＞ I just managed to squeeze in a vacation before the summer ends…. But I’ll have fun and not let this break go to waste! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
なんとか必死で休みをとったら夏はもう終わり……。でも、この休みはムダにせず遊ぶゾー！＜明＞
I just managed to squeeze in a vacation before the summer ends…. But I’ll have fun and not let this break go to waste! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 9月23日のアニメカーニバル鹿児島大会に行くぞー。一緒に「小助さま」のアニメを見ようぜ！＜明＞ I’ll be going to the Kagoshima venue of the [Jump] Anime Carnival on September 23rd. Let’s watch the Kosuke-sama anime together! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
9月23日のアニメカーニバル鹿児島大会に行くぞー。一緒に「小助さま」のアニメを見ようぜ！＜明＞
I’ll be going to the Kagoshima venue of the [Jump] Anime Carnival on September 23rd. Let’s watch the Kosuke-sama anime together! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新展開の内容は、だいたい決まっているのですが、設定などが、まだまだ。でも遊んでしまうのだ ＜明＞ The new storyline’s contents are pretty much settled, but I haven’t done the designs and such yet. But I end up goofing off. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新展開の内容は、だいたい決まっているのですが、設定などが、まだまだ。でも遊んでしまうのだ ＜明＞
The new storyline’s contents are pretty much settled, but I haven’t done the designs and such yet. But I end up goofing off. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アニメカーニバルの「小助さま」はとっても楽しく、よく動きます。10日の大分大会でみてね。＜明＞ Kosuke-sama at the Anime Carnival was a lot of fun, and moves along well. Please check it out at the Oita venue on the 10th. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アニメカーニバルの「小助さま」はとっても楽しく、よく動きます。10日の大分大会でみてね。＜明＞
Kosuke-sama at the Anime Carnival was a lot of fun, and moves along well. Please check it out at the Oita venue on the 10th. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: カーニバル鹿児島大会盛りあがりました。初めての九州は、とってもよかった。またいきたい ＜明＞ The Carnival’s Kagoshima venue got fired up. My first time in Kyushu was really nice. I want to go back again. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
カーニバル鹿児島大会盛りあがりました。初めての九州は、とってもよかった。またいきたい ＜明＞
The Carnival’s Kagoshima venue got fired up. My first time in Kyushu was really nice. I want to go back again. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ダビングしてもらった「小助さま力丸さま」のビデオを何回もみてひとりで興奮してます。ほんとに絵がいい。しかも、よく動く。芦田監督、ありがとうございました。みてくださる方は、アニメカーニバルに、応募して下さい。＜明＞ I’ve watched the video of Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama I had them dub for me many times over, feeling the excitement by myself. The art is really good. And on top of that, it moves well. To the director Ashida, thank you very much. To those watching, please enter for [a chance to go to] the Anime Carnival. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ダビングしてもらった「小助さま力丸さま」のビデオを何回もみてひとりで興奮してます。ほんとに絵がいい。しかも、よく動く。芦田監督、ありがとうございました。みてくださる方は、アニメカーニバルに、応募して下さい。＜明＞
I’ve watched the video of Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama I had them dub for me many times over, feeling the excitement by myself. The art is really good. And on top of that, it moves well. To the director Ashida, thank you very much. To those watching, please enter for [a chance to go to] the Anime Carnival. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ファミコンの三国志が面白い。仕事のジャマにならぬよう楽しんでます。もとはとった感じ。＜明＞ Tale of the Three Kingdoms on the Famicom is fun. I’m enjoying it without letting it interfere with my work. I feel like I got my money’s worth. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ファミコンの三国志が面白い。仕事のジャマにならぬよう楽しんでます。もとはとった感じ。＜明＞
Tale of the Three Kingdoms on the Famicom is fun. I’m enjoying it without letting it interfere with my work. I feel like I got my money’s worth. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 親子連れで初めて、ディズニーランドへ。ＥＰ（エレクトリカルパレード）もきれいだったし楽しかったでも少し疲れたな ＜明＞ We took our son to Disneyland for the first time. The electric parade was pretty, and it was fun, but it tired me out a bit. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
親子連れで初めて、ディズニーランドへ。ＥＰ（エレクトリカルパレード）もきれいだったし楽しかったでも少し疲れたな ＜明＞
We took our son to Disneyland for the first time. The electric parade was pretty, and it was fun, but it tired me out a bit. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近、ときどき東京へでかける。新幹線の２時間が、度かさなると、けっこう長く感じるこの頃 ＜明＞ Recently, I’ve been going out to Tokyo now and then. As I keep repeating those two hours on the bullet train, it’s getting to feel pretty long. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近、ときどき東京へでかける。新幹線の２時間が、度かさなると、けっこう長く感じるこの頃 ＜明＞
Recently, I’ve been going out to Tokyo now and then. As I keep repeating those two hours on the bullet train, it’s getting to feel pretty long. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: この本が出る頃には結果が出てますが、日本シリーズは、担当→Ｌ（ライオンズ）、私→Ｄ（ドラゴンズ）と熱い応援合戦です ＜明＞ By the time this issue comes out, the results will already be out, but for the Japan Series, there’s an all-out war between my editor, who supports the Lions, and me, who supports the Dragons. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
この本が出る頃には結果が出てますが、日本シリーズは、担当→Ｌ（ライオンズ）、私→Ｄ（ドラゴンズ）と熱い応援合戦です ＜明＞
By the time this issue comes out, the results will already be out, but for the Japan Series, there’s an all-out war between my editor, who supports the Lions, and me, who supports the Dragons. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 楽しみにしていた赤塚賞の選考会に出席できず残念。でも候補作はどれも、面白かったです。＜明＞ I was unable to attend the selection meeting for the Akatsuka Award which I was looking forward to; it’s too bad. But the candidate works were all enjoyable. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
楽しみにしていた赤塚賞の選考会に出席できず残念。でも候補作はどれも、面白かったです。＜明＞
I was unable to attend the selection meeting for the Akatsuka Award which I was looking forward to; it’s too bad. But the candidate works were all enjoyable. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年末最終号で、オール４色に挑戦！…で大忙しの毎日…だけど寒くてフトンから出るのが大変 ＜明＞ In the final issue of the year, I’m going to try my hand at an entirely full-color chapter! …so I’m really busy every day… but it’s cold, so it’s tough just getting out of the futon. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年末最終号で、オール４色に挑戦！…で大忙しの毎日…だけど寒くてフトンから出るのが大変 ＜明＞
In the final issue of the year, I’m going to try my hand at an entirely full-color chapter! …so I’m really busy every day… but it’s cold, so it’s tough just getting out of the futon. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりのお休み。とりあえずねてようか…なんていってるうちに、休みはジ･エンドでした。＜明＞ My first day off in a while. For starters, why don’t I sleep?… And as I said that, my day off came to an end. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりのお休み。とりあえずねてようか…なんていってるうちに、休みはジ･エンドでした。＜明＞
My first day off in a while. For starters, why don’t I sleep?… And as I said that, my day off came to an end. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 忙しさが峠をこえたと思ったら、年末の大掃除が目前…＜明＞ Just when I’d thought I’d gotten over the peak of being busy, the year-end housekeeping stood before my eyes… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
忙しさが峠をこえたと思ったら、年末の大掃除が目前…＜明＞
Just when I’d thought I’d gotten over the peak of being busy, the year-end housekeeping stood before my eyes… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ボクはマンガ家のくせに、あまりマンガを読まないんですが、たまにマンガ本をみたりすると、なかなか新鮮で面白く、勉強になったりもします。いやいやプロというのはさすがだな！と、時どき自分を反省したりします。＜明＞ Even though I draw manga, I don’t read them very much, but when I look at a comic book, it’s quite fresh and interesting, and I can even learn something new. Ah, just as you’d expect of a pro! I sometimes think, prompting some self-reflection. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ボクはマンガ家のくせに、あまりマンガを読まないんですが、たまにマンガ本をみたりすると、なかなか新鮮で面白く、勉強になったりもします。いやいやプロというのはさすがだな！と、時どき自分を反省したりします。＜明＞
Even though I draw manga, I don’t read them very much, but when I look at a comic book, it’s quite fresh and interesting, and I can even learn something new. Ah, just as you’d expect of a pro! I sometimes think, prompting some self-reflection. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新しい年もよろしく！今年こそ、家族と一緒に、あっちこち旅行しまくりたいなあ。＜明＞ Happy New Year! This year, I’m definitely gonna travel all over the place with my family. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新しい年もよろしく！今年こそ、家族と一緒に、あっちこち旅行しまくりたいなあ。＜明＞
Happy New Year! This year, I’m definitely gonna travel all over the place with my family. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 休んでいる間はいいけど、休みあけはツライなあ。さあ、仕事をしなくっちゃいけないゾ ＜明＞ Vacations are nice, but the start of work after a vacation is rough. Now then, I’ve got to get working. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
休んでいる間はいいけど、休みあけはツライなあ。さあ、仕事をしなくっちゃいけないゾ ＜明＞
Vacations are nice, but the start of work after a vacation is rough. Now then, I’ve got to get working. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 報！担当氏がかわりました。鳥嶋氏、長い間ご苦労様！近藤氏と共に気分ＲＦ（リフレッシュ）で頑張るヨ ＜明＞ News flash! My editor has changed. Thank you so much for your hard work all this time, Mr. Torishima! I’ll work hard with a refreshed mood together with Mr. Kondō. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
