報！担当氏がかわりました。鳥嶋氏、長い間ご苦労様！近藤氏と共に気分ＲＦ（リフレッシュ）で頑張るヨ ＜明＞
News flash! My editor has changed. Thank you so much for your hard work all this time, Mr. Torishima! I’ll work hard with a refreshed mood together with Mr. Kondō. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 風邪をひいた上、ドアで指をはさみヒビが入ってしまった！！渋い平成元年の始まりです…＜明＞ On top of having a cold, I caught my finger in the door and cracked the bone!! This is an inauspicious start to the Heisei era. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
風邪をひいた上、ドアで指をはさみヒビが入ってしまった！！渋い平成元年の始まりです…＜明＞
On top of having a cold, I caught my finger in the door and cracked the bone!! This is an inauspicious start to the Heisei era. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: №13で読切をかきます！その予定で仕事をつめていて編集部の新年会は欠席。残念でした。＜明＞ I’m drawing a one-shot for issue #13! I’m piling on the work in anticipation, so I sat out the editorial department’s New Year get-together. It’s too bad. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
№13で読切をかきます！その予定で仕事をつめていて編集部の新年会は欠席。残念でした。＜明＞
I’m drawing a one-shot for issue #13! I’m piling on the work in anticipation, so I sat out the editorial department’s New Year get-together. It’s too bad. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｖ（バレンタイン）･デーに奥さんからチョコを（ハート）でも食べてたのは、奥さんと息子だけ。はてな…？＜明＞ The only ones who ate the Valentine’s Day chocolate from my wife were my wife and my son. Um…? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｖ（バレンタイン）･デーに奥さんからチョコを（ハート）でも食べてたのは、奥さんと息子だけ。はてな…？＜明＞
The only ones who ate the Valentine’s Day chocolate from my wife were my wife and my son. Um…? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来週№13では読切とＤ･Ｂの２本立て！苦しかったけど楽しくもありました。乞うご期待。＜明＞ Next week’s issue #13 is a double-header of a one-shot and Dragon Ball ! It was painful, but also fun. Please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来週№13では読切とＤ･Ｂの２本立て！苦しかったけど楽しくもありました。乞うご期待。＜明＞
Next week’s issue #13 is a double-header of a one-shot and Dragon Ball! It was painful, but also fun. Please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 手塚先生の逝去はとても悲しくて残念です。先生、たくさんの夢を有難うございました…＜明＞ Tezuka- sensei ‘s passing is so sad, and such a shame. Sensei , thank you for so many dreams… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
手塚先生の逝去はとても悲しくて残念です。先生、たくさんの夢を有難うございました…＜明＞
Tezuka-sensei‘s passing is so sad, and such a shame. Sensei, thank you for so many dreams… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 遅くなってしまいましたがＶ（バレンタイン）チョコ、たくさん有難うございました。全部食べます。＜明＞ I’m late with this, but thank you for all the Valentine’s chocolate. I’ll eat it all. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
遅くなってしまいましたがＶ（バレンタイン）チョコ、たくさん有難うございました。全部食べます。＜明＞
I’m late with this, but thank you for all the Valentine’s chocolate. I’ll eat it all. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 嫌いな冬が去り、待望の春がもうそこまで！！でも恐怖の花粉症がまた始まる…ううツライ ＜明＞ The loathsome winter has departed, and the long-awaited spring is already rolling along!! But the dreaded hay-fever is starting again… Ugh, this is rough. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
嫌いな冬が去り、待望の春がもうそこまで！！でも恐怖の花粉症がまた始まる…ううツライ ＜明＞
The loathsome winter has departed, and the long-awaited spring is already rolling along!! But the dreaded hay-fever is starting again… Ugh, this is rough. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 『Ｆ･Ｊ』（ファミコンジャンプ）の中盤でつまづき停滞中。ついつい他のカセットに浮気しちゃいそうな僕です ＜明＞ I’m stuck in the middle of Famicom Jump , where I keep slipping up. I think I might end up cheating on it with another cart. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
『Ｆ･Ｊ』（ファミコンジャンプ）の中盤でつまづき停滞中。ついつい他のカセットに浮気しちゃいそうな僕です ＜明＞
I’m stuck in the middle of Famicom Jump, where I keep slipping up. I think I might end up cheating on it with another cart. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子の佐助クンも早２歳。よく歩き回って、嬉しいけど、仕事のジャマになる時はツライ ＜明＞ My son Sasuke- kun is already two years old. He’s walking around a lot, which makes me happy, but it’s rough when he interferes with my work. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子の佐助クンも早２歳。よく歩き回って、嬉しいけど、仕事のジャマになる時はツライ ＜明＞
My son Sasuke-kun is already two years old. He’s walking around a lot, which makes me happy, but it’s rough when he interferes with my work. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 暖かいある日１年ぶりに車にＷＡＸをかけた。復活した車の色のキレイさにオドロキました ＜明＞ One warm day, I waxed my car for the first time in a year. I was amazed at how good my car looked with its colors rejuvenated. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
暖かいある日１年ぶりに車にＷＡＸをかけた。復活した車の色のキレイさにオドロキました ＜明＞
One warm day, I waxed my car for the first time in a year. I was amazed at how good my car looked with its colors rejuvenated. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アニメＣ（カーニバル）で大阪＆神戸大会に行きました。ファンの皆さんの熱気に、圧倒されました！＜明＞ I went to the Osaka and Kobe legs of the Anime Carnival. I was overwhelmed by all the fans’ enthusiasm! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アニメＣ（カーニバル）で大阪＆神戸大会に行きました。ファンの皆さんの熱気に、圧倒されました！＜明＞
I went to the Osaka and Kobe legs of the Anime Carnival. I was overwhelmed by all the fans’ enthusiasm! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｇ・Ｗ（ゴールデンウィーク）進行でそろそろきつくなるのに家族でＤ・Ｌ（ディズニーランド）へ。余計に自分できつくしてしまった ＜明＞ Things will be getting pretty tight soon on account of my Golden Week Schedule, and yet I went to Tokyo Disneyland with my family. I went and made things even tighter. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｇ・Ｗ（ゴールデンウィーク）進行でそろそろきつくなるのに家族でＤ・Ｌ（ディズニーランド）へ。余計に自分できつくしてしまった ＜明＞
Things will be getting pretty tight soon on account of my Golden Week Schedule, and yet I went to Tokyo Disneyland with my family. I went and made things even tighter. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 担当の近藤氏は、えんど先生と豪州（オーストラリア）に行ってきた。僕は子供と近所のスーパーに…負けた ＜明＞ My editor Kondō went to Australia with Endo- sensei . I went to the neighborhood supermarket with my kids… I lose. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
担当の近藤氏は、えんど先生と豪州（オーストラリア）に行ってきた。僕は子供と近所のスーパーに…負けた ＜明＞
My editor Kondō went to Australia with Endo-sensei. I went to the neighborhood supermarket with my kids… I lose. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 楽しいＧ・Ｗ（ゴールデンウィーク）も仕事で消滅。でも逆に人がへるＧ・Ｗ明けに出かけられるのは幸せかな ＜明＞ My fun Golden Week was obliterated by work. But I might actually be better off going out right after Golden Week, when there are fewer people. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
楽しいＧ・Ｗ（ゴールデンウィーク）も仕事で消滅。でも逆に人がへるＧ・Ｗ明けに出かけられるのは幸せかな ＜明＞
My fun Golden Week was obliterated by work. But I might actually be better off going out right after Golden Week, when there are fewer people. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今怒っている事→Ｆ１の放送日が僕の住む地域と東京では１週間もズレる！許せないっ！！＜明＞ What I’m angry about now: The F-1 broadcast in the area where I live is a week later than in Tokyo! This is unforgivable!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今怒っている事→Ｆ１の放送日が僕の住む地域と東京では１週間もズレる！許せないっ！！＜明＞
What I’m angry about now: The F-1 broadcast in the area where I live is a week later than in Tokyo! This is unforgivable!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 連載200回突破の表彰式で東京に行きました。ついでに映画のハシゴもして、充実の１日！＜明＞ I went to Tokyo for the award ceremony in recognition of passing 200 chapters. I went movie-hopping on the side, so it was a day well spent! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
連載200回突破の表彰式で東京に行きました。ついでに映画のハシゴもして、充実の１日！＜明＞
I went to Tokyo for the award ceremony in recognition of passing 200 chapters. I went movie-hopping on the side, so it was a day well spent! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: おいしい空気をすいに、友達と信州の高原に行こうかな…と計画中。でもＳ（スケジュール）調整が問題！？＜明＞ To get some fresh air, I think I might visit the highlands of Shinano with a friend… that’s what I’m planning. But adjusting my schedule is the problem!? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
おいしい空気をすいに、友達と信州の高原に行こうかな…と計画中。でもＳ（スケジュール）調整が問題！？＜明＞
To get some fresh air, I think I might visit the highlands of Shinano with a friend… that’s what I’m planning. But adjusting my schedule is the problem!? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今一番ワクワクするのはＦ１ＧＰの中継！この日はもう仕事も手につかずで、困ります！？＜明＞ What gets me fired up the most right now are the live F-1 Grand Prix broadcasts! On those days, I don’t do any work at all, which is a problem?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今一番ワクワクするのはＦ１ＧＰの中継！この日はもう仕事も手につかずで、困ります！？＜明＞
What gets me fired up the most right now are the live F-1 Grand Prix broadcasts! On those days, I don’t do any work at all, which is a problem?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来週第28号から２週連続巻頭カラー！仕事のＳ（スケジュール）はきついけど、面白くなるからお楽しみに ＜明＞ Next week’s issue #28 will be my second issue with color pages in a row! My work schedule is tight, but [the comic] will be fun, so please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来週第28号から２週連続巻頭カラー！仕事のＳ（スケジュール）はきついけど、面白くなるからお楽しみに ＜明＞
Next week’s issue #28 will be my second issue with color pages in a row! My work schedule is tight, but [the comic] will be fun, so please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 歌舞伎と京劇をミックスした『リュウオー』を観ました。素敵に面白く勉強になりました ＜明＞ I saw Ryu-Oh [ Dragon King ], which mixes Kabuki and Beijing opera. It was wonderfully enjoyable, and I learned something from it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
歌舞伎と京劇をミックスした『リュウオー』を観ました。素敵に面白く勉強になりました ＜明＞
I saw Ryu-Oh [Dragon King], which mixes Kabuki and Beijing opera. It was wonderfully enjoyable, and I learned something from it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ２週連続の巻頭カラーも今週で無事おしまい。これで、ほんのつかの間ホッとできます…。＜明＞ My two weeks in a row of color chapters finished up this week without incident. With this, I can at least catch a short breather. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
２週連続の巻頭カラーも今週で無事おしまい。これで、ほんのつかの間ホッとできます…。＜明＞
My two weeks in a row of color chapters finished up this week without incident. With this, I can at least catch a short breather. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族そろって沖縄に行きました！ひさしぶりに見る青い空、緑の海にもうワクワクもの！！＜明＞ The whole family went to Okinawa! It was so exciting seeing the azure sky and the blue-green sea!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族そろって沖縄に行きました！ひさしぶりに見る青い空、緑の海にもうワクワクもの！！＜明＞
The whole family went to Okinawa! It was so exciting seeing the azure sky and the blue-green sea!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 口絵の『小助さま力丸さま』ですが、楽しい作品ですので、ぜひ皆さま、観てくださいネ ＜明＞ The headlining feature Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama is a fun work, so everyone, please see it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
口絵の『小助さま力丸さま』ですが、楽しい作品ですので、ぜひ皆さま、観てくださいネ ＜明＞
The headlining feature Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama is a fun work, so everyone, please see it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週号の原稿をかいてる今、夏カゼをひいてしまった。ゴホ、ゴホ。皆さんも気をつけてネ ＜明＞ In the midst of drawing the manuscript for this week’s issue, I caught a summer cold. Cough, cough . Everyone, please take care of yourselves. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週号の原稿をかいてる今、夏カゼをひいてしまった。ゴホ、ゴホ。皆さんも気をつけてネ ＜明＞
In the midst of drawing the manuscript for this week’s issue, I caught a summer cold. Cough, cough. Everyone, please take care of yourselves. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ドラクエⅣのデモ画面を見ました！スケールの大きさ、面白さにビックリ！早くしたい！！＜明＞ I saw a demo screen of Dragon Quest IV ! I was amazed at its large scale and the fun of it! I want to play it soon!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ドラクエⅣのデモ画面を見ました！スケールの大きさ、面白さにビックリ！早くしたい！！＜明＞
I saw a demo screen of Dragon Quest IV! I was amazed at its large scale and the fun of it! I want to play it soon!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ８月のＡ・Ｃ（アニメカーニバル）東京大会で皆さんに会えるのを今から、緊張ぎみに楽しみにしております。＜明＞ I’ve now started nervously looking forward to meeting everyone at the Tokyo leg of the Anime Carnival in August. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
８月のＡ・Ｃ（アニメカーニバル）東京大会で皆さんに会えるのを今から、緊張ぎみに楽しみにしております。＜明＞
I’ve now started nervously looking forward to meeting everyone at the Tokyo leg of the Anime Carnival in August. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 東京Ｄ・Ｌ（ディズニーランド）のスターツアーズを経験しました。迫力ある臨場感に、もう感動！！オモシロイ！！＜明＞ I experienced “Star Tours” at Tokyo Disneyland. I was really moved at the powerful sense of immersion!! It’s fun!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
東京Ｄ・Ｌ（ディズニーランド）のスターツアーズを経験しました。迫力ある臨場感に、もう感動！！オモシロイ！！＜明＞
I experienced “Star Tours” at Tokyo Disneyland. I was really moved at the powerful sense of immersion!! It’s fun!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりに劇場で映画『バロン』を観ました。映像の美しさと面白い物語展開。楽しめました。＜明＞ On my first trip to the movies in a while, I saw The Adventures of Baron Munchausen . Between the beautiful imagery and the interesting story developments, I really enjoyed it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりに劇場で映画『バロン』を観ました。映像の美しさと面白い物語展開。楽しめました。＜明＞
On my first trip to the movies in a while, I saw The Adventures of Baron Munchausen. Between the beautiful imagery and the interesting story developments, I really enjoyed it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 海の家、潮干がり、往復の大渋滞…！夏の風物詩を満喫！！暑～い夏の１日、疲れました…＜明＞ A beach hut, clam-gathering at low tide, and a big traffic jam both ways…! I made the most of what the summer season offers!! It was a hoooot day, and I’m tired… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
海の家、潮干がり、往復の大渋滞…！夏の風物詩を満喫！！暑～い夏の１日、疲れました…＜明＞
A beach hut, clam-gathering at low tide, and a big traffic jam both ways…! I made the most of what the summer season offers!! It was a hoooot day, and I’m tired… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 昼はプール、夜はＦ･Ｃ（ファミコン）『マザー』にはまり、結局、仕事は夜中に…という充実したお盆でした ＜明＞ I spent the day at the pool, and the evening hooked on Mother for the Famicom, so in the end, I worked through the night… it was a Bon Festival well spent. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
昼はプール、夜はＦ･Ｃ（ファミコン）『マザー』にはまり、結局、仕事は夜中に…という充実したお盆でした ＜明＞
I spent the day at the pool, and the evening hooked on Mother for the Famicom, so in the end, I worked through the night… it was a Bon Festival well spent. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 8/31『小助さま力丸さま』が関東地区でTV放映されます。皆さんぜひ見て下さいネ。＜明＞ On August 31st, Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama will air on TV in the Kanto area. Everyone, please watch it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
8/31『小助さま力丸さま』が関東地区でTV放映されます。皆さんぜひ見て下さいネ。＜明＞
On August 31st, Kosuke-sama, Rikimaru-sama will air on TV in the Kanto area. Everyone, please watch it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ａ･Ｃ（アニメカーニバル）東京大会に出席。ファンの方とじかにお会いできる貴重な機会充実の一日でした。＜明＞ I attended the Tokyo leg of the Anime Carnival. It was a day full of precious opportunities to meet the fans in-person. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ａ･Ｃ（アニメカーニバル）東京大会に出席。ファンの方とじかにお会いできる貴重な機会充実の一日でした。＜明＞
I attended the Tokyo leg of the Anime Carnival. It was a day full of precious opportunities to meet the fans in-person. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 初めて釣りに行きました。色々と教わりながらの１日でしたがとても楽しい経験でした ＜明＞ I went trout fishing for the first time. All day, I was learning new things as I went along, but it was a really enjoyable experience. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
初めて釣りに行きました。色々と教わりながらの１日でしたがとても楽しい経験でした ＜明＞
I went trout fishing for the first time. All day, I was learning new things as I went along, but it was a really enjoyable experience. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 作者のさくま氏から『Ｓ（スーパー）桃電』をいただきました。お世辞ぬきで，とても面白いゲームでした ＜明＞ I received Super Momotaro Railway from the creator, Sakuma. It’s a really fun game, and that’s not just lip service. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
作者のさくま氏から『Ｓ（スーパー）桃電』をいただきました。お世辞ぬきで，とても面白いゲームでした ＜明＞
I received Super Momotaro Railway from the creator, Sakuma. It’s a really fun game, and that’s not just lip service. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やっぱりF1は面白いなあ。そして，あと１か月弱でついに鈴鹿！！考えただけでもワクワク ＜明＞ F-1 is definitely enjoyable. Also, there’s less than a month until Suzuka! Just thinking about it makes me excited. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やっぱりF1は面白いなあ。そして，あと１か月弱でついに鈴鹿！！考えただけでもワクワク ＜明＞
F-1 is definitely enjoyable. Also, there’s less than a month until Suzuka! Just thinking about it makes me excited. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 拾った猫から広がったノミ退治にバルサンを。おかげで１日仕事にならず，まいりました…＜明＞ I used a bug bomb to get rid of the fleas that spread from the cat we took in. Thanks to that, I lost a day of work. What a bummer. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
拾った猫から広がったノミ退治にバルサンを。おかげで１日仕事にならず，まいりました…＜明＞
I used a bug bomb to get rid of the fleas that spread from the cat we took in. Thanks to that, I lost a day of work. What a bummer. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: なんと！！ドラクエⅣの見本版を借りて最後までやりました！！面白い！！期待通りの◎（にじゅうまる）です！！＜明＞ Whoa!! I borrowed the demo version of Dragon Quest IV and played it to the end!! It’s fun!! A perfect 10, just as I anticipated!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
なんと！！ドラクエⅣの見本版を借りて最後までやりました！！面白い！！期待通りの◎（にじゅうまる）です！！＜明＞
Whoa!! I borrowed the demo version of Dragon Quest IV and played it to the end!! It’s fun!! A perfect 10, just as I anticipated!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよF1の鈴鹿戦！！個人的にはやっぱりHONDAを応援！22日が待ち遠しいなあ！＜明＞ At last, it’s the F-1 battle in Suzuka!! As for me personally, I’ll definitely be supporting Honda! I can hardly wait until the 22nd! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよF1の鈴鹿戦！！個人的にはやっぱりHONDAを応援！22日が待ち遠しいなあ！＜明＞
At last, it’s the F-1 battle in Suzuka!! As for me personally, I’ll definitely be supporting Honda! I can hardly wait until the 22nd! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 冷え込む季節になりました。寒いのが苦手な僕は，暖い南の島へでもホントに行きたい！＜明＞ The cold season is here. Since I’m no good with the cold, I really want to go somewhere like a warm southern isle! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
冷え込む季節になりました。寒いのが苦手な僕は，暖い南の島へでもホントに行きたい！＜明＞
The cold season is here. Since I’m no good with the cold, I really want to go somewhere like a warm southern isle! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事の忙しさに比例して，喫煙量が増加中。健康を考えるとこれも悩みの種。トホホ…。＜明＞ My smoking is increasing in proportion to how busy I am with work. Thinking about my health, this too is a source of worry. Woe is me… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事の忙しさに比例して，喫煙量が増加中。健康を考えるとこれも悩みの種。トホホ…。＜明＞
My smoking is increasing in proportion to how busy I am with work. Thinking about my health, this too is a source of worry. Woe is me… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 1年のつもりで始めたＤＢもＤｒ．スランプを抜く長期連載に！嬉しいような怖いような…＜明＞ Dragon Ball , which I started with the intention of doing for a year, is now a long-runner surpassing Dr. Slump ! I’m both happy and scared… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
1年のつもりで始めたＤＢもＤｒ．スランプを抜く長期連載に！嬉しいような怖いような…＜明＞
Dragon Ball, which I started with the intention of doing for a year, is now a long-runner surpassing Dr. Slump! I’m both happy and scared… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 打合で上京したら，ホテルがどこも満室。結局，泊ったのはスイートＲ（ルーム）。まいりました…＜明＞ When I came to Tokyo for a meeting, all the hotel rooms were full. In the end, I stayed in a suite. Bummer… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
打合で上京したら，ホテルがどこも満室。結局，泊ったのはスイートＲ（ルーム）。まいりました…＜明＞
When I came to Tokyo for a meeting, all the hotel rooms were full. In the end, I stayed in a suite. Bummer… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年のＦ１はレース以外の所でもめていて不満が残りました。来季こそクリアなＦ１に！！＜明＞ This year’s F-1 had friction in areas outside the races, which left me discontented. Let’s have an F-1 in the clear next season!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年のＦ１はレース以外の所でもめていて不満が残りました。来季こそクリアなＦ１に！！＜明＞
This year’s F-1 had friction in areas outside the races, which left me discontented. Let’s have an F-1 in the clear next season!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: この頃よく東京に仕事で行きますが，その度にカゼ気味に。東京の空気はキビシイなあ…＜明＞ These days, I often go to Tokyo, but every time I catch a cold. The air in Tokyo is tough… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
この頃よく東京に仕事で行きますが，その度にカゼ気味に。東京の空気はキビシイなあ…＜明＞
These days, I often go to Tokyo, but every time I catch a cold. The air in Tokyo is tough… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 1月10日に僕のイラスト集が出ます。今，その描きおろしイラストで毎日メチャ忙しです ＜明＞ My illustration collection comes out on January 10th. Right now, I’m super-busy every day working on a new illustration for it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
1月10日に僕のイラスト集が出ます。今，その描きおろしイラストで毎日メチャ忙しです ＜明＞
My illustration collection comes out on January 10th. Right now, I’m super-busy every day working on a new illustration for it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 次号はＤ･Ｂが２本立てで掲載！！僕も初めての事でドキドキしてます。お楽しみにネ！＜明＞ Dragon Ball will run as a double-header in the next issue!! This is a first for me, too, so my heart’s pounding. Look forward to it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
次号はＤ･Ｂが２本立てで掲載！！僕も初めての事でドキドキしてます。お楽しみにネ！＜明＞
Dragon Ball will run as a double-header in the next issue!! This is a first for me, too, so my heart’s pounding. Look forward to it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週号のＤＢの2本立て，いかがでしたか!?いつもの２倍楽しんでもらえたら本望です ＜明＞ What did you think of the Dragon Ball double-header in this week’s issue?! I’ll be satisfied if you enjoyed it twice as much as usual. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週号のＤＢの2本立て，いかがでしたか!?いつもの２倍楽しんでもらえたら本望です ＜明＞
What did you think of the Dragon Ball double-header in this week’s issue?! I’ll be satisfied if you enjoyed it twice as much as usual. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週号のＤＢの2本立て，いかがでしたか!?いつもの２倍楽しんでもらえたら本望です ＜明＞ What did you think of the Dragon Ball double-header in this week’s issue?! I’ll be satisfied if you enjoyed it twice as much as usual. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週号のＤＢの2本立て，いかがでしたか!?いつもの２倍楽しんでもらえたら本望です ＜明＞
What did you think of the Dragon Ball double-header in this week’s issue?! I’ll be satisfied if you enjoyed it twice as much as usual. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 謹賀新年！1月10日に僕のイラスト集とコミックがでます。興味ある方は買って下さい ＜明＞ Happy New Year! On January 10th, my illustration collection and a new manga volume will come out. Please buy them if you’re interested. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
謹賀新年！1月10日に僕のイラスト集とコミックがでます。興味ある方は買って下さい ＜明＞
Happy New Year! On January 10th, my illustration collection and a new manga volume will come out. Please buy them if you’re interested. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 1月10日に発売になった僕のイラスト集を買って下さった方ありがとう。感想教えてね ＜明＞ Thank you to those who bought my illustration collection that went on sale January 10th. Please let me know what you think of it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
1月10日に発売になった僕のイラスト集を買って下さった方ありがとう。感想教えてね ＜明＞
Thank you to those who bought my illustration collection that went on sale January 10th. Please let me know what you think of it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ジャンプの漫画家新年会で上京。久しぶりにみんなと会えてとても楽しい１日でした。＜明＞ I went to Tokyo for the Jump artists’ New Year’s party. I got to see everyone for the first time in a while, the whole day was a lot of fun. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ジャンプの漫画家新年会で上京。久しぶりにみんなと会えてとても楽しい１日でした。＜明＞
I went to Tokyo for the Jump artists’ New Year’s party. I got to see everyone for the first time in a while, the whole day was a lot of fun. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｊ（ジャンプ）の新年会の記念品のコードレスホンは大重宝。家中が打合せ場所になり感謝してます ＜明＞ The cordless phone that I got as swag from the Jump New Year’s party is a real lifesaver. I’m thankful, because it means I can have my meetings anywhere in the house. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｊ（ジャンプ）の新年会の記念品のコードレスホンは大重宝。家中が打合せ場所になり感謝してます ＜明＞
The cordless phone that I got as swag from the Jump New Year’s party is a real lifesaver. I’m thankful, because it means I can have my meetings anywhere in the house. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アニメ版DBを掲載中の仏国のドロテＭ（マガジン）の副社長氏と会いました。好評と聞いて感激！！＜明＞ I met the vice-president of Dorothée Magazine, which is currently running [articles on] the Dragon Ball anime in France. He told me it was popular, which moved me deeply!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アニメ版DBを掲載中の仏国のドロテＭ（マガジン）の副社長氏と会いました。好評と聞いて感激！！＜明＞
I met the vice-president of Dorothée Magazine, which is currently running [articles on] the Dragon Ball anime in France. He told me it was popular, which moved me deeply!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 僕のイラスト集の重版が10日に出ます。初版で買えなかった方はこの機会をヨロシクね ＜明＞ Another printing of my illustration collection will come out on the 10th. Those of you who were unable to buy the first printing, now’s your chance. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
僕のイラスト集の重版が10日に出ます。初版で買えなかった方はこの機会をヨロシクね ＜明＞
Another printing of my illustration collection will come out on the 10th. Those of you who were unable to buy the first printing, now’s your chance. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 春休み公開の劇場版『ＤＢＺ』の製作もラストスパート！皆さん，楽しみに待っててね。＜明＞ Production for the Dragon Ball Z movie opening this spring vacation is into the final stretch! Everyone, please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
春休み公開の劇場版『ＤＢＺ』の製作もラストスパート！皆さん，楽しみに待っててね。＜明＞
Production for the Dragon Ball Z movie opening this spring vacation is into the final stretch! Everyone, please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: V・D（バレンタインデイ）のチョコを送ってくださった方，ありがとうございました。おやつに食べてます。＜明＞ Thank you very much to those who sent me chocolate for Valentine’s Day. I’ll have it as a snack. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
V・D（バレンタインデイ）のチョコを送ってくださった方，ありがとうございました。おやつに食べてます。＜明＞
Thank you very much to those who sent me chocolate for Valentine’s Day. I’ll have it as a snack. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今月３月のＨ☆Ｓ（ホップステップ）賞の審査員をします。ボクをワクワクさせてくれる力作待ってます ＜明＞ I’ll be judging for the Hop☆Step Award this month, March. I’m awaiting powerful works that will excite me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今月３月のＨ☆Ｓ（ホップステップ）賞の審査員をします。ボクをワクワクさせてくれる力作待ってます ＜明＞
I’ll be judging for the Hop☆Step Award this month, March. I’m awaiting powerful works that will excite me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 朝の子供番組を子供と一緒に見た後，おやすみといって寝る僕はホントに妙な父親です ＜明＞ I’m a really weird father, saying “good night” and going to sleep after watching the morning children’s shows with my child. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
朝の子供番組を子供と一緒に見た後，おやすみといって寝る僕はホントに妙な父親です ＜明＞
I’m a really weird father, saying “good night” and going to sleep after watching the morning children’s shows with my child. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 僕の大好きなF-1にジャンプが参加！この夢のような企画に，僕はもう興奮してます ＜明＞ Jump is participating in my beloved F-1! I’m already excited about this project, which is like a dream. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
僕の大好きなF-1にジャンプが参加！この夢のような企画に，僕はもう興奮してます ＜明＞
Jump is participating in my beloved F-1! I’m already excited about this project, which is like a dream. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 虫歯を放っておいたら，原稿の〆切直前に痛み爆発！結局，抜くハメに。さいてーです ＜明＞ I left a cavity alone, and it exploded with pain right before my manuscript deadline! In the end, I was forced to get the tooth pulled. This sucks. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
虫歯を放っておいたら，原稿の〆切直前に痛み爆発！結局，抜くハメに。さいてーです ＜明＞
I left a cavity alone, and it exploded with pain right before my manuscript deadline! In the end, I was forced to get the tooth pulled. This sucks. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事場から近所の桜がよく見えます。お花見には行かないけど，これで僕はもう満足！＜明＞ I can see the neighborhood’s cherry blossoms well from my workspace. I won’t be going flower-viewing, but I’m already satisfied with this! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事場から近所の桜がよく見えます。お花見には行かないけど，これで僕はもう満足！＜明＞
I can see the neighborhood’s cherry blossoms well from my workspace. I won’t be going flower-viewing, but I’m already satisfied with this! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 先日、ついに35回目の誕生日が来てしまった。四捨五入すると…考えないことにします ＜明＞ The other day, I finally faced my 35th birthday. Rounding that number would make it… I’m not gonna think about that. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
先日、ついに35回目の誕生日が来てしまった。四捨五入すると…考えないことにします ＜明＞
The other day, I finally faced my 35th birthday. Rounding that number would make it… I’m not gonna think about that. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来週号は久しぶり（！？）の表紙＋巻頭カラー！！力入りました。みなさん、おたのしみに！！＜明＞ In next week’s issue, for the first time in a while (?!), I’ll have the cover plus color pages!! I put a lot of effort into it. Everyone, please look forward to it!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来週号は久しぶり（！？）の表紙＋巻頭カラー！！力入りました。みなさん、おたのしみに！！＜明＞
In next week’s issue, for the first time in a while (?!), I’ll have the cover plus color pages!! I put a lot of effort into it. Everyone, please look forward to it!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年のＧ･Ｗは久しぶりに，休めそうです。この間に物語の先の展開を考えようかな！？＜明＞ This year, it looks like I’ll be able to take my first Golden Week off in a long while. Maybe I’ll think up some later story developments during this time?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年のＧ･Ｗは久しぶりに，休めそうです。この間に物語の先の展開を考えようかな！？＜明＞
This year, it looks like I’ll be able to take my first Golden Week off in a long while. Maybe I’ll think up some later story developments during this time?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: せっかく出した鯉のぼりなので，どうもしまうのが億劫。だから家のはまだ舞ってます ＜明＞ It’s such an annoyance having to put away the koi-nobori that I went through the trouble to put out. That’s why ours is still fluttering in the breeze. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
せっかく出した鯉のぼりなので，どうもしまうのが億劫。だから家のはまだ舞ってます ＜明＞
It’s such an annoyance having to put away the koi-nobori that I went through the trouble to put out. That’s why ours is still fluttering in the breeze. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 赤塚賞の審査会で上京した際に，後楽園に行きました。初めて見る東京ドームに感激。＜明＞ When I went to Tokyo for the judging meeting for the Akatsuka Award, I went to Kōrakuen. I was deeply moved seeing the Tokyo Dome for the first time. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
赤塚賞の審査会で上京した際に，後楽園に行きました。初めて見る東京ドームに感激。＜明＞
When I went to Tokyo for the judging meeting for the Akatsuka Award, I went to Kōrakuen. I was deeply moved seeing the Tokyo Dome for the first time. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 「ファイブマン」と「ウインスペクター」が面白い！子供より夢中になってる私です ＜明＞ Fiveman and Winspector are interesting! I’ve gotten more into them than my kid. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
「ファイブマン」と「ウインスペクター」が面白い！子供より夢中になってる私です ＜明＞
Fiveman and Winspector are interesting! I’ve gotten more into them than my kid. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 梅雨入りの前にもう一度ディズニーランドに行くつもり。それまで天気よ，もってちょ ＜明＞ I’m planning to go to Disneyland one more time before the rainy season starts. Please, weather, hold on until then. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
梅雨入りの前にもう一度ディズニーランドに行くつもり。それまで天気よ，もってちょ ＜明＞
I’m planning to go to Disneyland one more time before the rainy season starts. Please, weather, hold on until then. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: かなり長引いていた虫歯の治療がやっと終了。これで心おきなく仕事に集中できます！？＜明＞ The treatment for my cavity that dragged on has finally ended. With this, maybe I can concentrate on my work without any distractions?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
かなり長引いていた虫歯の治療がやっと終了。これで心おきなく仕事に集中できます！？＜明＞
The treatment for my cavity that dragged on has finally ended. With this, maybe I can concentrate on my work without any distractions?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 後楽園遊園地でファイブマンのショーを遂に見た！素晴らしい生のＡ（アクション）に感心しました。＜明＞ I finally saw the Fiveman stage show at Kōrakuen Amusement Park! I was impressed at the wonderful live action. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
後楽園遊園地でファイブマンのショーを遂に見た！素晴らしい生のＡ（アクション）に感心しました。＜明＞
I finally saw the Fiveman stage show at Kōrakuen Amusement Park! I was impressed at the wonderful live action. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 7/7公開の劇場版『Ｄ･Ｂ･Ｚ』の製作も大車輪で進行中。僕も完成がとても楽しみ！！＜明＞ The Dragon Ball Z movie opening on July 7th is progressing at a frantic pace. I’m also looking forward to its completion! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
7/7公開の劇場版『Ｄ･Ｂ･Ｚ』の製作も大車輪で進行中。僕も完成がとても楽しみ！！＜明＞
The Dragon Ball Z movie opening on July 7th is progressing at a frantic pace. I’m also looking forward to its completion! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 嫌われ者の梅雨も，僕は意外に好き。だってドライブを諦めて仕事に専念できるから！？＜明＞ Surprisingly enough, I actually like the much-maligned rainy season. I mean, I have to give up on driving and devote myself to work?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
嫌われ者の梅雨も，僕は意外に好き。だってドライブを諦めて仕事に専念できるから！？＜明＞
Surprisingly enough, I actually like the much-maligned rainy season. I mean, I have to give up on driving and devote myself to work?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ７日から劇場版『DBZ』の公開！僕も見に行くのを楽しみにしております。＜明＞ At last, the Dragon Ball Z movie opens on the 7th! I’m also looking forward to going to see it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ７日から劇場版『DBZ』の公開！僕も見に行くのを楽しみにしております。＜明＞
At last, the Dragon Ball Z movie opens on the 7th! I’m also looking forward to going to see it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 7/7から公開中の劇場版の「ＤＢＺ」「ＰＩＮＫ」「剣之介さま」みんなも観て下さいネ ＜明＞ Everybody please go see the Dragon Ball Z , Pink , and Ken’nosuke-sama movies that opened on July 7th. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
7/7から公開中の劇場版の「ＤＢＺ」「ＰＩＮＫ」「剣之介さま」みんなも観て下さいネ ＜明＞
Everybody please go see the Dragon Ball Z, Pink, and Ken’nosuke-sama movies that opened on July 7th. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 富士にあるサファリ･パークに行ってきました。天気にも恵まれラッキーな一日でした ＜明＞ I went to the Safari Park in Fuji. It was my lucky day, blessed with good weather. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
富士にあるサファリ･パークに行ってきました。天気にも恵まれラッキーな一日でした ＜明＞
I went to the Safari Park in Fuji. It was my lucky day, blessed with good weather. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 西ドイツＧＰ観戦取材のために仕事をつめています。キツイけど気入れてやってます！＜明＞ I’m cramming in my work for the sake of my report from the West German Grand Prix. It’s tight, but I’m giving it my all! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
西ドイツＧＰ観戦取材のために仕事をつめています。キツイけど気入れてやってます！＜明＞
I’m cramming in my work for the sake of my report from the West German Grand Prix. It’s tight, but I’m giving it my all! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: この号が出る頃は西ドイツＧＰに観戦取材に行っています。その報告は今度するからネ ＜明＞ By the time this issue comes out, I’ll be off doing my report from the West German Grand Prix. I’ll be making an announcement about that later. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
この号が出る頃は西ドイツＧＰに観戦取材に行っています。その報告は今度するからネ ＜明＞
By the time this issue comes out, I’ll be off doing my report from the West German Grand Prix. I’ll be making an announcement about that later. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: お盆休みどころか逆に仕事の進行が早まるこの時期，ハードな毎日をソッと送ってます ＜明＞ Rather than a Bon vacation , these days the pace of my work has actually sped up. I’m passing each hard day quietly. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
お盆休みどころか逆に仕事の進行が早まるこの時期，ハードな毎日をソッと送ってます ＜明＞
Rather than a Bon vacation, these days the pace of my work has actually sped up. I’m passing each hard day quietly. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: イラスト集とアニメムックのカバーが重なって，とってもハードです。期待しててね。＜明＞ My schedule is hard, with the covers of an illustration collection and an anime mook piled on top. Look forward to them, OK? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
イラスト集とアニメムックのカバーが重なって，とってもハードです。期待しててね。＜明＞
My schedule is hard, with the covers of an illustration collection and an anime mook piled on top. Look forward to them, OK? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年のお盆はムックと本誌の仕事でお休みなし。ご先祖の霊の皆さま，ごめんなさい。＜明＞ This year, I had no break for Bon, with work for a mook and this comic. All the spirits of my ancestors, please forgive me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年のお盆はムックと本誌の仕事でお休みなし。ご先祖の霊の皆さま，ごめんなさい。＜明＞
This year, I had no break for Bon, with work for a mook and this comic. All the spirits of my ancestors, please forgive me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最新の家庭用ＴＶゲームのＦ１ものは，なかなか絵も内容もよくできていて面白いね。＜明＞ The newest F-1 home video game is interesting, with both well-done graphics and content. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最新の家庭用ＴＶゲームのＦ１ものは，なかなか絵も内容もよくできていて面白いね。＜明＞
The newest F-1 home video game is interesting, with both well-done graphics and content. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: もうすぐ大注目のイタリアＧＰ！！ＭｃＬ（マクラーレン）対Ｆ（フェラーリ）の見逃せない決戦です。セナ、がんばれ！！＜明＞ All eyes are on the Italy Grand Prix, which is coming up soon!! It’ll be a decisive battle between McLaren and Ferrari that can’t be missed. Senna, do your best!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
もうすぐ大注目のイタリアＧＰ！！ＭｃＬ（マクラーレン）対Ｆ（フェラーリ）の見逃せない決戦です。セナ、がんばれ！！＜明＞
All eyes are on the Italy Grand Prix, which is coming up soon!! It’ll be a decisive battle between McLaren and Ferrari that can’t be missed. Senna, do your best!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 読書の秋という訳じゃないですが，今，仕事のあい間を見て推理小説を読んでいます。＜明＞ It’s not really an “autumn of reading”, but right now, I’ve been reading detective fiction in between my work. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
読書の秋という訳じゃないですが，今，仕事のあい間を見て推理小説を読んでいます。＜明＞
It’s not really an “autumn of reading”, but right now, I’ve been reading detective fiction in between my work. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 9/19（水）に僕のイラスト集の特別版が出ます。もしよかったら本屋さんで見て下さい ＜明＞ On September 19th, a special edition of my illustration collection will come out. Please take a look at the book store if you like. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
9/19（水）に僕のイラスト集の特別版が出ます。もしよかったら本屋さんで見て下さい ＜明＞
On September 19th, a special edition of my illustration collection will come out. Please take a look at the book store if you like. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 9/26にＡ（アニメ）･ムックが出ますＡ（アニメ）だけでなく漫画についても詳しいので僕も役立ててます ＜明＞ An anime mook will come out on September 26th. It’s got details on the manga as well, and not just the anime, so I was able to make myself useful as well. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
9/26にＡ（アニメ）･ムックが出ますＡ（アニメ）だけでなく漫画についても詳しいので僕も役立ててます ＜明＞
An anime mook will come out on September 26th. It’s got details on the manga as well, and not just the anime, so I was able to make myself useful as well. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 庭でヘビを発見。こわごわ捕えてみると，なんとマムシ！！あとでゾ～ッとしましたです ＜明＞ I found a snake in the yard. And when I nervously caught it, it turned out it was a pit viper!! I was trembling after that. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
庭でヘビを発見。こわごわ捕えてみると，なんとマムシ！！あとでゾ～ッとしましたです ＜明＞
I found a snake in the yard. And when I nervously caught it, it turned out it was a pit viper!! I was trembling after that. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 桂正和氏が用もないのに遊びに来た。だが彼は変身Ｈ（ﾋｰﾛｰ）ものに詳しく，話は面白かった。＜明＞ Masakazu Katsura came to visit even though he had no business with me. But he’s knowledgeable about transforming heroes, so talking with him was enjoyable. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
桂正和氏が用もないのに遊びに来た。だが彼は変身Ｈ（ﾋｰﾛｰ）ものに詳しく，話は面白かった。＜明＞
Masakazu Katsura came to visit even though he had no business with me. But he’s knowledgeable about transforming heroes, so talking with him was enjoyable. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ日本ＧＰが近づいてきた！！鈴鹿でＣ（ﾁｬﾝﾋﾟｵﾝ）が決まるはずだけに，もう猛烈に楽しみ！！＜明＞ At last, the Japan Grand Prix is nigh!! Since the champion should be decided at Suzuka, I’m looking forward to this something fierce!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ日本ＧＰが近づいてきた！！鈴鹿でＣ（ﾁｬﾝﾋﾟｵﾝ）が決まるはずだけに，もう猛烈に楽しみ！！＜明＞
At last, the Japan Grand Prix is nigh!! Since the champion should be decided at Suzuka, I’m looking forward to this something fierce!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: D･L（ディズニーランド）と後楽園のファイブマン･ショーを見に東京へ。疲れたけど充実の数日間でした ＜明＞ I went to Tokyo to see Disneyland and the Fiveman show at Kōrakuen. It was tiring, but I made the most of those few days. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
D･L（ディズニーランド）と後楽園のファイブマン･ショーを見に東京へ。疲れたけど充実の数日間でした ＜明＞
I went to Tokyo to see Disneyland and the Fiveman show at Kōrakuen. It was tiring, but I made the most of those few days. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 11月に出るＶジャンプにのる読切を進めているところです。楽しみにしてて下さいね！＜明＞ I’m making progress on the one-shot that will be in the V-Jump coming out in November. Please look forward to it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
11月に出るＶジャンプにのる読切を進めているところです。楽しみにしてて下さいね！＜明＞
I’m making progress on the one-shot that will be in the V-Jump coming out in November. Please look forward to it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 11月の声をきくと，早くも年末年始進行のハードさを思い出します。悲しい性だなあ…＜明＞ When I hear voices saying it’s November, I immediately recall my hard schedule at the year-end crunch. It’s a sad habit… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
11月の声をきくと，早くも年末年始進行のハードさを思い出します。悲しい性だなあ…＜明＞
When I hear voices saying it’s November, I immediately recall my hard schedule at the year-end crunch. It’s a sad habit… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｖジャンプの読切の締切まっ最中！！ＤＢとも重なり厳しいけれど，楽しみにして下さい ＜明＞ I’m coming right down to the wire with my one-shot for V-Jump !! It’s intense with it coming right on top of Dragon Ball , but please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｖジャンプの読切の締切まっ最中！！ＤＢとも重なり厳しいけれど，楽しみにして下さい ＜明＞
I’m coming right down to the wire with my one-shot for V-Jump!! It’s intense with it coming right on top of Dragon Ball, but please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 先日、昔Ａ（アシスタント）をしてくれていたひすゎしクンが結婚しました。よかったね、オメデトウ！！＜明＞ The other day, Hiswashi- kun , who was my assistant way back, got married. That’s great news. Congratulations!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
先日、昔Ａ（アシスタント）をしてくれていたひすゎしクンが結婚しました。よかったね、オメデトウ！！＜明＞
The other day, Hiswashi-kun, who was my assistant way back, got married. That’s great news. Congratulations!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよＶジャンプが出ました。僕の読切，いかがでしたか？感想をきかせてください。＜明＞ V-Jump is out at last. How was my one-shot? Please tell me what you thought of it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよＶジャンプが出ました。僕の読切，いかがでしたか？感想をきかせてください。＜明＞
V-Jump is out at last. How was my one-shot? Please tell me what you thought of it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 先日，女の子が生まれました。仕事と赤ちゃんの世話は大変ですが，毎日充実してます。＜明＞ The other day, my wife gave birth to a girl. It’s tough working and taking care of a baby, but I’m making the most of every day. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
先日，女の子が生まれました。仕事と赤ちゃんの世話は大変ですが，毎日充実してます。＜明＞
The other day, my wife gave birth to a girl. It’s tough working and taking care of a baby, but I’m making the most of every day. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新年５号の表紙撮影のために上京。でも仕事がつまっていてトンボ返りの慌しい１日でした ＜明＞ I went to Tokyo to get my picture taken for the cover of the New Year #5 issue. But I was swamped with work, so I had to come back right after, which made it an insanely hectic day. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新年５号の表紙撮影のために上京。でも仕事がつまっていてトンボ返りの慌しい１日でした ＜明＞
I went to Tokyo to get my picture taken for the cover of the New Year #5 issue. But I was swamped with work, so I had to come back right after, which made it an insanely hectic day. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 巻頭カラーと１色の２本立て，頑張ってかきました。楽しんでもらえれば僕もハッピーです ＜明＞ I worked hard on this color/black-and-white double-header. If you can enjoy it, I’ll be happy as well. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
巻頭カラーと１色の２本立て，頑張ってかきました。楽しんでもらえれば僕もハッピーです ＜明＞
I worked hard on this color/black-and-white double-header. If you can enjoy it, I’ll be happy as well. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 巻頭カラーと１色の２本立て，頑張ってかきました。楽しんでもらえれば僕もハッピーです ＜明＞ I worked hard on this color/black-and-white double-header. If you can enjoy it, I’ll be happy as well. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
巻頭カラーと１色の２本立て，頑張ってかきました。楽しんでもらえれば僕もハッピーです ＜明＞
I worked hard on this color/black-and-white double-header. If you can enjoy it, I’ll be happy as well. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新年おめでとうございます。今年はさらに盛りあがるＤＢにしますので期待してください！＜明＞ Happy New Year! I’ll be making Dragon Ball even more exciting this year, so please look forward to it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新年おめでとうございます。今年はさらに盛りあがるＤＢにしますので期待してください！＜明＞
Happy New Year! I’ll be making Dragon Ball even more exciting this year, so please look forward to it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: たくさんの年賀状ありがとう！！そして今年は僕の干支なのでますます頑張ろうと思います！＜明＞ Thank you for sending me so many New Year’s cards!! Also, this year is my birth sign in the Chinese Zodiac, so I’ll try and do my best! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
たくさんの年賀状ありがとう！！そして今年は僕の干支なのでますます頑張ろうと思います！＜明＞
Thank you for sending me so many New Year’s cards!! Also, this year is my birth sign in the Chinese Zodiac, so I’ll try and do my best! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ジャンプの新年会で今年最初の上京。少し遅い年始の挨拶を漫画家のみんなと交しました。＜明＞ I went to Tokyo for the first time this year for the Jump New Year’s party. I exchanged slightly late New Year greetings with the other artists. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ジャンプの新年会で今年最初の上京。少し遅い年始の挨拶を漫画家のみんなと交しました。＜明＞
I went to Tokyo for the first time this year for the Jump New Year’s party. I exchanged slightly late New Year greetings with the other artists. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 何だか年々，雪と寒さが苦手になっていく私。一般的にこれをジジくさくなると言うのかな ＜明＞ For some reason, I seem to dislike snow and cold more and more each year. I wonder if this is what’s typically called “becoming an old fart”. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
何だか年々，雪と寒さが苦手になっていく私。一般的にこれをジジくさくなると言うのかな ＜明＞
For some reason, I seem to dislike snow and cold more and more each year. I wonder if this is what’s typically called “becoming an old fart”. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 昔の懐しいゴジラ映画を観ています。約20年前という時代の隔たりを超えた面白さに感動…！＜明＞ I’m watching a Godzilla movie from the good old days. I’m moved at the enjoyment of crossing a 20-year gap between generations! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
昔の懐しいゴジラ映画を観ています。約20年前という時代の隔たりを超えた面白さに感動…！＜明＞
I’m watching a Godzilla movie from the good old days. I’m moved at the enjoyment of crossing a 20-year gap between generations! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: この頃人形の顔に興味を持ってます。様々な人形の千差万別な表情。とても勉強になります ＜明＞ These days, I’ve developed an interest in the faces of dolls. The unique expressions on all different sorts of dolls. I’m really learning a lot. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
この頃人形の顔に興味を持ってます。様々な人形の千差万別な表情。とても勉強になります ＜明＞
These days, I’ve developed an interest in the faces of dolls. The unique expressions on all different sorts of dolls. I’m really learning a lot. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ファンの方、Ｖ･Ｄ（バレンタインデー）のチョコ有難う。それにしてもチョコの種類の多さに改めて驚きました。＜明＞ Thank you to my fans for the Valentine’s Day chocolate. Even saying so, I’m amazed once more at the sheer variety of chocolate. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ファンの方、Ｖ･Ｄ（バレンタインデー）のチョコ有難う。それにしてもチョコの種類の多さに改めて驚きました。＜明＞
Thank you to my fans for the Valentine’s Day chocolate. Even saying so, I’m amazed once more at the sheer variety of chocolate. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ジャンプのＴＶＣＦ用のキャラをデザイン中。近いうちにＯＡの予定。僕もとっても楽しみ ＜明＞ I’m in the midst of character designs for a Jump TV commercial. It’s planned to air in the near future. I’m really looking forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ジャンプのＴＶＣＦ用のキャラをデザイン中。近いうちにＯＡの予定。僕もとっても楽しみ ＜明＞
I’m in the midst of character designs for a Jump TV commercial. It’s planned to air in the near future. I’m really looking forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 昨年女の子が生まれたので，３月３日の雛祭りが今年からとても身近な行事になりました。＜明＞ My daughter was born last year, so starting on March 3rd, the Doll Festival will become an event close to my heart. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
昨年女の子が生まれたので，３月３日の雛祭りが今年からとても身近な行事になりました。＜明＞
My daughter was born last year, so starting on March 3rd, the Doll Festival will become an event close to my heart. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ３月９日から劇場版『ＤＢＺ』が公開中！大画面の大迫力を是非とも楽しんでくださいネ！！＜明＞ A Dragon Ball Z movie opened on March 9th! By all means, please enjoy the sheer impact of the big screen!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
３月９日から劇場版『ＤＢＺ』が公開中！大画面の大迫力を是非とも楽しんでくださいネ！！＜明＞
A Dragon Ball Z movie opened on March 9th! By all means, please enjoy the sheer impact of the big screen!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アメリカＧＰに登場した新型ＭｃＬ（マクラレーン）の車。Ｆ（フェラーリ）に似たその形にビックリ。でもカッコイイぞ！＜明＞ McLaren’s new-model car made its appearance at the American Grand Prix. I was surprised at how similar the shape was to Ferrari. But it looks cool!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アメリカＧＰに登場した新型ＭｃＬ（マクラレーン）の車。Ｆ（フェラーリ）に似たその形にビックリ。でもカッコイイぞ！＜明＞
McLaren’s new-model car made its appearance at the American Grand Prix. I was surprised at how similar the shape was to Ferrari. But it looks cool!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 先日カゼをひいてしまった。だけど子供のカゼ薬をのんだらアッサリ完治。不思議でした…＜明＞ The other day, I went and caught a cold. But when I took children’s cold medicine, it went away like that. How strange… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
先日カゼをひいてしまった。だけど子供のカゼ薬をのんだらアッサリ完治。不思議でした…＜明＞
The other day, I went and caught a cold. But when I took children’s cold medicine, it went away like that. How strange… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ今月から長男が幼稚園に通園。これで家の中も少しは静かになって仕事も捗る…！？＜明＞ This month, my son finally starts going to kindergarten. With this, the house will be a bit quieter, and my work will progress more smoothly…?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ今月から長男が幼稚園に通園。これで家の中も少しは静かになって仕事も捗る…！？＜明＞
This month, my son finally starts going to kindergarten. With this, the house will be a bit quieter, and my work will progress more smoothly…?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今一番楽しみなＴＶ番組はＦ１！！次はジェットマン。我ながらギャップに驚いております…＜明＞ Right now, the TV show I like the most is F-1 ! The next is Jetman . I’m surprised at the dissonance between those, if I do say so myself. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今一番楽しみなＴＶ番組はＦ１！！次はジェットマン。我ながらギャップに驚いております…＜明＞
Right now, the TV show I like the most is F-1! The next is Jetman. I’m surprised at the dissonance between those, if I do say so myself. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: うちの愛犬に仔犬が生まれました。世話係は僕。にぎやかになると同時に忙しくもなるな…＜明＞ My dog had puppies. I’m the one in charge of taking care of them. When things get livelier, I also get busier at the same time… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
うちの愛犬に仔犬が生まれました。世話係は僕。にぎやかになると同時に忙しくもなるな…＜明＞
My dog had puppies. I’m the one in charge of taking care of them. When things get livelier, I also get busier at the same time… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: もうすぐＦ１サンマリノＧＰ！果してセナの３連勝なるか…今からワクワク，楽しみです！＜明＞ The F-1 San Marino Grand Prix is almost here! Will Senna be able to manage a third straight win?… I’m looking forward to it with excitement already! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
もうすぐＦ１サンマリノＧＰ！果してセナの３連勝なるか…今からワクワク，楽しみです！＜明＞
The F-1 San Marino Grand Prix is almost here! Will Senna be able to manage a third straight win?… I’m looking forward to it with excitement already! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週の巻頭Ｃ（カラー）を含めＧＷを休む決意で仕事をつめてきましたこの努力をムダにはしないぞ！＜明＞ In my determination to take Golden Week off, I really packed my schedule, including the color pages at the front of this week’s issue. I won’t let this effort go to waste! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週の巻頭Ｃ（カラー）を含めＧＷを休む決意で仕事をつめてきましたこの努力をムダにはしないぞ！＜明＞
In my determination to take Golden Week off, I really packed my schedule, including the color pages at the front of this week’s issue. I won’t let this effort go to waste! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: もっかＶジャンプ用の読切を執筆中！半年ぶりのCASHMAN。何だか懐かしい感じです！？＜明＞ Once again, I’m in the middle of drawing a one-shot for V-Jump ! It’s my first Cashman in half a year. For some reason, I’m feeling nostalgic?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
もっかＶジャンプ用の読切を執筆中！半年ぶりのCASHMAN。何だか懐かしい感じです！？＜明＞
Once again, I’m in the middle of drawing a one-shot for V-Jump! It’s my first Cashman in half a year. For some reason, I’m feeling nostalgic?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ためしにヒゲをそらずに伸ばしてみています。でもキレイにはえそろわず，家では不評…。＜明＞ Just to try it out, I’m letting my mustache grow out instead of shaving it. But it’s not coming in uniformly, and it’s not popular at home… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ためしにヒゲをそらずに伸ばしてみています。でもキレイにはえそろわず，家では不評…。＜明＞
Just to try it out, I’m letting my mustache grow out instead of shaving it. But it’s not coming in uniformly, and it’s not popular at home… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 赤塚賞の審査会で上京。今期は僕が授賞式の時の審査発表役なので。緊張してしまいました ＜明＞ I went to Tokyo for the judging meeting for the Akatsuka Award, since I’m one of the judges who will present the results at the awards ceremony. Now I’m getting nervous. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
赤塚賞の審査会で上京。今期は僕が授賞式の時の審査発表役なので。緊張してしまいました ＜明＞
I went to Tokyo for the judging meeting for the Akatsuka Award, since I’m one of the judges who will present the results at the awards ceremony. Now I’m getting nervous. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ６月６日にDBZのアニメ･ムックⅡが発売されます。ファンの方は，是非見てください。＜明＞ On June 6th, Dragon Ball Z anime mook #2 will go on sale. If you’re a fan, by all means please take a look. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
６月６日にDBZのアニメ･ムックⅡが発売されます。ファンの方は，是非見てください。＜明＞
On June 6th, Dragon Ball Z anime mook #2 will go on sale. If you’re a fan, by all means please take a look. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: キツかったＶジャンプの読切も終わり、久々に車で旅行に。リフレッシュの３日間でした。＜明＞ My tough V-Jump one-shot was finished, so for the first time in a while, I went on a car trip. It was a refreshing three days. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
キツかったＶジャンプの読切も終わり、久々に車で旅行に。リフレッシュの３日間でした。＜明＞
My tough V-Jump one-shot was finished, so for the first time in a while, I went on a car trip. It was a refreshing three days. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 発売中のＶジャンプの読切も，よかったらＤＢ同様に読んでいただければと思います，ハイ。＜明＞ If you’d like, I’d be very happy if you could read my one-shot in the V-Jump on sale now alongside Dragon Ball . <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
発売中のＶジャンプの読切も，よかったらＤＢ同様に読んでいただければと思います，ハイ。＜明＞
If you’d like, I’d be very happy if you could read my one-shot in the V-Jump on sale now alongside Dragon Ball. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ２大賞の授賞式で，赤塚賞の審査発表をしました。アガリはしなかったけど気疲れしました ＜明＞ At the awards ceremony for the two big awards, I presented the results of the judging for the Akatsuka Award. I wasn’t nervous, but it was mentally exhausting. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
２大賞の授賞式で，赤塚賞の審査発表をしました。アガリはしなかったけど気疲れしました ＜明＞
At the awards ceremony for the two big awards, I presented the results of the judging for the Akatsuka Award. I wasn’t nervous, but it was mentally exhausting. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: プラモデルは買い続けているけど作る暇がありません。たまる一方のプラモを見るのは辛い ＜明＞ I’m continuing to buy plastic models, but I don’t have any time to build them. It hurts to watch these plastic models just keep piling up. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
プラモデルは買い続けているけど作る暇がありません。たまる一方のプラモを見るのは辛い ＜明＞
I’m continuing to buy plastic models, but I don’t have any time to build them. It hurts to watch these plastic models just keep piling up. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 劇場版『ＤＢＺ』の製作も大詰め。東映動画の皆さんの頑張りで面白い作品になっているヨ！！＜明＞ Production on the Dragon Ball Z movie is wrapping up. It’s become an interesting work thanks to the hard work of everyone at Toei Animation!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
劇場版『ＤＢＺ』の製作も大詰め。東映動画の皆さんの頑張りで面白い作品になっているヨ！！＜明＞
Production on the Dragon Ball Z movie is wrapping up. It’s become an interesting work thanks to the hard work of everyone at Toei Animation!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 7/20（土）から劇場版の『ＤＢＺ』が，いよいよ公開されますよかったら見に行って下さい。＜明＞ The Dragon Ball Z movie finally comes out on July 20th. If you like, please go see it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
7/20（土）から劇場版の『ＤＢＺ』が，いよいよ公開されますよかったら見に行って下さい。＜明＞
The Dragon Ball Z movie finally comes out on July 20th. If you like, please go see it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 僕の大好きな夏も，ついに本番！今年はもう少し陽やけして健康そうな漫画家になろうかな ＜明＞ At last, my beloved summer is finally here! Maybe this year, I’ll get a bit more of a tan, and become a healthier-looking cartoonist. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
僕の大好きな夏も，ついに本番！今年はもう少し陽やけして健康そうな漫画家になろうかな ＜明＞
At last, my beloved summer is finally here! Maybe this year, I’ll get a bit more of a tan, and become a healthier-looking cartoonist. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族で富士のサファリパークに行く予定。今，そのためにスケジュールをつめてます ＜明＞ I’m planning to go with my family to the Fuji safari park. Right now, I’m packing in my schedule for the sake of that. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族で富士のサファリパークに行く予定。今，そのためにスケジュールをつめてます ＜明＞
I’m planning to go with my family to the Fuji safari park. Right now, I’m packing in my schedule for the sake of that. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 次号の巻頭カラーのために一段とＳ（スケジュール）をつめています。今の僕に休みというものは無縁です…＜明＞ I’m stepping up my schedule a notch for next issue’s color pages at the front of the magazine. Right now, I have no connection to this thing called “rest”. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
次号の巻頭カラーのために一段とＳ（スケジュール）をつめています。今の僕に休みというものは無縁です…＜明＞
I’m stepping up my schedule a notch for next issue’s color pages at the front of the magazine. Right now, I have no connection to this thing called “rest”. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週号の巻頭カラー，いかがでした？いよいよ悟空たちの凄い闘いの始まりです。楽しみに ＜明＞ How were the color pages for this week’s issue? At last, the incredible battle begins for Goku & co. Look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週号の巻頭カラー，いかがでした？いよいよ悟空たちの凄い闘いの始まりです。楽しみに ＜明＞
How were the color pages for this week’s issue? At last, the incredible battle begins for Goku & co. Look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 大阪でのＶジャン･フェス，とても楽しい１日でした。会場に来てくれた皆さん，有難うネ。＜明＞ I had a fun day at the V-Jump Festival in Osaka. Thanks to everyone who came out there. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
大阪でのＶジャン･フェス，とても楽しい１日でした。会場に来てくれた皆さん，有難うネ。＜明＞
I had a fun day at the V-Jump Festival in Osaka. Thanks to everyone who came out there. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年の夏カゼは高熱と頭痛が３日は続くひどいもの。奥さんもこれにかかり，つぎは僕…！？＜明＞ This year’s summer cold is a bad one, with a high fever and headache that continues for three days. My wife caught it, and I’m next…?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年の夏カゼは高熱と頭痛が３日は続くひどいもの。奥さんもこれにかかり，つぎは僕…！？＜明＞
This year’s summer cold is a bad one, with a high fever and headache that continues for three days. My wife caught it, and I’m next…?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: Ｓ･Ｆ（スーパーファミコン）の新作ソフトを何本かいただいているのに，時間がない。何ともツライ情況です。＜明＞ I’ve received several copies of the new game for the Super Famicom, but I have no time for it. What a rough state of affairs. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
Ｓ･Ｆ（スーパーファミコン）の新作ソフトを何本かいただいているのに，時間がない。何ともツライ情況です。＜明＞
I’ve received several copies of the new game for the Super Famicom, but I have no time for it. What a rough state of affairs. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 日本ＧＰまで，あと１か月余り。盛りあがるＦ１に，もう目が離せません。Ｆ１は面白い！！＜明＞ There’s just a little over a month to go until the Japan Grand Prix. I just can’t take my eyes off this exciting F-1. F-1 is interesting!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
日本ＧＰまで，あと１か月余り。盛りあがるＦ１に，もう目が離せません。Ｆ１は面白い！！＜明＞
There’s just a little over a month to go until the Japan Grand Prix. I just can’t take my eyes off this exciting F-1. F-1 is interesting!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 夜，仕事をしていると虫の声がよく聞こえる。仕事中のＢＧＭとして，仲々いいものです。＜明＞ When I work at night, I can hear the sound of insects well. As background music while I work, it’s quite nice. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
夜，仕事をしていると虫の声がよく聞こえる。仕事中のＢＧＭとして，仲々いいものです。＜明＞
When I work at night, I can hear the sound of insects well. As background music while I work, it’s quite nice. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事場の整理をしようと思うけど，物の多さに圧倒され，またも諦めの心境。情けないなあ ＜明＞ I’d like to tidy up my workspace, but I’m overwhelmed by how much stuff there is, and I end up in a state of resignation once again. So pitiful. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事場の整理をしようと思うけど，物の多さに圧倒され，またも諦めの心境。情けないなあ ＜明＞
I’d like to tidy up my workspace, but I’m overwhelmed by how much stuff there is, and I end up in a state of resignation once again. So pitiful. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: うちの子の幼稚園の運動会がもうすぐあります。親の競技もあるので運動不足な僕は心配…＜明＞ My kid’s kindergarten sports meet is coming up soon. There’s a competition for the parents as well, which is a worry for someone out of shape like me… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
うちの子の幼稚園の運動会がもうすぐあります。親の競技もあるので運動不足な僕は心配…＜明＞
My kid’s kindergarten sports meet is coming up soon. There’s a competition for the parents as well, which is a worry for someone out of shape like me… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ日本ＧＰが迫ってきた！僕も今回は鈴鹿に観戦に行くつもり。とても楽しみです！＜明＞ At last, the Japanese Grand Prix is almost here! This time, I’m also planning to go watch at Suzuka. I’m really looking forward to it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ日本ＧＰが迫ってきた！僕も今回は鈴鹿に観戦に行くつもり。とても楽しみです！＜明＞
At last, the Japanese Grand Prix is almost here! This time, I’m also planning to go watch at Suzuka. I’m really looking forward to it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 11月発売予定のＶジャンプ。そのための読切を執筆するためスケジュールを只今調整中です ＜明＞ V-Jump is planned to go on sale in November. Right now, I’m adjusting my schedule in order to pen a one-shot for it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
11月発売予定のＶジャンプ。そのための読切を執筆するためスケジュールを只今調整中です ＜明＞
V-Jump is planned to go on sale in November. Right now, I’m adjusting my schedule in order to pen a one-shot for it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年は週末の旅に台風がやって来て予定していた秋の旅行も中止。結局，仕事だけが残った…＜明＞ This year, a typhoon came during my planned weekend trip, so my autumn travel plans were cancelled. In the end, only work remained… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年は週末の旅に台風がやって来て予定していた秋の旅行も中止。結局，仕事だけが残った…＜明＞
This year, a typhoon came during my planned weekend trip, so my autumn travel plans were cancelled. In the end, only work remained… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: そろそろ年末スケジュールを考える時期になってきた。１年とは，なんて早いんでしょう…＜明＞ It’s gotten to be about time for me to think about my year-end schedule. The year goes by so fast… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
そろそろ年末スケジュールを考える時期になってきた。１年とは，なんて早いんでしょう…＜明＞
It’s gotten to be about time for me to think about my year-end schedule. The year goes by so fast… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 13日発売のＶジャンプに載る『キャッシュマン』。こちらの方も読んで下さいよろしくね。＜明＞ Cashman will be in the V-Jump coming out on the 13th. Please read that, too. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
13日発売のＶジャンプに載る『キャッシュマン』。こちらの方も読んで下さいよろしくね。＜明＞
Cashman will be in the V-Jump coming out on the 13th. Please read that, too. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ寒くなって来ました。暑い夏が大好きな僕には，日一日とツラクなって行きます！？＜明＞ It’s finally gotten cold. For someone like me, who loves the hot summer, every day gets tougher?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ寒くなって来ました。暑い夏が大好きな僕には，日一日とツラクなって行きます！？＜明＞
It’s finally gotten cold. For someone like me, who loves the hot summer, every day gets tougher?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新年号の表紙の撮影で上京。毎年やっているのに，いまだにちょっと気恥しいなあ，アレは。＜明＞ I went to Tokyo to get my picture taken for the New Year issue. I do this every year, but it’s still a bit embarrassing. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新年号の表紙の撮影で上京。毎年やっているのに，いまだにちょっと気恥しいなあ，アレは。＜明＞
I went to Tokyo to get my picture taken for the New Year issue. I do this every year, but it’s still a bit embarrassing. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 街に出ると，デパートや商店の装飾もクリスマス一色。何となく華やいだ気分になります。＜明＞ When I went out into town, the department store and the shops were all draped in Christmas decorations. It seems to make for a more colorful mood. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
街に出ると，デパートや商店の装飾もクリスマス一色。何となく華やいだ気分になります。＜明＞
When I went out into town, the department store and the shops were all draped in Christmas decorations. It seems to make for a more colorful mood. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年末年始号のスケジュールのまっただ中，今は早くクリスマスと正月休みが来てほしい ＜明＞ I’m right in the midst of my schedule for the end-of-year and new-year issues. I want Christmas and the New Year holiday to get here soon. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年末年始号のスケジュールのまっただ中，今は早くクリスマスと正月休みが来てほしい ＜明＞
I’m right in the midst of my schedule for the end-of-year and new-year issues. I want Christmas and the New Year holiday to get here soon. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週は巻頭Ｃ（カラー），次号は増Ｐと，頑張っています。どうぞ楽しみにしていてくださいね！＜明＞ I’m doing my best right now, with color pages at the beginning of the magazine this week, and extra pages next week. Please look forward to them. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週は巻頭Ｃ（カラー），次号は増Ｐと，頑張っています。どうぞ楽しみにしていてくださいね！＜明＞
I’m doing my best right now, with color pages at the beginning of the magazine this week, and extra pages next week. Please look forward to them. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: あけましておめでとうございます。今年もドラゴンボール盛りあげますのでヨロシクね ＜明＞ Happy New Year. I’m going to make Dragon Ball exciting this year as well, so please check it out. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
あけましておめでとうございます。今年もドラゴンボール盛りあげますのでヨロシクね ＜明＞
Happy New Year. I’m going to make Dragon Ball exciting this year as well, so please check it out. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 大分よくなったけれど，年末にひいたカゼがまだ尾をひいています。早く治ってほしい ＜明＞ It’s gotten much better, but the cold I caught at the end of the year is still lingering. I want to get better soon. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
大分よくなったけれど，年末にひいたカゼがまだ尾をひいています。早く治ってほしい ＜明＞
It’s gotten much better, but the cold I caught at the end of the year is still lingering. I want to get better soon. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 恒例のジャンプ新年会に出席。僕にとって，その年の最初の上京は，いつもこの会です ＜明＞ I attended the customary Jump New Year’s party. For me, my first trip to Tokyo of the year is always for this event. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
恒例のジャンプ新年会に出席。僕にとって，その年の最初の上京は，いつもこの会です ＜明＞
I attended the customary Jump New Year’s party. For me, my first trip to Tokyo of the year is always for this event. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 担当氏はスキーが出来ると大喜びの冬ですが，僕は寒さが大の苦手なので辛い季節です ＜明＞ My editor is overjoyed with winter as long as he can ski, but I’m really no good with cold, so it’s a rough season for me. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
担当氏はスキーが出来ると大喜びの冬ですが，僕は寒さが大の苦手なので辛い季節です ＜明＞
My editor is overjoyed with winter as long as he can ski, but I’m really no good with cold, so it’s a rough season for me. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 未来から来た新たな怪物のデザインに，今苦労してます。でも楽しみにしてて下さいね ＜明＞ Right now, I’m struggling with the design for the new monster that came from the future. But please look forward to it, OK? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
未来から来た新たな怪物のデザインに，今苦労してます。でも楽しみにしてて下さいね ＜明＞
Right now, I’m struggling with the design for the new monster that came from the future. But please look forward to it, OK? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 春休み公開のＤＢＺの製作も大詰め。東映動画スタッフの皆さん頑張って下さい ＜明＞ Production for the Dragon Ball Z movie opening during spring break is wrapping up. To all the staff at Toei Animation, please do your best. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
春休み公開のＤＢＺの製作も大詰め。東映動画スタッフの皆さん頑張って下さい ＜明＞
Production for the Dragon Ball Z movie opening during spring break is wrapping up. To all the staff at Toei Animation, please do your best. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 劇場公開された映画のビデオ化が，最近早い。劇場に行かない僕には嬉しい傾向です。＜明＞ Recently, movies come out on video pretty quickly after they’ve opened in theaters. It’s a trend I’m grateful for, since I don’t go to the movies. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
劇場公開された映画のビデオ化が，最近早い。劇場に行かない僕には嬉しい傾向です。＜明＞
Recently, movies come out on video pretty quickly after they’ve opened in theaters. It’s a trend I’m grateful for, since I don’t go to the movies. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: バレンタインデーのチョコを送って下さった方，どうも有難う！食べさせてもらいます＜明＞ Thank you to those who sent me chocolate for Valentine’s Day! I’ll have the pleasure of eating it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
バレンタインデーのチョコを送って下さった方，どうも有難う！食べさせてもらいます＜明＞
Thank you to those who sent me chocolate for Valentine’s Day! I’ll have the pleasure of eating it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 3月7日から劇場版ＤＢＺが公開されます。本誌やＴＶとは一味違う迫力に乞ご期待！！＜明＞ A Dragon Ball Z movie will open on March 7th. Please look forward to a kind of impact that’s a bit different from the comic and the TV show. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
3月7日から劇場版ＤＢＺが公開されます。本誌やＴＶとは一味違う迫力に乞ご期待！！＜明＞
A Dragon Ball Z movie will open on March 7th. Please look forward to a kind of impact that’s a bit different from the comic and the TV show. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年はまだそれほど花粉症に悩まされていません。花粉が少ないのか，ホッとしてます ＜明＞ This year, I haven’t been troubled that much by hay-fever yet. Perhaps it’s because there’s not much pollen, but I’m relieved. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年はまだそれほど花粉症に悩まされていません。花粉が少ないのか，ホッとしてます ＜明＞
This year, I haven’t been troubled that much by hay-fever yet. Perhaps it’s because there’s not much pollen, but I’m relieved. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 3月18日発売のJN（ジャンプノベル）で，堀井雄二氏との対談が載っています。興味のある人は読んでネ ＜明＞ There’s a talk between me and Yūji Hori’i in the issue of Jump Novel coming out on March 18th. Give it a read if you’re interested. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
3月18日発売のJN（ジャンプノベル）で，堀井雄二氏との対談が載っています。興味のある人は読んでネ ＜明＞
There’s a talk between me and Yūji Hori’i in the issue of Jump Novel coming out on March 18th. Give it a read if you’re interested. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 担当氏と僕はともに車好きですが，車の形に関しては全くの対立意見。頑固者同士です ＜明＞ Both my editor and I like cars, but with regards to the type of car, we’re completely at odds with each other. We’re both so stubborn. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
担当氏と僕はともに車好きですが，車の形に関しては全くの対立意見。頑固者同士です ＜明＞
Both my editor and I like cars, but with regards to the type of car, we’re completely at odds with each other. We’re both so stubborn. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 幼稚園が春休みに入ったので朝から息子の相手で大騒ぎ。可愛いけれどかなり疲れます ＜明＞ Kindergarten has now entered spring vacation, so from morning on, I’m making a ruckus with my son. He’s cute, but he wears me right out. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
幼稚園が春休みに入ったので朝から息子の相手で大騒ぎ。可愛いけれどかなり疲れます ＜明＞
Kindergarten has now entered spring vacation, so from morning on, I’m making a ruckus with my son. He’s cute, but he wears me right out. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 僕のＦ･Ｃ（ファンクラブ）の有無について問い合わせがありますが現在，正式なものはありませんです ＜明＞ I’ve gotten inquiries as to whether I have a fan club or not; currently, there is no official one. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
僕のＦ･Ｃ（ファンクラブ）の有無について問い合わせがありますが現在，正式なものはありませんです ＜明＞
I’ve gotten inquiries as to whether I have a fan club or not; currently, there is no official one. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年もお花見には行かず，満開の桜を見逃してしまった…。来年こそはキチンと見るぞ ＜明＞ I didn’t go flower-viewing this year either, and missed out on the cherry blossoms in full bloom…. Next year for sure, I’ll see them properly. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年もお花見には行かず，満開の桜を見逃してしまった…。来年こそはキチンと見るぞ ＜明＞
I didn’t go flower-viewing this year either, and missed out on the cherry blossoms in full bloom…. Next year for sure, I’ll see them properly. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: スペインの新聞からあちらで開催される漫画週間に向けた取材を受けました。ビックリ ＜明＞ I was interviewed by a Spanish newspaper for a comics week they hold over there. That was a surprise. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
スペインの新聞からあちらで開催される漫画週間に向けた取材を受けました。ビックリ ＜明＞
I was interviewed by a Spanish newspaper for a comics week they hold over there. That was a surprise. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事のスケジュールの都合で、今年の連載表彰式は欠席。他の先生方と会えず残念…。＜明＞ Due to my work schedule, I won’t be attending this year’s [ Jump ] serial awards ceremony. I won’t be able to see the other artists, which is too bad… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事のスケジュールの都合で、今年の連載表彰式は欠席。他の先生方と会えず残念…。＜明＞
Due to my work schedule, I won’t be attending this year’s [Jump] serial awards ceremony. I won’t be able to see the other artists, which is too bad… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事のスケジュールの都合で、今年の連載表彰式は欠席。他の先生方と会えず残念…。＜明＞ Due to my work schedule, I won’t be attending this year’s [ Jump ] serial awards ceremony. I won’t be able to see the other artists, which is too bad… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事のスケジュールの都合で、今年の連載表彰式は欠席。他の先生方と会えず残念…。＜明＞
Due to my work schedule, I won’t be attending this year’s [Jump] serial awards ceremony. I won’t be able to see the other artists, which is too bad… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ＧＷ（ゴールデンウィーク）は仕事にふりわけたので、ちょっと遅れてこれから一休みしようかなと思ってます ＜明＞ I allotted a portion of my Golden Week to work, so I think I might take a little break a bit later. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ＧＷ（ゴールデンウィーク）は仕事にふりわけたので、ちょっと遅れてこれから一休みしようかなと思ってます ＜明＞
I allotted a portion of my Golden Week to work, so I think I might take a little break a bit later. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 連載350回突破記念にいただいた記念カップ。その大きく重たいのには驚きました。＜明＞ I received a commemorative cup in recognition of passing 350 chapters. I was surprised at how big and heavy it is. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
連載350回突破記念にいただいた記念カップ。その大きく重たいのには驚きました。＜明＞
I received a commemorative cup in recognition of passing 350 chapters. I was surprised at how big and heavy it is. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 6歳の子がロックマン４を軽々とこなすのを見てア然。子供の反射神経集中力には脱帽 ＜明＞ I’m speechless at how my six-year-old child so easily handles Rockman 4 . My hat’s off to children’s reflexes and concentration. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
6歳の子がロックマン４を軽々とこなすのを見てア然。子供の反射神経集中力には脱帽 ＜明＞
I’m speechless at how my six-year-old child so easily handles Rockman 4. My hat’s off to children’s reflexes and concentration. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 6月期のＨ・Ｓ（ホップステップ）賞の審査をさせてもらいます。新人の力（パワー）を見られると思うと嬉しいな！＜明＞ I’ll be judging for the June Hop Step Award. When I think that I’ll be able to look on the power of these newcomers, it makes me happy! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
6月期のＨ・Ｓ（ホップステップ）賞の審査をさせてもらいます。新人の力（パワー）を見られると思うと嬉しいな！＜明＞
I’ll be judging for the June Hop Step Award. When I think that I’ll be able to look on the power of these newcomers, it makes me happy! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 交通安全絵本協力のお礼に，ホンダから，ＮＳＸの模型をいただき，大変喜んでいます ＜明＞ As thanks for my cooperation on a traffic-safety picture book, I received a model NSX from Honda, which made me extremely happy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
交通安全絵本協力のお礼に，ホンダから，ＮＳＸの模型をいただき，大変喜んでいます ＜明＞
As thanks for my cooperation on a traffic-safety picture book, I received a model NSX from Honda, which made me extremely happy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: モナコＧＰのセナとマンセルのバトルには興奮しました！Ｆ１の面白さを改めて確認！＜明＞ I was excited at the battle between Senna and Mansell at the Monaco Grand Prix! I’ve reconfirmed my enjoyment of F-1. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
モナコＧＰのセナとマンセルのバトルには興奮しました！Ｆ１の面白さを改めて確認！＜明＞
I was excited at the battle between Senna and Mansell at the Monaco Grand Prix! I’ve reconfirmed my enjoyment of F-1. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ついに梅雨の季節。暑い夏は大好きだけど，天気が悪くムシ暑いだけの梅雨はイヤです ＜明＞ The rainy season is finally here. I love the hot summer, but I hate the monsoon, where it’s nothing but bad weather and humidity. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ついに梅雨の季節。暑い夏は大好きだけど，天気が悪くムシ暑いだけの梅雨はイヤです ＜明＞
The rainy season is finally here. I love the hot summer, but I hate the monsoon, where it’s nothing but bad weather and humidity. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 2大漫画賞の審査会は欠席しましたが，授賞式には出席した。久しぶりの上京でした。＜明＞ I was absent from the judging meetings for the two big manga awards, but I attended the awards ceremonies. It was my first trip to Tokyo in a while. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
2大漫画賞の審査会は欠席しましたが，授賞式には出席した。久しぶりの上京でした。＜明＞
I was absent from the judging meetings for the two big manga awards, but I attended the awards ceremonies. It was my first trip to Tokyo in a while. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 編集部にあるマックのコンピュータを見て，今さらながら現代のハイテクに驚きました ＜明＞ I saw a Mac computer in the editorial department, and while I’m late to the party, I was astonished at the high technology of modern times. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
編集部にあるマックのコンピュータを見て，今さらながら現代のハイテクに驚きました ＜明＞
I saw a Mac computer in the editorial department, and while I’m late to the party, I was astonished at the high technology of modern times. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: たまに出かけようかなと思うと台風が来たり，梅雨がぶり返したりで大雨。ついてない。＜明＞ Sometimes, when I think about going out, a typhoon comes, or the rainy season comes back and it pours. I don’t have much luck. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
たまに出かけようかなと思うと台風が来たり，梅雨がぶり返したりで大雨。ついてない。＜明＞
Sometimes, when I think about going out, a typhoon comes, or the rainy season comes back and it pours. I don’t have much luck. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ＴＶのＤＢＺが高視聴率ということで，フジテレビから感謝状をいただきました。感激。＜明＞ Since the Dragon Ball Z TV show is getting high ratings, I got a thank-you letter from Fuji TV. I’m so deeply moved. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ＴＶのＤＢＺが高視聴率ということで，フジテレビから感謝状をいただきました。感激。＜明＞
Since the Dragon Ball Z TV show is getting high ratings, I got a thank-you letter from Fuji TV. I’m so deeply moved. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 只今劇場版『ＤＢＺ』が公開中です。本誌ともＴＶとも一味違った劇場版も観て下さいね ＜明＞ Right now, a Dragon Ball Z film is playing in theaters. Please see the movie, which is a bit different from both the manga and the TV show. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
只今劇場版『ＤＢＺ』が公開中です。本誌ともＴＶとも一味違った劇場版も観て下さいね ＜明＞
Right now, a Dragon Ball Z film is playing in theaters. Please see the movie, which is a bit different from both the manga and the TV show. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 次号はＤＢの巻頭カラー＋トランクスの読切。進行はきついけど，来週をお楽しみに！！＜明＞ Next issue is Dragon Ball with color pages at the front of the magazine, plus a Trunks one-shot. My schedule is tight, but please look forward to next week! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
次号はＤＢの巻頭カラー＋トランクスの読切。進行はきついけど，来週をお楽しみに！！＜明＞
Next issue is Dragon Ball with color pages at the front of the magazine, plus a Trunks one-shot. My schedule is tight, but please look forward to next week! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週のトランクスの読切を原作にしたTVのDBZ特別版が年内に放送される予定です ＜明＞ A Dragon Ball Z TV special based on this week’s Trunks one-shot is planned for broadcast within the year. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週のトランクスの読切を原作にしたTVのDBZ特別版が年内に放送される予定です ＜明＞
A Dragon Ball Z TV special based on this week’s Trunks one-shot is planned for broadcast within the year. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年の夏はやっぱりスゴク暑い殆どつけっぱなしのクーラー，モーターは大丈夫かな！？＜明＞ Summer this year really has been incredibly hot, so the air conditioning is on almost all the time. I wonder if the motor will be all right?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年の夏はやっぱりスゴク暑い殆どつけっぱなしのクーラー，モーターは大丈夫かな！？＜明＞
Summer this year really has been incredibly hot, so the air conditioning is on almost all the time. I wonder if the motor will be all right?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年の夏は去年に比べて蝉の声が少なかったように思う。何か不自然な感じの夏でした ＜明＞ Compared to last summer, I don’t think there were as many cicadas chirping this year. This summer felt unnatural, for some reason. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年の夏は去年に比べて蝉の声が少なかったように思う。何か不自然な感じの夏でした ＜明＞
Compared to last summer, I don’t think there were as many cicadas chirping this year. This summer felt unnatural, for some reason. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 僕には決まった夏休みがないので，混む時期を避けて出かけられます。これは利点です ＜明＞ I don’t have a set summer vacation, so I can avoid the times when it’s crowded. That’s a perk. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
僕には決まった夏休みがないので，混む時期を避けて出かけられます。これは利点です ＜明＞
I don’t have a set summer vacation, so I can avoid the times when it’s crowded. That’s a perk. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年の残暑はきつかったので，ジュース類を飲む量も大増加。結局その分汗も大増加！？＜明＞ The late summer heat this year was pretty bad, so the amount of sugary drinks I imbibe has greatly increased. And in the end, my sweat also increased by the same amount?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年の残暑はきつかったので，ジュース類を飲む量も大増加。結局その分汗も大増加！？＜明＞
The late summer heat this year was pretty bad, so the amount of sugary drinks I imbibe has greatly increased. And in the end, my sweat also increased by the same amount?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 9月は休日が多いので，その分仕事の進行が厳しくて，なかなかツライ月となってます ＜明＞ I have a lot of days off in September, so the pace of my work is just as hectic, and it’s gotten to be a pretty rough month. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
9月は休日が多いので，その分仕事の進行が厳しくて，なかなかツライ月となってます ＜明＞
I have a lot of days off in September, so the pace of my work is just as hectic, and it’s gotten to be a pretty rough month. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: うっかり仕事場の整理を始めたら収拾がつかなくなり大慌て。大混乱の部屋に呆然です ＜明＞ When I absentmindedly started tidying up my workspace, I failed to get it under control and got really agitated. I’m speechless at this incredibly cluttered room. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
うっかり仕事場の整理を始めたら収拾がつかなくなり大慌て。大混乱の部屋に呆然です ＜明＞
When I absentmindedly started tidying up my workspace, I failed to get it under control and got really agitated. I’m speechless at this incredibly cluttered room. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事部屋に新しいFAXを入れました。でも高機能すぎて使いこなすのは絶望的です…。＜明＞ I’ve installed a new fax machine in my workroom. But it’s got so many functions that I have no hope of using it to the fullest… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事部屋に新しいFAXを入れました。でも高機能すぎて使いこなすのは絶望的です…。＜明＞
I’ve installed a new fax machine in my workroom. But it’s got so many functions that I have no hope of using it to the fullest… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 11月発売のＶジャンプ用に新作を描いてますが Ｓ （ スケジュール ） との厳しい闘いの毎日。でも 乞 （ こう ） ご期待！＜明＞ I’m drawing a new work for the V-Jump going on sale in November, but every day is an intense battle with my schedule. But please look forward to it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
11月発売のＶジャンプ用に新作を描いてますがＳ（スケジュール）との厳しい闘いの毎日。でも乞（こう）ご期待！＜明＞
I’m drawing a new work for the V-Jump going on sale in November, but every day is an intense battle with my schedule. But please look forward to it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事に追われ折角のＤＱＶも終わりまでやっていません。この誘惑を断つのは大変です ＜明＞ Hounded by work, I still haven’t made it all the way to the end of Dragon Quest V . It’s tough resisting this temptation. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事に追われ折角のＤＱＶも終わりまでやっていません。この誘惑を断つのは大変です ＜明＞
Hounded by work, I still haven’t made it all the way to the end of Dragon Quest V. It’s tough resisting this temptation. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 米国（アメリカ）にＣＧの最新技術を見学に行きました。その絵の凄さは，まさに驚きの一言でした ＜明＞ I went to America to see the latest in CG technology. The amazing images were, in a word, astounding. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
米国（アメリカ）にＣＧの最新技術を見学に行きました。その絵の凄さは，まさに驚きの一言でした ＜明＞
I went to America to see the latest in CG technology. The amazing images were, in a word, astounding. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 11月4日発売のＶジャンプにオールＣ（カラー）の新作をかいてます。そちらも是非読んでね！＜明＞ I’ve drawn a new full-color work for the V-Jump going on sale November 4th. Please read that, too! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
11月4日発売のＶジャンプにオールＣ（カラー）の新作をかいてます。そちらも是非読んでね！＜明＞
I’ve drawn a new full-color work for the V-Jump going on sale November 4th. Please read that, too! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 長い間たくさんのアドバイスをしてくれた担当の近藤氏が他の編集部へ。感謝してます！＜明＞ My editor Kondō, who’s given me lots of advice over a long time, is going to a different editorial department. I’m grateful for him! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
長い間たくさんのアドバイスをしてくれた担当の近藤氏が他の編集部へ。感謝してます！＜明＞
My editor Kondō, who’s given me lots of advice over a long time, is going to a different editorial department. I’m grateful for him! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 担当が，近藤氏から武田氏に替わった。超強力コンビで頑張りますので期待して下さい ＜明＞ My editor has changed from Kondō to Takeda. We’ll do our best as a super-powerful duo, so please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
担当が，近藤氏から武田氏に替わった。超強力コンビで頑張りますので期待して下さい ＜明＞
My editor has changed from Kondō to Takeda. We’ll do our best as a super-powerful duo, so please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新しい担当さんは打ち合わせにきて，その巨体にビックリ。ひょっとして体重3ケタ…！？＜明＞ My new editor came to have a meeting, and I was surprised at his huge size. I think his weight might even run to 3 digits…?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新しい担当さんは打ち合わせにきて，その巨体にビックリ。ひょっとして体重3ケタ…！？＜明＞
My new editor came to have a meeting, and I was surprised at his huge size. I think his weight might even run to 3 digits…?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: バンダイの方から，昔の名機といわれた飛行機のビデオをいただいた。見てますよ～！！＜明＞ I received a video from someone at Bandai of a plane that was once called a marvel. I’ll watch it~!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
バンダイの方から，昔の名機といわれた飛行機のビデオをいただいた。見てますよ～！！＜明＞
I received a video from someone at Bandai of a plane that was once called a marvel. I’ll watch it~!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来春公開予定の劇場版ドラゴンボールＺとDr.スランプの脚本を読んだ。面白いぞっ！！＜明＞ I read the scripts for the Dragon Ball Z and Dr. Slump movies opening this coming spring. They’re interesting!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来春公開予定の劇場版ドラゴンボールＺとDr.スランプの脚本を読んだ。面白いぞっ！！＜明＞
I read the scripts for the Dragon Ball Z and Dr. Slump movies opening this coming spring. They’re interesting!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 3・4合併号では，400回突破記念で，超サイヤ人ＴＣ（テレホンカード）を大プレゼント。楽しみにしててね ＜明＞ In commemoration of passing 400 chapters, there’ll be a big present of a Super Saiyan phone card in the #3/4 double issue. Look forward to it, OK? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
3・4合併号では，400回突破記念で，超サイヤ人ＴＣ（テレホンカード）を大プレゼント。楽しみにしててね ＜明＞
In commemoration of passing 400 chapters, there’ll be a big present of a Super Saiyan phone card in the #3/4 double issue. Look forward to it, OK? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 25周年記念企画のためにぼくがデザインしたゲームロボが完成。涙の対面をはたしたぞ ＜明＞ The game-robot I designed for the [ Jump ] 25th Anniversary project is complete. We had a tearful meeting. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
25周年記念企画のためにぼくがデザインしたゲームロボが完成。涙の対面をはたしたぞ ＜明＞
The game-robot I designed for the [Jump] 25th Anniversary project is complete. We had a tearful meeting. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ’93年の初夢、きみはどんな夢を見たかな。’93年がきみにとっていい年でありますように ＜明＞ I wonder what your first dream of 1993 was. May 1993 be a good year for you. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
’93年の初夢、きみはどんな夢を見たかな。’93年がきみにとっていい年でありますように ＜明＞
I wonder what your first dream of 1993 was. May 1993 be a good year for you. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来春発売になるＤＢＺ２のソフトは，すごい！！まるでアニメのような臨場感なのだ！！＜明＞ The Dragon Ball Z 2 game going on sale this coming spring is awesome!! It feels just like you’re there in the anime!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来春発売になるＤＢＺ２のソフトは，すごい！！まるでアニメのような臨場感なのだ！！＜明＞
The Dragon Ball Z 2 game going on sale this coming spring is awesome!! It feels just like you’re there in the anime!! <Akira>
