wj_toriyama_text: 正月休みにはりきりすぎて，大風邪をひきました。みんなも体にはくれぐれも注意して ＜明＞ I went overboard during the New Year break, and caught a bad cold. Everyone, please take good care of your health. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
正月休みにはりきりすぎて，大風邪をひきました。みんなも体にはくれぐれも注意して ＜明＞
I went overboard during the New Year break, and caught a bad cold. Everyone, please take good care of your health. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 「天下一試験会」の例題を読んだが，作者にも難問！？う～んどんな人が優勝するんだ！？＜明＞ I read the example questions for the “Tenka’ichi Test Tournament”, and there were ones that were difficult even for the author?! Hmmm… I wonder what sort of person will be the champion?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
「天下一試験会」の例題を読んだが，作者にも難問！？う～んどんな人が優勝するんだ！？＜明＞
I read the example questions for the “Tenka’ichi Test Tournament”, and there were ones that were difficult even for the author?! Hmmm… I wonder what sort of person will be the champion?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 休日は仕事場にこもってプラモ作り。ひょっとして仕事中より睡眠時間は短いかも…！？＜明＞ On the days off, I locked myself away in the workroom and build plastic models. I might even have gotten less sleep than when I’m working…?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
休日は仕事場にこもってプラモ作り。ひょっとして仕事中より睡眠時間は短いかも…！？＜明＞
On the days off, I locked myself away in the workroom and build plastic models. I might even have gotten less sleep than when I’m working…?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 撮影にきたジャンプのカメラマン氏と腕時計の話に花が咲く。時計マニアは奥が深いっス ＜明＞ The photographer who came to take pictures for Jump and I had a lively conversation on the subject of wristwatches. Watch-mania runs deep. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
撮影にきたジャンプのカメラマン氏と腕時計の話に花が咲く。時計マニアは奥が深いっス ＜明＞
The photographer who came to take pictures for Jump and I had a lively conversation on the subject of wristwatches. Watch-mania runs deep. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: アシスタントくんが来る時以外は仕事場でなく居間に。コタツＳ（スペース）があれば仕事はできる ＜明＞ Apart from when my Assistant- kun comes over, I’ve been working in the living room instead of my workroom. As long as I have space for the kotatsu , I can work. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
アシスタントくんが来る時以外は仕事場でなく居間に。コタツＳ（スペース）があれば仕事はできる ＜明＞
Apart from when my Assistant-kun comes over, I’ve been working in the living room instead of my workroom. As long as I have space for the kotatsu, I can work. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週末からＤＢＺの映画が，日曜から天下一試験会が始まる。ＤＢのイベント目白押しだ ＜明＞ The Dragon Ball Z movie opens this weekend, and the “Tenka’ichi Test Tournament” starts on Sunday. Dragon Ball events are just jostling each other for prominence. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週末からＤＢＺの映画が，日曜から天下一試験会が始まる。ＤＢのイベント目白押しだ ＜明＞
The Dragon Ball Z movie opens this weekend, and the “Tenka’ichi Test Tournament” starts on Sunday. Dragon Ball events are just jostling each other for prominence. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 一度仕事場を整理したのだがまたガレージキットやプラモデルでいっぱいになってきた ＜明＞ I got my workroom all tidied up once, but it’s gotten full of garage kits and plastic models again. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
一度仕事場を整理したのだがまたガレージキットやプラモデルでいっぱいになってきた ＜明＞
I got my workroom all tidied up once, but it’s gotten full of garage kits and plastic models again. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 飼い犬のハスキー犬，冬場なのでシャンプーしなかったらとても臭い。本人は平気か？＜明＞ In the winter, my Siberian husky dog gets really smelly if we don’t shampoo her. Doesn’t it bother her? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
飼い犬のハスキー犬，冬場なのでシャンプーしなかったらとても臭い。本人は平気か？＜明＞
In the winter, my Siberian husky dog gets really smelly if we don’t shampoo her. Doesn’t it bother her? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 久しぶりにディズニーランドへ行ってきました。面白いけどやっぱり人混みは合わん！！＜明＞ I went to Disneyland for the first time in a while. It’s fun, but I’m definitely not suited to large crowds!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
久しぶりにディズニーランドへ行ってきました。面白いけどやっぱり人混みは合わん！！＜明＞
I went to Disneyland for the first time in a while. It’s fun, but I’m definitely not suited to large crowds!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 誌上バトルの問題を見た。作者にも，難しい問題ばかり。ファンの知識欲には脱帽だ！！＜明＞ I looked at the questions for the magazine battle. It was a bunch of questions that were difficult even for the author. I doff my cap to the fans’ thirst for knowledge!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
誌上バトルの問題を見た。作者にも，難しい問題ばかり。ファンの知識欲には脱帽だ！！＜明＞
I looked at the questions for the magazine battle. It was a bunch of questions that were difficult even for the author. I doff my cap to the fans’ thirst for knowledge!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族とグアムへ行ってきました。一足早く夏先取り。といっても夏は夏で休むけどね…＜明＞ I went to Guam with my family. We managed to get our summer in before everyone else. Even so, I’ll take a summer break in summer, too… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族とグアムへ行ってきました。一足早く夏先取り。といっても夏は夏で休むけどね…＜明＞
I went to Guam with my family. We managed to get our summer in before everyone else. Even so, I’ll take a summer break in summer, too… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 息子もこの四月からピカピカの新入生。大きなランドセルを見るにつけ感慨もひとしお。＜明＞ Starting this April, my son will be a shiny new first-grader. Every time I look at that big backpack, I get more emotional. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
息子もこの四月からピカピカの新入生。大きなランドセルを見るにつけ感慨もひとしお。＜明＞
Starting this April, my son will be a shiny new first-grader. Every time I look at that big backpack, I get more emotional. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族でグアム旅行。まだまだ夜は寒い日本だけど，常夏の島は，昼も夜も暑かった～！＜明＞ The family trip to Guam. Nights in Japan are still cold, but on that island of everlasting summer, both day and night were hot~! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族でグアム旅行。まだまだ夜は寒い日本だけど，常夏の島は，昼も夜も暑かった～！＜明＞
The family trip to Guam. Nights in Japan are still cold, but on that island of everlasting summer, both day and night were hot~! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: またまた風邪をひいてしまった。体は丈夫な方なんだけど。でも齢のせいにはしたくない ＜明＞ I went and caught another cold. Even though my body’s on the resilient side. But I don’t want to chalk it up to age. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
またまた風邪をひいてしまった。体は丈夫な方なんだけど。でも齢のせいにはしたくない ＜明＞
I went and caught another cold. Even though my body’s on the resilient side. But I don’t want to chalk it up to age. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ悟飯が主人公のお話がスタート。どうなるか，作者の僕も，今から楽しみです。＜明＞ At last, the story has begun with Gohan as the main character. Even I, the author, am looking forward to seeing what will happen. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ悟飯が主人公のお話がスタート。どうなるか，作者の僕も，今から楽しみです。＜明＞
At last, the story has begun with Gohan as the main character. Even I, the author, am looking forward to seeing what will happen. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 悟空の人形の原型をチェックした。40cmほどの大きさで，さすがにリアルで迫力あるぞ ＜明＞ I checked the mold for a Goku figure. It’s about 40 cm big, and naturally, it seems real and has impact. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
悟空の人形の原型をチェックした。40cmほどの大きさで，さすがにリアルで迫力あるぞ ＜明＞
I checked the mold for a Goku figure. It’s about 40 cm big, and naturally, it seems real and has impact. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 6月4日に，お待ちかね！ドラゴンボールJCの34巻がでます。さぁ本屋さんへ急げ！？＜明＞ On June 4th, Dragon Ball ’s long-awaited Jump Comics Volume 34 will come out. So hurry on over to the bookstore?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
6月4日に，お待ちかね！ドラゴンボールJCの34巻がでます。さぁ本屋さんへ急げ！？＜明＞
On June 4th, Dragon Ball’s long-awaited Jump Comics Volume 34 will come out. So hurry on over to the bookstore?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: お待たせしましたが，いよいよ６月４日（金）にＤＢの第34巻が発売される。買ってちょ。＜明＞ Sorry for the wait; on June 4th (Fri.) Dragon Ball Volume 34 will go on sale at last. Please buy it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
お待たせしましたが，いよいよ６月４日（金）にＤＢの第34巻が発売される。買ってちょ。＜明＞
Sorry for the wait; on June 4th (Fri.) Dragon Ball Volume 34 will go on sale at last. Please buy it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: なにかのインタビューで，座右の銘は？と聞かれ，おもわず”楽”と答えてしまった私…。＜明＞ At some interview or other, I was asked what my motto was, and without thinking, replied “Ease”… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
なにかのインタビューで，座右の銘は？と聞かれ，おもわず”楽”と答えてしまった私…。＜明＞
At some interview or other, I was asked what my motto was, and without thinking, replied “Ease”… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 25周年記念イベントの体感ゲームはすごいぞ。まるで悟空になった気分。期待してちょ ＜明＞ The fighting-experience game at the [ Jump ] 25th Anniversary event is awesome. It feels just like you’ve become Goku. Please look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
25周年記念イベントの体感ゲームはすごいぞ。まるで悟空になった気分。期待してちょ ＜明＞
The fighting-experience game at the [Jump] 25th Anniversary event is awesome. It feels just like you’ve become Goku. Please look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 夏に家族が海外旅行を計画中こういうのってパンフレット集めの時期が一番面白いよね ＜明＞ My family is planning to travel overseas this summer. For this sort of thing, the part where you’re collecting all the brochures is the most fun. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
夏に家族が海外旅行を計画中こういうのってパンフレット集めの時期が一番面白いよね ＜明＞
My family is planning to travel overseas this summer. For this sort of thing, the part where you’re collecting all the brochures is the most fun. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 編集プロダクションの若い人達と，色ぬりについての話に花が咲く。ああ面白かった！！＜明＞ I had an engaging conversation about applying color with some young people in editorial production. Ah, that was interesting!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
編集プロダクションの若い人達と，色ぬりについての話に花が咲く。ああ面白かった！！＜明＞
I had an engaging conversation about applying color with some young people in editorial production. Ah, that was interesting!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ジャンプマルチワールドは，どうもすごいらしい。時間があれば，僕もぜひ行きたいな ＜明＞ Apparently, Jump Multimedia World is really amazing. I also want to go if I have the time. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ジャンプマルチワールドは，どうもすごいらしい。時間があれば，僕もぜひ行きたいな ＜明＞
Apparently, Jump Multimedia World is really amazing. I also want to go if I have the time. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 夏休みを目前にひかえ，夢はグ～ンと膨む。でもその前にたまってる仕事をこなさねば ＜明＞ With summer vacation before my very eyes, my dreams swell ever larger. But before that, I have to take care of all this work that’s piling up. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
夏休みを目前にひかえ，夢はグ～ンと膨む。でもその前にたまってる仕事をこなさねば ＜明＞
With summer vacation before my very eyes, my dreams swell ever larger. But before that, I have to take care of all this work that’s piling up. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ25周年のＶＲ（バァーチャルリアリティ）ゲームの全貌が明らかに。とにかくすごい。絶対体験するべし！！＜明＞ At last, the full picture on the [ Jump ] 25th Anniversary virtual-reality game has become clear. At any rate, it’s awesome. You absolutely have to try it!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ25周年のＶＲ（バァーチャルリアリティ）ゲームの全貌が明らかに。とにかくすごい。絶対体験するべし！！＜明＞
At last, the full picture on the [Jump] 25th Anniversary virtual-reality game has become clear. At any rate, it’s awesome. You absolutely have to try it!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 海外で出版されてるＤＢの見本が届く。様々な文字があり改めてその多さにビックリ！＜明＞ I received a sample of the Dragon Ball that’s published overseas. There were a variety of different alphabets, and I was surprised all over again at how many there were! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
海外で出版されてるＤＢの見本が届く。様々な文字があり改めてその多さにビックリ！＜明＞
I received a sample of the Dragon Ball that’s published overseas. There were a variety of different alphabets, and I was surprised all over again at how many there were! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 夏休み遊び第一弾で南の島へ行ってきた。第二弾，第三弾と計画中。さァ遊ぶぞ～っ！！＜明＞ For Stage One of my summer vacation revelry, I went to a southern isle. Stages Two and Three are in the planning stages. Now, I’m gonna have some fun~!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
夏休み遊び第一弾で南の島へ行ってきた。第二弾，第三弾と計画中。さァ遊ぶぞ～っ！！＜明＞
For Stage One of my summer vacation revelry, I went to a southern isle. Stages Two and Three are in the planning stages. Now, I’m gonna have some fun~!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今月中に，絶対東京ディズニーランドへ行く！…でも夏休み中だから混んでるかなァ ＜明＞ I am absolutely going to Tokyo Disneyland some time this month! …But I suppose it’ll be crowded since it’s summer vacation. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今月中に，絶対東京ディズニーランドへ行く！…でも夏休み中だから混んでるかなァ ＜明＞
I am absolutely going to Tokyo Disneyland some time this month! …But I suppose it’ll be crowded since it’s summer vacation. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 僕も出席したマルチワールドが大盛況の内に幕。東京だけじゃなく他でも開催したいね ＜明＞ Multimedia World, which I also attended, closed out as a roaring success. I want it to be held in other places than just Tokyo. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
僕も出席したマルチワールドが大盛況の内に幕。東京だけじゃなく他でも開催したいね ＜明＞
Multimedia World, which I also attended, closed out as a roaring success. I want it to be held in other places than just Tokyo. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: やりたいことが山ほどある。ああ人間が一生眠らなくてすむなら，どんなにいいことか ＜明＞ I have a mountain’s worth of things I want to do. How good it would be if only humans could go their entire lives without sleeping. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
やりたいことが山ほどある。ああ人間が一生眠らなくてすむなら，どんなにいいことか ＜明＞
I have a mountain’s worth of things I want to do. How good it would be if only humans could go their entire lives without sleeping. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今，No.44の表紙とNo.45のポスターの色を塗ってます。それにしてもＰＰ（パソコンペインティング）は楽だったなァ ＜明＞ Right now, I’m doing the coloring for the cover of issue #44 and the poster for issue #45. Even so, painting by computer sure was easy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今，No.44の表紙とNo.45のポスターの色を塗ってます。それにしてもＰＰ（パソコンペインティング）は楽だったなァ ＜明＞
Right now, I’m doing the coloring for the cover of issue #44 and the poster for issue #45. Even so, painting by computer sure was easy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 『ＰＩＮＧＵ』というペンギンを知ってるかな。粘土細工のとってもかわい～ヤツなんだよ ＜明＞ I wonder if you know of a penguin called “Pingu”. He’s this really cute thing made out of clay. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
『ＰＩＮＧＵ』というペンギンを知ってるかな。粘土細工のとってもかわい～ヤツなんだよ ＜明＞
I wonder if you know of a penguin called “Pingu”. He’s this really cute thing made out of clay. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ＴＶ版のオープニングとエンディングの曲が変わった。けっこう気にいってるんですよ ＜明＞ The opening and ending songs for the TV show have changed. I like them quite a bit. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ＴＶ版のオープニングとエンディングの曲が変わった。けっこう気にいってるんですよ ＜明＞
The opening and ending songs for the TV show have changed. I like them quite a bit. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 車のデザインをしてると何日でも徹夜できる。ひょっとして仕事より好きだったりして。＜明＞ When I’m designing vehicles, I can stay up however many days it takes. Maybe I like it more than my work. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
車のデザインをしてると何日でも徹夜できる。ひょっとして仕事より好きだったりして。＜明＞
When I’m designing vehicles, I can stay up however many days it takes. Maybe I like it more than my work. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 仕事しながら映画を見る。字幕ものだと仕事がはかどらないので，吹替えもの専門です ＜明＞ I watch movies while I work. If it’s something with subtitles, then I won’t make progress with my work, so I do dubs only. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
仕事しながら映画を見る。字幕ものだと仕事がはかどらないので，吹替えもの専門です ＜明＞
I watch movies while I work. If it’s something with subtitles, then I won’t make progress with my work, so I do dubs only. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今から年末にむけてのスケジュール調整で頭がいたい。ああこの体がふたつあったなら ＜明＞ My head hurts from adjusting my schedule looking ahead from now to the end of the year. Ah, if only I had two bodies. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今から年末にむけてのスケジュール調整で頭がいたい。ああこの体がふたつあったなら ＜明＞
My head hurts from adjusting my schedule looking ahead from now to the end of the year. Ah, if only I had two bodies. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今週末から「ジャンプゲームワールド」が始まる。ＤＢＺ超武闘伝もあるので楽しみだ ＜明＞ “Jump Game World” starts this weekend. Dragon Ball Z: Super Butōden will be there too, so I’m looking forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今週末から「ジャンプゲームワールド」が始まる。ＤＢＺ超武闘伝もあるので楽しみだ ＜明＞
“Jump Game World” starts this weekend. Dragon Ball Z: Super Butōden will be there too, so I’m looking forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 12月からはじまる鳥山明展。自分の名前の展覧会ではずかしいけど，みんな見にきてね ＜明＞ The Akira Toriyama Exhibition starts in December. An art exhibit with my name on it is embarrassing, but everyone please come see it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
12月からはじまる鳥山明展。自分の名前の展覧会ではずかしいけど，みんな見にきてね ＜明＞
The Akira Toriyama Exhibition starts in December. An art exhibit with my name on it is embarrassing, but everyone please come see it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 正月まとめて休みをとるために現在猛執筆中!?休むためならどんなムチャもヘッチャラ。＜明＞ In order to take one lump vacation for New Year’s, I’m currently drawing like crazy?! If it’s for the sake of taking a break, I’ll go to any excess, no sweat. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
正月まとめて休みをとるために現在猛執筆中!?休むためならどんなムチャもヘッチャラ。＜明＞
In order to take one lump vacation for New Year’s, I’m currently drawing like crazy?! If it’s for the sake of taking a break, I’ll go to any excess, no sweat. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来月の４日から川崎市民ミュージアムで，いよいよ鳥山明展が始まる。近くの人来てね ＜明＞ On the 4th of next month, the Akira Toriyama Exhibition will begin at last at the Kawasaki City Museum. If you’re nearby, please come. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来月の４日から川崎市民ミュージアムで，いよいよ鳥山明展が始まる。近くの人来てね ＜明＞
On the 4th of next month, the Akira Toriyama Exhibition will begin at last at the Kawasaki City Museum. If you’re nearby, please come. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 鳥山展でしか見られないアニメを見た。ＣＧと実写とアニメの合成ですごい迫力だった ＜明＞ I saw the anime that can’t be seen anywhere except at the Toriyama Exhibition. It was a blend of CG, live-action, and animation, and had incredible impact. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
鳥山展でしか見られないアニメを見た。ＣＧと実写とアニメの合成ですごい迫力だった ＜明＞
I saw the anime that can’t be seen anywhere except at the Toriyama Exhibition. It was a blend of CG, live-action, and animation, and had incredible impact. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新年３・４合併号で，久々に巻頭カラーを描きます。スケジュール調整もバッチリだ！！＜明＞ For the New Year #3/4 double-issue, I’m drawing color pages for the beginning of the magazine for the first time in a while. My schedule adjustment is right on the money!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新年３・４合併号で，久々に巻頭カラーを描きます。スケジュール調整もバッチリだ！！＜明＞
For the New Year #3/4 double-issue, I’m drawing color pages for the beginning of the magazine for the first time in a while. My schedule adjustment is right on the money!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新年5･6号の表紙撮影のため久しぶりに東京へ。東急ハンズでいっぱい買い物をしたよ ＜明＞ I went to Tokyo for the first time in a while to be photographed for the cover of the New Year #5/6 issue. I did lots of shopping at Tokyu Hands. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新年5･6号の表紙撮影のため久しぶりに東京へ。東急ハンズでいっぱい買い物をしたよ ＜明＞
I went to Tokyo for the first time in a while to be photographed for the cover of the New Year #5/6 issue. I did lots of shopping at Tokyu Hands. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 鳥山展の問い合わせが多くてうれしい。くわしくは本誌ポスター裏と，70Pを見てちょ！＜明＞ There have been a lot of inquiries about the Toriyama Exhibition, which makes me happy. For more details, look on the back of the poster and on page 70 in this issue! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
鳥山展の問い合わせが多くてうれしい。くわしくは本誌ポスター裏と，70Pを見てちょ！＜明＞
There have been a lot of inquiries about the Toriyama Exhibition, which makes me happy. For more details, look on the back of the poster and on page 70 in this issue! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 毎度のことながらなんとなく気分のせわしくなる師走。身も心もひきしまる思いであります。＜明＞ It’s always like this, but in December the mood is hectic. Both my body and my mind feel tense. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
毎度のことながらなんとなく気分のせわしくなる師走。身も心もひきしまる思いであります。＜明＞
It’s always like this, but in December the mood is hectic. Both my body and my mind feel tense. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今日からしばらく冬休みに入ります。仕事もあげたし，暮れから正月の慌しさを楽しむぞ！！＜明＞ Starting today, I’ll be on winter vacation for a while. I’ve finished up my work, so I’ll enjoy the hectic pace of the year-end and New Year’s!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今日からしばらく冬休みに入ります。仕事もあげたし，暮れから正月の慌しさを楽しむぞ！！＜明＞
Starting today, I’ll be on winter vacation for a while. I’ve finished up my work, so I’ll enjoy the hectic pace of the year-end and New Year’s!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ふふふ，実は８号まで原稿をあげてあるのだ。だからまだもう少し正月気分でいられるぞ。＜明＞ Oh ho ho, I’ve actually finished the manuscripts up through issue #8. So, I can stay in the New Year’s mindset for a little while longer. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ふふふ，実は８号まで原稿をあげてあるのだ。だからまだもう少し正月気分でいられるぞ。＜明＞
Oh ho ho, I’ve actually finished the manuscripts up through issue #8. So, I can stay in the New Year’s mindset for a little while longer. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 世話になった友人の突然の死にいささかショック…ドラゴンボールが本当にあったらなぁ…＜明＞ The sudden death of a friend who’d been there for me has left me rather shocked… If only the Dragon Balls really existed… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
世話になった友人の突然の死にいささかショック…ドラゴンボールが本当にあったらなぁ…＜明＞
The sudden death of a friend who’d been there for me has left me rather shocked… If only the Dragon Balls really existed… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 3週間にわたる長期休暇も終わり，また今年もバリバリ描くぞ～～！？いう夢を見た。正夢！？＜明＞ My long 3-week vacation has ended, and now I’m gonna draw tons again this year~~?! …is what I dreamed. Maybe it’ll come true?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
3週間にわたる長期休暇も終わり，また今年もバリバリ描くぞ～～！？いう夢を見た。正夢！？＜明＞
My long 3-week vacation has ended, and now I’m gonna draw tons again this year~~?! …is what I dreamed. Maybe it’ll come true?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 川崎市市民ミュージアムの「鳥山展」が入場者５万人に迫る勢いという。人事のように吃驚！＜明＞ They say they’re already closing in on 50,000 attendees for the “Toriyama Exhibition” at the Kawasaki City Museum. I’m stunned as though it had nothing to do with me! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
川崎市市民ミュージアムの「鳥山展」が入場者５万人に迫る勢いという。人事のように吃驚！＜明＞
They say they’re already closing in on 50,000 attendees for the “Toriyama Exhibition” at the Kawasaki City Museum. I’m stunned as though it had nothing to do with me! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今年は，久びさに冬らしい冬だ。寒いのはきらいだけどね。この分だと夏は夏らしくなるね ＜明＞ This year has been the first winter in a while that’s actually wintry. I hate the cold, though. With a winter like this, summer’s going to be summery. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今年は，久びさに冬らしい冬だ。寒いのはきらいだけどね。この分だと夏は夏らしくなるね ＜明＞
This year has been the first winter in a while that’s actually wintry. I hate the cold, though. With a winter like this, summer’s going to be summery. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 早くも夏のアニメフェアの相談がきた。春のアニメフェアもまだなのに。映画って大変なんだ。＜明＞ I’m already getting consulted on this summer’s Anime Fair. The spring Anime Fair hasn’t even started yet. Movies are tough. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
早くも夏のアニメフェアの相談がきた。春のアニメフェアもまだなのに。映画って大変なんだ。＜明＞
I’m already getting consulted on this summer’s Anime Fair. The spring Anime Fair hasn’t even started yet. Movies are tough. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 深夜遅くまで冬季オリンピックの中継をみる。普段は興味ないけど，やっぱり何か興奮する。＜明＞ I’ve been watching the Winter Olympics live broadcast until the wee hours of the morning. Normally, I have no interest, but for some reason it really gets me pumped. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
深夜遅くまで冬季オリンピックの中継をみる。普段は興味ないけど，やっぱり何か興奮する。＜明＞
I’ve been watching the Winter Olympics live broadcast until the wee hours of the morning. Normally, I have no interest, but for some reason it really gets me pumped. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: もうすぐ子供の春休み，旅行の計画を立ててはいるけど混むんですよね。この時期はどこも。＜明＞ Very soon, it’ll be my kids’ spring vacation; we’ve made travel plans, but of course it’ll be crowded. Everywhere is during this period. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
もうすぐ子供の春休み，旅行の計画を立ててはいるけど混むんですよね。この時期はどこも。＜明＞
Very soon, it’ll be my kids’ spring vacation; we’ve made travel plans, but of course it’ll be crowded. Everywhere is during this period. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いよいよ今週末から東映アニメフェアのＤＢＺとＤｒ.スランプが始まる。絶対見にいってチョ。＜明＞ At long last, the Toei Anime Fair starts this weekend, featuring Dragon Ball Z and Dr. Slump . Absolutely please go see it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いよいよ今週末から東映アニメフェアのＤＢＺとＤｒ.スランプが始まる。絶対見にいってチョ。＜明＞
At long last, the Toei Anime Fair starts this weekend, featuring Dragon Ball Z and Dr. Slump. Absolutely please go see it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 大好評だった鳥山展の第２弾は４月９日からいわき市で始まる。またまた皆見にいってチョ。＜明＞ The second leg of the Toriyama Exhibition, which has been really popular, starts on April 9th in Iwaki City. Once again, everybody please go see it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
大好評だった鳥山展の第２弾は４月９日からいわき市で始まる。またまた皆見にいってチョ。＜明＞
The second leg of the Toriyama Exhibition, which has been really popular, starts on April 9th in Iwaki City. Once again, everybody please go see it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ああ，もっと田舎の，湖畔の瀟洒な家に移り住みたい…けど，家族の猛反対をうけ実現不能。＜明＞ Ah, I want to go live in an elegant house by a lake, further into the countryside… but considering my family is adamantly opposed, it’ll never happen. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ああ，もっと田舎の，湖畔の瀟洒な家に移り住みたい…けど，家族の猛反対をうけ実現不能。＜明＞
Ah, I want to go live in an elegant house by a lake, further into the countryside… but considering my family is adamantly opposed, it’ll never happen. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ああ，どこかひなびた温泉に行って，ゆっくり体を休めたい…。よし今度の土日に行くか！！＜明＞ Ah, I just want to go to some rustic hot spring, and rest my weary body… All right, why don’t I go this weekend?!! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ああ，どこかひなびた温泉に行って，ゆっくり体を休めたい…。よし今度の土日に行くか！！＜明＞
Ah, I just want to go to some rustic hot spring, and rest my weary body… All right, why don’t I go this weekend?!! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 魔人ブウのモデルが編集部にいるのではと聞かれるが、はっきりいっていない!?と思う…。＜明＞ People ask me if there might be a model for Majin Boo in the editorial department, but to be clear, there isn’t!? I think… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
魔人ブウのモデルが編集部にいるのではと聞かれるが、はっきりいっていない!?と思う…。＜明＞
People ask me if there might be a model for Majin Boo in the editorial department, but to be clear, there isn’t!? I think… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ようやく暖かい日がやってきた。なによりも寒さのきらいなボクなので，心までウキウキする。＜明＞ Warm days are here at last. I hate the cold more than anything, so it cheers me right to the core. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ようやく暖かい日がやってきた。なによりも寒さのきらいなボクなので，心までウキウキする。＜明＞
Warm days are here at last. I hate the cold more than anything, so it cheers me right to the core. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今月の4日に発売になったコミックス37巻が好調だそうだ。売り切れる前に本屋さんへＧｏ！＜明＞ Comics [i.e., tankōbon ] Volume 37, which went on sale on the 4th of this month, is apparently doing well. Get to the book store before they sell out! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今月の4日に発売になったコミックス37巻が好調だそうだ。売り切れる前に本屋さんへＧｏ！＜明＞
Comics [i.e., tankōbon] Volume 37, which went on sale on the 4th of this month, is apparently doing well. Get to the book store before they sell out! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今月はじめから始まった鳥山展のいわき大会も大盛況だそうだ。ありがたい。５月29日まで ＜明＞ I hear that the Iwaki leg of the Toriyama Exhibition, which started at the beginning of this month, is a rousing success. I’m grateful. It goes until May 29th. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今月はじめから始まった鳥山展のいわき大会も大盛況だそうだ。ありがたい。５月29日まで ＜明＞
I hear that the Iwaki leg of the Toriyama Exhibition, which started at the beginning of this month, is a rousing success. I’m grateful. It goes until May 29th. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: さぁGWだ!?思ったら家族サービスでクタクタ。ひょっとして仕事の方が楽かもしれない。＜明＞ Now then, Golden Week?! …I thought, but I was worn ragged with family business. Working might have been easier. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
さぁGWだ!?思ったら家族サービスでクタクタ。ひょっとして仕事の方が楽かもしれない。＜明＞
Now then, Golden Week?! …I thought, but I was worn ragged with family business. Working might have been easier. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: みんなから寄せられたオモチャのアイデアの審査をしました。プロまっ青のものもあり脱帽！＜明＞ I did the judging for the toy ideas everyone sent in. Some of them were really professionally done, so hats off to you! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
みんなから寄せられたオモチャのアイデアの審査をしました。プロまっ青のものもあり脱帽！＜明＞
I did the judging for the toy ideas everyone sent in. Some of them were really professionally done, so hats off to you! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: おもちゃの審査，赤塚賞の審査と最近ちょくちょく東京に出てます。僕って意外と審査好き ＜明＞ Between judging for toys and judging for the Akatsuka Award, I’ve been going to Tokyo an awful lot lately. I actually like judging, surprisingly enough. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
おもちゃの審査，赤塚賞の審査と最近ちょくちょく東京に出てます。僕って意外と審査好き ＜明＞
Between judging for toys and judging for the Akatsuka Award, I’ve been going to Tokyo an awful lot lately. I actually like judging, surprisingly enough. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 飼い犬が体調を崩して入院した。峠を越して退院し，ひと安心。犬だって家族同然だものね。＜明＞ My dog got sick and went to the vet. She got over the worst of it and is back home, so I’m relieved. Even the dog is a part of the family, after all. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
飼い犬が体調を崩して入院した。峠を越して退院し，ひと安心。犬だって家族同然だものね。＜明＞
My dog got sick and went to the vet. She got over the worst of it and is back home, so I’m relieved. Even the dog is a part of the family, after all. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ＤＢのおもちゃ募集した時のはがきをみる。個人的に好きだったのはブウのやかん。秀逸だ ＜明＞ I’m looking at the postcards for when they took entries for Dragon Ball toys. I personally liked the Boo kettle. It was excellent. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ＤＢのおもちゃ募集した時のはがきをみる。個人的に好きだったのはブウのやかん。秀逸だ ＜明＞
I’m looking at the postcards for when they took entries for Dragon Ball toys. I personally liked the Boo kettle. It was excellent. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 第2回の鳥山展いわき会場も無事閉幕。総入場者数５万人の大盛況だったとか。うれしいね。＜明＞ The curtain has now fallen without incident on the site of the Toriyama Exhibition’s second leg, in Iwaki. The total number of attendees was apparently a whopping 50,000 people. That makes me happy. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
第2回の鳥山展いわき会場も無事閉幕。総入場者数５万人の大盛況だったとか。うれしいね。＜明＞
The curtain has now fallen without incident on the site of the Toriyama Exhibition’s second leg, in Iwaki. The total number of attendees was apparently a whopping 50,000 people. That makes me happy. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 第3回の鳥山展は，8月から高松市で行われる。展示数も最大だそうで今年の夏は燃えるっス。＜明＞ The third round of the Toriyama Exhibition will be held in Takamatsu City starting in March. I hear the number of items on display will be the biggest yet, so this summer will be on fire. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
第3回の鳥山展は，8月から高松市で行われる。展示数も最大だそうで今年の夏は燃えるっス。＜明＞
The third round of the Toriyama Exhibition will be held in Takamatsu City starting in March. I hear the number of items on display will be the biggest yet, so this summer will be on fire. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: DBのコミックス38巻は8月発売決定。カバー絵もあげたし，発売までもう少し待っててね。＜明＞ Volume 38 of Dragon Ball is set for release in August. I’ve finished the cover illustration as well, so please wait just a bit longer until it goes on sale.  <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
DBのコミックス38巻は8月発売決定。カバー絵もあげたし，発売までもう少し待っててね。＜明＞
Volume 38 of Dragon Ball is set for release in August. I’ve finished the cover illustration as well, so please wait just a bit longer until it goes on sale. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今月末の家族旅行にむけてスケジュール調整中。8月の合併号の巻頭カラーもあり…大変だよ。＜明＞ Right now I’m in the midst of adjusting my schedule for the sake of a family trip at the end of the month. I have color pages at the front of the magazine for the August double issue, too… It’s tough. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今月末の家族旅行にむけてスケジュール調整中。8月の合併号の巻頭カラーもあり…大変だよ。＜明＞
Right now I’m in the midst of adjusting my schedule for the sake of a family trip at the end of the month. I have color pages at the front of the magazine for the August double issue, too… It’s tough. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ブウというキャラが勝手に動きはじめた。ひょっとしてすごいキャラに成長するかも！？＜明＞ The character Boo has made a move all on his own. Perhaps he might even grow into someone awesome?! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ブウというキャラが勝手に動きはじめた。ひょっとしてすごいキャラに成長するかも！？＜明＞
The character Boo has made a move all on his own. Perhaps he might even grow into someone awesome?! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族そろって沖縄旅行にいってきた。日差しは強いけど，真青な海。しばし体をリフレッシュ。＜明＞ The whole family went down to Okinawa. The sun’s rays were intense, but the sea was pure blue. I refreshed my body for a little while. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族そろって沖縄旅行にいってきた。日差しは強いけど，真青な海。しばし体をリフレッシュ。＜明＞
The whole family went down to Okinawa. The sun’s rays were intense, but the sea was pure blue. I refreshed my body for a little while. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 沖縄旅行は楽しかったけど，そのためにスケジュールがギュウヅメ状態に。楽あれば苦あり。＜明＞ The Okinawa trip was fun, but because of that, my schedule is now packed in tight. Can’t have pleasure without pain. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
沖縄旅行は楽しかったけど，そのためにスケジュールがギュウヅメ状態に。楽あれば苦あり。＜明＞
The Okinawa trip was fun, but because of that, my schedule is now packed in tight. Can’t have pleasure without pain. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: スケジュール調整をまちがえ１本余計にネームを作成。おかげで20日間休めるが、痛し痒し。＜明＞ I screwed up in adjusting my schedule, and ended up making a whole extra storyboard. Thanks to that, I can take a 20-day break, but it’s a mixed blessing. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
スケジュール調整をまちがえ１本余計にネームを作成。おかげで20日間休めるが、痛し痒し。＜明＞
I screwed up in adjusting my schedule, and ended up making a whole extra storyboard. Thanks to that, I can take a 20-day break, but it’s a mixed blessing. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ＶジャンプのＶフェス大阪大会に出席しました。堀井さん坂口さん達と盛り上がりまくったよ。＜明＞ I attended the Osaka edition of V-Jump ’s V-Fes. I got ridiculously fired up with Hori’i- san and Sakaguchi- san . <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ＶジャンプのＶフェス大阪大会に出席しました。堀井さん坂口さん達と盛り上がりまくったよ。＜明＞
I attended the Osaka edition of V-Jump’s V-Fes. I got ridiculously fired up with Hori’i-san and Sakaguchi-san. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 最近夜活動することが多い。猛暑猛暑と世間は騒いでいるが，ピンとこなくて，すいません。＜明＞ Recently, I’ve often been working at night. The public at large keeps going on about heat wave this, heat wave that, but I’m sorry, I can’t quite put my finger on the reason. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
最近夜活動することが多い。猛暑猛暑と世間は騒いでいるが，ピンとこなくて，すいません。＜明＞
Recently, I’ve often been working at night. The public at large keeps going on about heat wave this, heat wave that, but I’m sorry, I can’t quite put my finger on the reason. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 鳥山展高松大会に行ってきた。水不足でいろんな行事が中止になって大変だなと心から思う。＜明＞ I went to the Takamatsu leg of the Toriyama Exhibition. A lot of events were cancelled due to a lack of water, and I really thought it must be tough out there. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
鳥山展高松大会に行ってきた。水不足でいろんな行事が中止になって大変だなと心から思う。＜明＞
I went to the Takamatsu leg of the Toriyama Exhibition. A lot of events were cancelled due to a lack of water, and I really thought it must be tough out there. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 親戚の子供達と家族でTDLに行ってきた。炎天下でクラクラしたが水回り物Ａ(アトラクション)で生き返る。＜明＞ I went to Tokyo Disneyland with my family and my relatives’ kids. I felt dizzy under the burning sun, but the water attractions brought me back to life. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
親戚の子供達と家族でTDLに行ってきた。炎天下でクラクラしたが水回り物Ａ(アトラクション)で生き返る。＜明＞
I went to Tokyo Disneyland with my family and my relatives’ kids. I felt dizzy under the burning sun, but the water attractions brought me back to life. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 日差しの中に刺すような痛さはなくなったけどまだまだ残暑が厳しく犬の散歩もままならぬ。＜明＞ The searing, piercing sunlight has gone away, but the late summer heat is still intense, and walking the dog is something that’s not in my control. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
日差しの中に刺すような痛さはなくなったけどまだまだ残暑が厳しく犬の散歩もままならぬ。＜明＞
The searing, piercing sunlight has gone away, but the late summer heat is still intense, and walking the dog is something that’s not in my control. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 鳥山展の高松大会は最終的に3万5000人くらい。来てくれた人ありがとう。次は10月に北海道だ。＜明＞ About 35,000 people came to the Takamatsu leg of the Toriyama Exhibition. Thank you to those who came. Next up is Hokkaido in October. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
鳥山展の高松大会は最終的に3万5000人くらい。来てくれた人ありがとう。次は10月に北海道だ。＜明＞
About 35,000 people came to the Takamatsu leg of the Toriyama Exhibition. Thank you to those who came. Next up is Hokkaido in October. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: DQVIのラスボスのデザインが完成。我ながらなかなかすごい造形になったので期待してね。＜明＞ The design for the final boss of Dragon Quest VI is complete. As far as I’m concerned, I think it took a pretty amazing shape, so look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
DQVIのラスボスのデザインが完成。我ながらなかなかすごい造形になったので期待してね。＜明＞
The design for the final boss of Dragon Quest VI is complete. As far as I’m concerned, I think it took a pretty amazing shape, so look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: DB，役者もそろったことだし，これからは必殺技をバンバン出す予定。楽しみにしていてね。＜明＞ The players in Dragon Ball are assembled, so now I plan on coming out with one special attack after another. Look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
DB，役者もそろったことだし，これからは必殺技をバンバン出す予定。楽しみにしていてね。＜明＞
The players in Dragon Ball are assembled, so now I plan on coming out with one special attack after another. Look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 鳥山展第４弾は，北海道旭川で10月22日から。くわしくは来週号でお知らせするからねっ！＜明＞ Stage 4 of the Toriyama Exhibition will start on October 22nd in Asahikawa, Hokkaido. More details will be announced in next week’s issue! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
鳥山展第４弾は，北海道旭川で10月22日から。くわしくは来週号でお知らせするからねっ！＜明＞
Stage 4 of the Toriyama Exhibition will start on October 22nd in Asahikawa, Hokkaido. More details will be announced in next week’s issue! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年末に向けて，またいっぱい色原稿の依頼がきた。スケジュールを調整して頑張らなきゃね。＜明＞ Once again, I’ve gotten lots of requests for color manuscripts for the end of the year. I’ll have to adjust my schedule and do my best. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年末に向けて，またいっぱい色原稿の依頼がきた。スケジュールを調整して頑張らなきゃね。＜明＞
Once again, I’ve gotten lots of requests for color manuscripts for the end of the year. I’ll have to adjust my schedule and do my best. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ふっふっふ，ドラクエとクロノのパッケージイラストを描きあげたぞ！楽しみに待っててね。＜明＞ Oh ho ho, I’ve finished drawing the box art for Dragon Quest and Chrono Trigger ! Look forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ふっふっふ，ドラクエとクロノのパッケージイラストを描きあげたぞ！楽しみに待っててね。＜明＞
Oh ho ho, I’ve finished drawing the box art for Dragon Quest and Chrono Trigger! Look forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 紅葉の季節になると、どこか田舎のひなびた温泉にフラッと行きたくなる。う～～っ温泉！＜明＞ Whenever it gets to be fall foliage season, I just want to drop everything and go to a rustic hot spring in the countryside. Ooooh, hot springs…! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
紅葉の季節になると、どこか田舎のひなびた温泉にフラッと行きたくなる。う～～っ温泉！＜明＞
Whenever it gets to be fall foliage season, I just want to drop everything and go to a rustic hot spring in the countryside. Ooooh, hot springs…! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 旭川の鳥山展の近況を聞きました。出足好調だそう。これから寒い季節です。頑張ってね！＜明＞ I heard the stats on the Toriyama Exhibition in Asahikawa. Sounds like they’re off to a promising start. The cold season is about to begin. Hang in there! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
旭川の鳥山展の近況を聞きました。出足好調だそう。これから寒い季節です。頑張ってね！＜明＞
I heard the stats on the Toriyama Exhibition in Asahikawa. Sounds like they’re off to a promising start. The cold season is about to begin. Hang in there! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ３･４合併号で超ビックリ左右80センチのウルトラ特大カレンダーポスターを描く。期待大。＜明＞ I’m going to draw a super-astounding 80-centimeter-wide extra-large calendar-poster for the #3/4 double-issue. I have big expectations. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
３･４合併号で超ビックリ左右80センチのウルトラ特大カレンダーポスターを描く。期待大。＜明＞
I’m going to draw a super-astounding 80-centimeter-wide extra-large calendar-poster for the #3/4 double-issue. I have big expectations. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: もうじき師走。毎年思うことだけど，ほんっと年末は走りだしたくなるほどいそがしいのだ。＜明＞ It’s almost December, already. I think this every year, but at the end of the year, I really am so busy that I want to just up and run. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
もうじき師走。毎年思うことだけど，ほんっと年末は走りだしたくなるほどいそがしいのだ。＜明＞
It’s almost December, already. I think this every year, but at the end of the year, I really am so busy that I want to just up and run. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: JSATで僕の参加する会場が決まった。くわしくは新年１号のJSATページを見てチョ。＜明＞ The Jump Super Anime Tour (JSAT) location I’ll be participating at has been decided. Have a look at the JSAT page in the New Year #1 issue. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
JSATで僕の参加する会場が決まった。くわしくは新年１号のJSATページを見てチョ。＜明＞
The Jump Super Anime Tour (JSAT) location I’ll be participating at has been decided. Have a look at the JSAT page in the New Year #1 issue. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 鳥山展が12月22日から北九州市で開催される事に。詳しくは来週号のお知らせを見てちょ。＜明＞ The Toriyama Exhibition will be held in Kita-Kyushu City starting on December 22nd. For more details, check out the news in next week’s issue. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
鳥山展が12月22日から北九州市で開催される事に。詳しくは来週号のお知らせを見てちょ。＜明＞
The Toriyama Exhibition will be held in Kita-Kyushu City starting on December 22nd. For more details, check out the news in next week’s issue. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: さる国際スターがDBを実写化したいという申し込み。まだ決めてないけど実現するかもね。＜明＞ A certain international star says he wants to make a live-action Dragon Ball . It’s not set in stone yet, but it might become a reality. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
さる国際スターがDBを実写化したいという申し込み。まだ決めてないけど実現するかもね。＜明＞
A certain international star says he wants to make a live-action Dragon Ball. It’s not set in stone yet, but it might become a reality. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: いや～，年末進行の地獄スケジュールから解放され，この本の発売頃はのんびり温泉でも…。＜明＞ Ahhh~, I’ve been set free from my hellish year-end schedule, and by the time you’re reading this, I’ll be relaxing in some hot spring or other… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
いや～，年末進行の地獄スケジュールから解放され，この本の発売頃はのんびり温泉でも…。＜明＞
Ahhh~, I’ve been set free from my hellish year-end schedule, and by the time you’re reading this, I’ll be relaxing in some hot spring or other… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ふりむけばDBも連載10年。10年ひと区切りということで，今年は新たな気分で執筆しまくるぞ～！＜明＞ Looking back, Dragon Ball has been serialized for a whole 10 years now. Setting aside the last decade, I’m gonna start the new year afresh and draw like crazy~! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ふりむけばDBも連載10年。10年ひと区切りということで，今年は新たな気分で執筆しまくるぞ～！＜明＞
Looking back, Dragon Ball has been serialized for a whole 10 years now. Setting aside the last decade, I’m gonna start the new year afresh and draw like crazy~! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 年末年始ののんびり休暇も過ぎてしまえばアッという間。次の休暇はいったいいつになる？＜明＞ My relaxing New Year’s vacation passed by in a flash. Just when will my next vacation be? <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
年末年始ののんびり休暇も過ぎてしまえばアッという間。次の休暇はいったいいつになる？＜明＞
My relaxing New Year’s vacation passed by in a flash. Just when will my next vacation be? <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: ニュースで名古屋の福袋戦争（？）映像を見た。福袋にあんなすごいものが入ってたなんて…。＜明＞ I saw Nagoya’s lucky-bag war(?) video on the news. To think that there’s such incredible stuff inside a lucky bag… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
ニュースで名古屋の福袋戦争（？）映像を見た。福袋にあんなすごいものが入ってたなんて…。＜明＞
I saw Nagoya’s lucky-bag war(?) video on the news. To think that there’s such incredible stuff inside a lucky bag… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 遅くなりましたが年賀状をくれた皆ありがとう。とても全部に返事は書けないけど読んでます。＜明＞ Sorry I’m late, but thank you to everyone who sent me a New Year’s card. There’s no way I could reply to everyone, but I’ve read them all. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
遅くなりましたが年賀状をくれた皆ありがとう。とても全部に返事は書けないけど読んでます。＜明＞
Sorry I’m late, but thank you to everyone who sent me a New Year’s card. There’s no way I could reply to everyone, but I’ve read them all. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 連日報道の被害状況を聞き適切な言葉もでない。被災者の皆様に心よりお見舞い申し上げます。＜明＞ I can’t find the right words to say, listening to these reports of death and damage day-in, day-out. To all the victims, you have my deepest sympathies. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
連日報道の被害状況を聞き適切な言葉もでない。被災者の皆様に心よりお見舞い申し上げます。＜明＞
I can’t find the right words to say, listening to these reports of death and damage day-in, day-out. To all the victims, you have my deepest sympathies. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: かわいがっていた犬がついに病気に勝てずに天に召されました。あの世で悟空と遊んでおくれ。＜明＞ My dear old dog finally lost the battle with her illness and went to Heaven. Please play with Goku in the afterlife. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
かわいがっていた犬がついに病気に勝てずに天に召されました。あの世で悟空と遊んでおくれ。＜明＞
My dear old dog finally lost the battle with her illness and went to Heaven. Please play with Goku in the afterlife. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 何げなく考えたフュージョンだけど，コンテストしたら面白いよね。亀仙人とブルマとか…。＜明＞ I came up with Fusion on a whim, but it’d be fun to do a contest with it. Like Kame-Sen’nin and Bulma, for instance… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
何げなく考えたフュージョンだけど，コンテストしたら面白いよね。亀仙人とブルマとか…。＜明＞
I came up with Fusion on a whim, but it’d be fun to do a contest with it. Like Kame-Sen’nin and Bulma, for instance… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新年が明けたと思ったら，もうすぐそこに３月が。ああ，月日のたつのは，はやいものだ…。＜明＞ Just when I thought a new year had begun, it’s almost March already. Ah, the days go by so fast… <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新年が明けたと思ったら，もうすぐそこに３月が。ああ，月日のたつのは，はやいものだ…。＜明＞
Just when I thought a new year had begun, it’s almost March already. Ah, the days go by so fast… <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: フフフ。DB第40巻は３月３日に発売されたのだ。さあみんな急いで本屋さんへダッシュ！＜明＞ Tee hee hee. Dragon Ball Volume 40 went on sale March 3rd. C’mon everybody, hurry up and dash on over to the bookstore! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
フフフ。DB第40巻は３月３日に発売されたのだ。さあみんな急いで本屋さんへダッシュ！＜明＞
Tee hee hee. Dragon Ball Volume 40 went on sale March 3rd. C’mon everybody, hurry up and dash on over to the bookstore! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 窓からさしこむ春の陽射しに，ついウトウト。気がつけば夜。お日様をほとんど見てないぞ。＜明＞ I accidentally nodded off as the spring sunshine streamed through the window. When I woke up, it was night. I barely saw the sun at all. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
窓からさしこむ春の陽射しに，ついウトウト。気がつけば夜。お日様をほとんど見てないぞ。＜明＞
I accidentally nodded off as the spring sunshine streamed through the window. When I woke up, it was night. I barely saw the sun at all. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 来週号は巻頭カラーだぞ！めちゃ大変なスケジュールだったけど気合い入れて描きました！！＜明＞ Next week’s issue will have color pages at the front of the magazine! My schedule was really crazy, but I gave it my all, and managed to draw it! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
来週号は巻頭カラーだぞ！めちゃ大変なスケジュールだったけど気合い入れて描きました！！＜明＞
Next week’s issue will have color pages at the front of the magazine! My schedule was really crazy, but I gave it my all, and managed to draw it! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: クロノ・トリガーは，みんなもうやったかな？簡単だけど奥が深いこのゲームにはまってる。＜明＞ Has everyone played Chrono Trigger yet? I’m hooked on this game, which is simple yet deep. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
クロノ・トリガーは，みんなもうやったかな？簡単だけど奥が深いこのゲームにはまってる。＜明＞
Has everyone played Chrono Trigger yet? I’m hooked on this game, which is simple yet deep. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 500回の連載表彰式の賞杯はガラスレリーフの中にDBが７つ埋まってるそう。今から楽しみ。＜明＞ I hear that the trophy at the commendation ceremony for passing 500 chapters will be the seven Dragon Balls in glass relief. Now I’m looking forward to it. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
500回の連載表彰式の賞杯はガラスレリーフの中にDBが７つ埋まってるそう。今から楽しみ。＜明＞
I hear that the trophy at the commendation ceremony for passing 500 chapters will be the seven Dragon Balls in glass relief. Now I’m looking forward to it. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 春休み期間中は子供とたっぷり遊んだ。平和が一番と実感。ああ早く次の休みが来ないかな。＜明＞ I had lots of fun with my kids during their spring vacation. Really made me feel that peaceful times are best. Ah, I hope the next break gets here soon. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
春休み期間中は子供とたっぷり遊んだ。平和が一番と実感。ああ早く次の休みが来ないかな。＜明＞
I had lots of fun with my kids during their spring vacation. Really made me feel that peaceful times are best. Ah, I hope the next break gets here soon. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 家族と，本年２度目のスキーにいってきた。あいかわらず寒さには弱いが，温泉で暖まった。＜明＞ I went skiing with my family for the second time this year. As always, I don’t stand a chance against the cold, but the hot spring warmed me right up. <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
家族と，本年２度目のスキーにいってきた。あいかわらず寒さには弱いが，温泉で暖まった。＜明＞
I went skiing with my family for the second time this year. As always, I don’t stand a chance against the cold, but the hot spring warmed me right up. <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 4月22日から東京の三越美術館で，鳥山展が開かれてる。新しく描きおろした絵（リトグラフ）も発売中！＜明＞ The Toriyama Exhibition started at the Mitsukoshi Art Gallery in Shinjuku on April 22nd. They’re selling a brand new lithograph from me, too! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
4月22日から東京の三越美術館で，鳥山展が開かれてる。新しく描きおろした絵（リトグラフ）も発売中！＜明＞
The Toriyama Exhibition started at the Mitsukoshi Art Gallery in Shinjuku on April 22nd. They’re selling a brand new lithograph from me, too! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 今，アシスタントさんがいない状態で描いているので，しめ切りがきついきつい。ヒーッ！＜明＞ I’m drawing without an assistant right now, so I’m really feeling the deadline crunch. Yeeeargh! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
今，アシスタントさんがいない状態で描いているので，しめ切りがきついきつい。ヒーッ！＜明＞
I’m drawing without an assistant right now, so I’m really feeling the deadline crunch. Yeeeargh! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 新宿・三越美術館での「鳥山展」は5月21日まで、まだの人は、今すぐダッシュするのだ！！＜明＞ The “Toriyama Exhibition” at the Mitsukoshi Art Gallery in Shinjuku goes until May 21st, so if you haven’t gone yet, you’d better make a mad dash for it right now! <Akira>
wj_toriyama_html:
新宿・三越美術館での「鳥山展」は5月21日まで、まだの人は、今すぐダッシュするのだ！！＜明＞
The “Toriyama Exhibition” at the Mitsukoshi Art Gallery in Shinjuku goes until May 21st, so if you haven’t gone yet, you’d better make a mad dash for it right now! <Akira>

wj_toriyama_text: 次回「ドラゴンボール」其之五百十九でなにかが起こる！！！！ さあ！ いったいなにが起こるというのか！？ たいして期待せずに待て！！ Next time, in Dragon Ball chapter 519, something is going to happen!!!! Now! Just what’s going to happen, you ask?! Don’t get your hopes up too much, and wait for it!
wj_toriyama_html:

wj_toriyama_text: 10年間応援してくれた読者のみなさんには，感謝してもしきれません。本当に…ありがとう。＜明＞ I can’t thank all you readers enough for your support these last 10 years. Honestly… thank you all. <Akira>
